You went to lie down on your bed, hoping that a nice nap would make things better. You began to lie down and then started to fall asleep, but as your eyes were finally closing, you could see something a tad weird, your hand had begun to turn into water. You thought that your mind was just playing a trick on you and you continued to fall asleep, unknowing as your body turned into water and then made its way into your TV, which was playing Final Fantasy X, which you had forgotten to shut off.

You landed on the ship as a puddle of water, then you slipped off and landed in the ocean right as Tidus and Rikku dove into it, and you began to drift until you washed upon the ground in a very familiar, but odd place, a place known as Besaid Island. 'Wait...where am I? Is this a dream?' You wondered, noticing that you couldn't talk as you were. Your answer came as you began searching around, until you eventually came into the clearing with the Save Spear, and you saw a very familiar face. 'Yuna?! But she can't be here...wait this is all just a dream!' You thought, and you would have sighed to yourself in relief, but two things stopped you, one, the inability to do so in liquid form, and two, something told you that that was no dream.

Yuna heard you moving around, then she turned towards you, and she began to walk towards you. "Hello is there someone there? Don't be afraid. I'm not a fiend." Yuna said in her usual tone, thinking that you were a lost child. Instinctively, you suddenly jumped out of your hiding spot, showing yourself to Yuna. You then began and moving towards her. "Huh what's with that water?" Yuna then gasped as you speed up and landed on her, followed by you forcing your way into her body via every open (Ears, nose, mouth, ext...).

-current time-

"Oh yeah that is what happened." You say to yourself with Yuna's voice. "Oh, and apparently I am in Besaid now." You stay calm as you head back to the village. You walk towards the village, wondering when exactly Yuna would be going to attempt to become a summoner. In the village you see a few familiar faces I.E. Lulu's and Kimahri's.

"Yuna? Are you ready to become a summoner?" Lulu asks, looking at you.

'Well, that answers that question.' You think, referring to how you wondering when she was going to go and become a summoner earlier. "I'm ready, I will become a summoner!" You say with a smile and a nod as you enter the temple trials section.

"Alright, time to go in then." Lulu replies.

'Hmm.' You begin thinking. 'Who knows when I'll get the chance to think things through again and figure out what's happening... Yuna's stubborn enough that I could probably convince them that I'm her, just wanting to prove herself by going it alone for this temple if I try hard enough.'

What do you do?
1211.title: Hello summoner Anthony...

choices: Tidus jumps in and fights the fiends
A piece of you separates and reforms your body
12111.content:
'Maybe I can convince them to let me go in alone.' You think to yourself. "Hey Lulu." You say turning around to face your two companions.

"Yes Yuna." Lulu replies. "What is it?" She asks.

"Well I was wondering if I could go in alone." You ask trying to convince them that you can go in alone.

"Are you sure Yuna? This may be incredibly difficult for you since it is your first time at this." Lulu's words faze you a bit, but you remember that these temple puzzles are easy for you to solve so you simply nod in response. "Alright Yuna, if that is what you want, then Kimahri and I will wait out here by the entrance to the trials." Lulu says walking back towards the entrance before she stops a minute later. "If you find the trials to be more difficult then what you expected, then feel free to come get us."

"Thank you. Please wait here, okay?" You reply and run off into the trials of the temple. "Alright Anthony, you managed to get away from them for the time being so let's follow Yuna's...er my journey for the time being." So you go through, multitasking by thinking about what's going on.

***A few minutes later***

"Okay I have beaten all the puzzles, now let's continue on." During the time that you were doing the trial (including the destruction spear), you've learned more about your powers by focusing on it. You head down into the part where the Fayth awaits, giving Yuna control back, and letting her know what's happened since you don't want her to wonder what's happen, and to make sure that everything will work out, you make Yuna your loyal, loving slave who will serve you in any way happily, including letting you possess her. Yuna obtains the Aeon and you leave the room, surprised that Tidus hasn't come in yet. Suddenly you hear footsteps, thinking it was him, but you didn't expect what it was. "What the heck is a fiend doing here?!" You wonder, looking around and seeing a few more.

One of them lunges to attack, and you dodge it, backing up. "I really wish I had a sword..."

"No, I won't let these things kill me!" You say courageously! You stand up and face your foes, preparing to summon. They start to come after you again when...
12111.title: Trial time, and you're going in alone...

choices: You wake up in the middle of the night...
Part of you leaves, and both bodies wake up, thinking you're dreaming
121111.content:
The fiends are moving too fast, and you brace yourself for the attack, when all of the sudden, someone you recognize jumps in and attacks the fiends.

"Huh? Tidus? I am so glad to see you." You say, surprised.

"I don't know how you know my name but..." Tidus draws his blade and blocks the next hit from a fiend. "...I can't let anyone die, especially not by a fiend!" Tidus slashes with his blade, destroying a few of the fiends.

"Are you alright?" Tidus asks taking your hand and running a short distance away.

"Yeah, I am, do you mind if I borrow your blade for a second?" You ask.

"What? You don't look like you can wield one of these." Tidus remarks with a grin.

"Don't worry, I'll bring it right back." You say, using some feminine charm in the process, which makes Tidus blush a bit.

"Well, alright, but be careful with it, after all, it is pretty sharp." Tidus replies, handing you the sword he got from Auron that Jecht gave to him to give to Tidus (Tidus doesn't have Brotherhood yet) and turning his face to stop you from seeing him blush.

"Thanks, now..." You walk a bit towards the center of the room and then wipe your hand over the blade. "... LIMIT BREAK!" You shout. A tidal wave of water then floods into the room surrounding you, but not touching Tidus since you don't want to attack him. The fiends don't know what to do as then begin to panic. You soon were towering above them, and you feel like you are standing on something. You look down to see a shadow under your feet, holding you up. "Hello..." You wave your hand in the air summoning up a ball of water "...and Goodbye!" With those words you shot the water at the fiends with a slash from the sword, leaving them no room to move or escape. They drown in the water. You then slowly return to the ground with your body being exhausted from using the Limit Break, you finally make it to the ground and begin to collapse, but Tidus catches you in his arms.

"You're okay now, so take a rest." Tidus says, and you happily reply with a smile, then pass out in his arms. The next thing you know, you're waking up in a bed with Lulu sitting in a chair besides you.

"Huh where am I" You ask feeling your head due to you suddenly having a headache from probably sitting up too fast.

"Easy there Yuna you should get some more rest." Lulu says lying you back down. "After all you did just become a summoner and somehow tapped into a unknown Aeon, although I have to say, it was surprising to learn that fiends were in the temple."

'An Unknown Aeon.' You think to yourself? 'Is that what it was?' You look at her. "Man, this sure is one heck of a head ache." You groan out loud.

Lulu walks away, then returns to you shortly afterwards, holding onto a cup which has a brown liquid in it. 'Probably tea.' You think to yourself as Lulu hands you the cup of brown liquid.

"Go ahead." Lulu coaxed. "Drink up and you'll feel a lot better Yuna." Lulu says with a smile. You smell the scent of the tea, and it smells like a cappuccino from your home town brewery.

"It smells heavenly." You comment making Lulu blush in embarrassment before taking a sip of the sweet smelling tonic. The taste is unexpected, but not disgusting, in fact, it is actually quite good. "Mmm taste like hot coco on a cold winter night." You say enjoying the taste.

"I'm glad you like it Yuna." Lulu says with a cheerful laugh, which is rare for her. "By the way, what is hot coco?"

You then come off you high of the taste and snap back to reality. "Well Hot coco is this really tasty drink that you drink when it is really cold outside. Here let me make some for you. "You say with a smile. Lulu helps you up and the two of you walk towards what appears to be a kitchen. Alright now please leave the room Lulu." You say to her.

"Huh? Why, Yuna?" She asks you suspiciously.

"Well, the recipe is a secret, so please..." You ask.

"Oh, I understand. Very well Yuna, I'll leave you to make this hot coco." Lulu says, exiting the kitchen. "I won't let anyone enter until you say it's okay." Lulu says before finally exiting the room.

"Alright, time to make hot coco." You say, spitting out a piece of your liquid self, which quickly turns into your regular body, you then shift your main body to the real you and begin to cook, with Yuna handing you tools and ingredients. After a few minutes, you had completed the hot coco and made enough for everyone.

"Let's see, one for Wakka, one for Kimahri, one for Tidus, one for me, and one for Lulu." You say, going over your check list. You put a little of your liquid self in Lulu's cup. Your original body then turns into liquid and returns to Yuna's body. "Alright everyone, the hot coco is done." You say. Lulu is the first to walk into the kitchen, and she picks up the tray that was holding all of the hot coco. You and Lulu then exit then kitchen, and you see that all your teammates are waiting. Wakka is sitting in a chair, fiddling with his Blitzball, Kimahri is near the door, watching some birds outside flying; Tidus is lying on the bed, but sits up when he sees you coming in. All of you then sit down at a table as you start to hand out the hot coco. "One for Tidus." You say, handing a cup to Tidus. "One for Wakka." As you hand the cup to him, he says thank you and smells the scent of the strange liquid which he has never heard of before. "One for Kimahri." You say, walking over to Kimahri who is still by the doorway.

Kimahri just gives a little smile since it isn't at the point where he starts talking. He takes the cup and takes a small sip, and you can tell by the look on his face that he likes it. You smile and return to the table where you pick up Lulu's cup of hot coco and take a small breather. Since part of you is in it, you know you have the right one.

"Alright Lulu, here's your hot coco." You say with a smile, handing Lulu her cup, which if looked at carefully, could be seen to have a tiny bit more in it than the others, but nobody notices. Lulu sips on the coco, and you happily walk back to pick up you own cup.

As you pick up your cup, Tidus lifts up his cup and says. "A toast to Yuna and this delicious drink!"

"I second that man." Wakka says taking another sip of his hot coco.

"I third that Yuna, this drink is delicious! You have to show me how to make it some time." Lulu says with a smile.

"Maybe some other time, but right now how's about we call it a night and we can set out on our journey tomorrow." You say with everybody seconding the idea.

"Alright then, it is settled, we set off tomorrow." Wakka declares, making it official.

You smile and finish you cup of hot coco, then go to the bedroom where you then fall asleep shortly afterwards.
121111.title: "Hey are you alright?"

choices: A Final Fantasy created before FFX
A Final Fantasy created after FFX
1211111.content:
You are lying in Yuna's bed in the house she stays in, sleeping peacefully, when a sudden noise from outside wakes you up.

"Huh? Who's there?" You ask to the now silent darkness. You walk out of the inn after grabbing your weapon and proceed towards where you had heard the noise.

"Come closer..." A voice whispers, sounding as if it is coming from everywhere around you.

"Huh who's there?" You ask readying your staff. "I have a weapon!"

"Follow my voice..." Whispers the voice, though this time, the voice is coming from somewhere north, which is where you start heading when someone grabs your arm.

"And where do you think you're going?" Lulu asks with a small yawn afterwards.

"Oh, hey Lulu, did I wake you up?" You ask with an apologetic tone.

"Yes, you did, but more importantly, what are you doing awake at this hour?" Lulu asks in a serious tone?

"Well, I heard this voice, and it told me to follow it so..." You begin.

"So, you were just going to run off without telling me or anybody else? That is quiet foolish if you ask me." Lulu comments.

'Man, I don't have time for this." You think as you grip your fist and take a small breath before turning around towards Lulu.

"Yuna, what are you doin...Ah my stomach!" Lulu cries out in pain, clutching her stomach.

"It'll all be over soon, just calm down." You say, placing your hand on Lulu's shoulder as the piece inside her that you slipped into her hot coco earlier begins to finally take her over.

After another minute or two, Lulu finally subsided and became yours. "What do you want me to do for you?" She asks in a semi-seductive tone.

"Just follow me, and make sure to keep quiet." You say shushing her, and then the two of you rush off towards where your main body heard the noise. During the time, you've done what you did with Yuna (turned her into a loyal, loving slave), but you stayed possessing her, although you turned off the link so that you wouldn't have to deal with learning how to effectively control two bodies at once.

After some trekking through the woods you and you/Lulu end up at some sort of ancient abandoned temple. You proceed towards what appears to be the door to the temple, when suddenly, ancient symbols flare to life across it.

"Hey Lulu, do you know anything about this place?" You ask.

"Man, how does she walk with these things?" You/Lulu wonders aloud.

"Hey! Do you know anything about these ruins?!" You ask, getting a tad annoyed by your companion, which is odd since she is you in another body.

"Oh, sorry about that." You/Lulu apologizes. "But I have no idea what these ruins are, and what is even odder is that those symbols aren't even any known language."

"Not even Al Bed?" You ask to which you/Lulu shakes her head.

"Ok, we should proceed with caution, we don't know what's in there." You say with you/Lulu agreeing.

You proceed into the temple to find the place ravaged with overgrowth. "Maybe I can burn it away with a fire spell." You/Lulu suggests, but you shake your head.

"No, sorry, but it may catch the forest on fire, and I don't want the attention, at least, not now." You reply. The two of you proceed deeper into the temple to find a strange ship in the middle of a docking area, to your surprise. "Wait, what is this?!" You ask, surprised to see a ship so strange this early in the game, let alone in a temple. The look of the ship is covered in overgrowth from tip to tail wings, if this ship has some which you found odd.

"Hey, over here!" You/Lulu yelled. "I think I found the door!" You quickly run over to her to see a strange looking door, which has a weird symbol engraved over it. "Must be the mark of who ever owned the ship." You/Lulu guesses. "But the big question is..."

"...How do we open it?" You wonder, placing your hand where a door handle would be. Suddenly, a hand scanner appears on the door, which you instinctively place you hand on. A small jolt of pain shoots through your body, making you whip you hand back in surprise. "Ow! What was that?!" You shout shaking you hand to get rid of the pain.

A soft voice similar to the voice you heard before you took control Lulu begins to speak "Biological blood sample acquired...scanning...scanning..."

"What do you think it is doing Yuna?" You/Lulu asks as you use a cure spell to heal your injured hand.

"I don't exactly know, but whatever it's doing, it took a microscopic piece of my liquid self when it took that sample. What I would like to know is why and how." You reply. The voice begins to speak again, this time sounding more femine then before.

"Hello Anthony, my name is Digital-Interactive-Virtual-Assistant, or for short, you can call me DIVA." The voice chuckles.

"Uh, okay." You reply. "So, can you let me and my friend in?"

"As long as your friend has a piece of you, then yes, she can. Oh, and welcome aboard Lulu." The voice says in a happy tone. The door to the ship then opens up to reveal futuristic equipment like you might see in Final Fantasy XIII, though you are still unsure why you figure that.

"Alright, now please proceed to the cockpit." Diva says with a small laugh. You are then lead to a small cockpit area that isn't very well lit, but when you step into the room, the lights instantly flick on, as if on command.

"That was strange." You comment, then you look at the captain's chair, which you promptly sit upon. Suddenly, your body begins to shake uncontrollably as it seems you were being separated from Yuna's body. "What's happening to me?" You yell scared for your life.

"Don't worry Anthony. I am just shedding you of this body so you can pilot while your friends occupy the other controls." Diva's reply makes you calm down a bit as you exhale and completely separate the majority of your body from Yuna, while leaving a small part in her to still remain in control.

"What are your orders Anthony? Shall we go to another series" Diva asks brimming with excitement.

"Wait, what do you mean?" You ask, surprised.

"I am equipped to go into any Cartoon, Anime, or Video game series." We can leave at any time.

"Uh, okay, whatever you say Diva." You say, shrugging, then you notice you can shrug again and also notice you are now in your normal body.

"Well Anthony, now that that is settled shall we finally get going?" You/Lulu asks.

"Yeah uh sure let's go to..." You begin
1211111.title: Awaken to a disembodied voice that leads to a ship

12111111.content:
You feel the ship jerk when it suddenly springs to life. You hear the roar of the engine, although it sounds more like an explosion than anything else as suddenly a portal opened up before the ship. You think of your options. You can go to one of the games made after Final Fantasy X, but there are some great girls to possess in the previous games such as Tifa and Aerith from Final Fantasy VII or maybe not so further back, maybe into Final fantasy IX?

"Wait, yeah, that sounds like a plan." You say snapping your fingers as you suddenly have a brainstorm. "Alright Diva, take us to Final Fantasy VII, and make it snappy." You say with a grin.

"Aye aye Anthony! Setting course for the weird and interesting world of Final Fantasy VII!" Diva's voice says with a cheer as the ship begins to enter the portal. You find yourself in your world.

"Wait! Won't people see the ship and freak out?" You ask Diva.

"Not to fear, Anthony." She replies. "This ship is unable to be seen to anyone without a piece of you inside of them, and even machines that don't have a piece of you inside of them can't detect you, and can't be touched by anything or anyone but you." You are satisfied, and you, Yuna, and Lulu (both of who you have given control to) then you use a device to beam all three of you into your room, since you arrived outside of your house.

You see that Final Fantasy X is paused at the point that you left, so you reset and check the saved files, seeing that the point where you saved was still there, which you knew for sure since Yuna and Lulu were the only characters shown on the list of party members; even Tidus wasn't shown.

You then turn the PS2 off and replace the game with Final Fantasy VII, making sure to put the PlayStation Memory card instead of having the PS2 one in. You turn on the game and select one of your save files that is in part one; you don’t even pay attention to the characters on the team. You, Yuna, and Lulu all turn into liquid and enter the game. You land on the ground, and you soon turn back to normal, with your back on the ground. Yuna and Lulu then appear, turning back as soon as they land. Unlike you, they landed on their feet.

"Hey, Anthony, are you okay?" Yuna asks in her kind, sweet voice.

"Yeah, I'm alright, I just reformed on my back accidentally." You reply as Yuna and Lulu help you to your feet. You notice that you seem to be outside of some strange temple that rings a few bells inside your mind. "Hey! I know this place..." You begin to tear up as you remember Aerith dying at this point.

"Huh? What's wrong Anthony? Why are you crying?" Yuna asks, concerned.

"*sniff* Sorry, bad memories of this place." You wipe away your tears and begin to walk off towards the temple doors.

"Anthony..." Yuna begins to say.

"Don't worry, I'm fine, it's just a few tears, that's all. Now come on, or I'll leave you girls behind!" You reply, cutting her off.

"Hey! Wait for me!" Diva yells as she sends out an electrical impulse that hits your left arm, which forms a strange red gauntlet.

"Huh? What are you doing Diva? Aren't you supposed to stay on the ship?" You ask Diva, who seems to have shifted her consciousness to the gauntlet now attached to Anthony’s arm.

“Oh, don’t worry Anthony it is only temporary, and this way I can keep a protective eye on you while you are outside of the ship.” Diva chuckles.

“Alright Diva, whatever you say.” You shrug and then proceed inside with Lulu and Yuna following closely afterwards. When you enter the temple, you find what you expected, except that a strange elevator has appeared beside you, which seems to be a quicker way to get to the lower levels, instead of having to go through the maze of the temple.

“Well, that’s convenient.” You say, going towards the elevator.

“A little too convenient.” Lulu says, pushing the elevator button. Nothing happens, surprising you.

“Oh come on!” You say, annoyed, before pressing on the button.

“Allow me...” Diva says as an electronic pulse leaves the gauntlet and goes into the elevator control, and soon finally, a loud clunk is heard. “Bottom floor: Food, weapons, and mysterious women.” Diva chuckles reentering the gauntlet.

The elevator door opens to reveal Aerith praying at the same spot where you thought she would be praying at. You and the gang then walk out of the elevator door and approach Aerith. As you approach Aerith, she turns to face you.

“Huh? Oh my mistake. I thought you were Cloud, but I guess I'm just getting a tad antsy.” Aerith says with a sad look before turning back to her praying.

“Wait a second...” You say sheepishly.

“Yes, what is it?” Aerith replies.

“...” You then suddenly can't speak a single word as your eyes begin to tear up.

“Huh? Why are you crying? Is something the matter? Did you lose someone?” Aerith asks, concerned. Lulu and Yuna turn to you, both with concerned looks.

“Anthony, are you alright?” They both ask at the same time, you but you don't reply.

“I think I may know what’s wrong with Anthony, ladies.” Diva says in a saddened voice.

“What is it Diva? Why is Anthony so sad? Is it because this place makes him sad or something?” Yuna asks, more worried than ever.

“Well, I'm not able to tell you, because Anthony hasn't allowed me too but...” Diva pauses.

“But what Diva? Tell us what is wrong with Anthony.” Lulu demands in a calm voice, showing a small noticeable amount of anger and sorrow.

“...” Diva still remains quiet and then you speak up.

“It has to do with Aerith...” You manage to say in a somewhat calm voice.

“With me? Did I do something wrong? Did I hurt you somehow?” Aerith asks, concerned.

“No, it wasn't you.” You reply wiping the tears from your eyes. “...But...but you are going to be killed right here! Where you just were praying in only a few minutes, someone is going to stab you through the heart in front of everyone's eyes.” You say collapsing to the floor balling.

“Hey there, there.” Aerith says, walking up to you and kneeling down beside you. She places her hand on your shoulder and you look up to her as she takes your left hand. “It'll be alright...” Aerith then embraces you in a soft hug which Lulu and Yuna then join in.

“We'll always be here to protect you.” Lulu, Diva, and Yuna all say at the same time. You then stop crying and accept the beautiful hug from the three women.

“Do you feel better now?” Aerith asked, ending the hug.

“Yeah, I do.” You reply, smiling.

“Well then, that's good Anthony.” Aerith says with a small chuckle before walking back to her original position, where she begins to pray again.

“Wait! I never told her my name!” You suddenly realize that something is a tad weird about Aerith that you can't exactly put your finger on. After a few minutes, the rest of the Final Fantasy VII gang arrives.

“Huh, who are you?” Cloud asks, readying to pull out his sword.

“Easy there, my friend, I am only here to observe, and nothing else. I'll be leaving now, so goodbye.” You say, walking off, but leaving a small part of your liquid self behind, which they just think is water. Tifa looks closer at the liquid, while the rest of the gang walks on towards Aerith.

“What is this stuff? It appears to be water, but something tells me it isn't what it seems.” Tifa says aloud. The water like substance then begins to move. To Tifa's surprise, it suddenly shoots up into her mouth to her dismay. Tifa tries desperately to cough it up, but the liquid substance won't come out. She tries screaming for help, but her voice is muted by the liquid substance which seems to be trying to get into her stomach. All of her friends are focused on Aerith for the moment, so no one bothers to look back.

“Don't worry, it will all be over soon, so please don't resist.” A voice says, which turns out to be yours, but Tifa doesn't know whose voice it is.

“Get out of me!” Tifa tries to scream, but it is muted by the liquid as it is finally making its way into her stomach. “Leave me alone, fiend!” Tifa tries to scream, but nothing comes out. Tifa gasps for breath. ‘It's no use, I'm a goner.’ Tifa thinks as she begins to cry.

“Hey, it will be alright.” A soothing voice says. Tifa turns to see a woman in a white shirt and blue dress who turns out to be Yuna, but Tifa doesn’t know this. Yuna approaches Tifa and calmly places a hand on her shoulder. Tifa tries to say something, but Yuna hushes her, saying “Don't worry, once that piece takes hold of you, everything will be all better.” To Tifa's protest. Tifa tries to punch Yuna, but instead collapses to the floor as the liquid begins to fuse with her stomach. “Almost done.” Yuna comments. “Don't worry, you'll be welcomed into our little family.

“You bitch.” Tifa manages to gasp before finally succumbing to the liquid part of you. Yuna waves her staff into the air and summons up Valefor, who she pats on the head.

“Poor little Tifa.” Yuna says in a slightly saddened tone. “Resilient till the end, but ultimately, you too must accept Anthony into your body and heart.” Yuna lifts up Tifa, and places her on Valefor, before climbing on herself. Valefor then flaps its wings and takes off out of the temple through a small exit hole used by fiends of this world.
12111111.title: A Final Fantasy made before Final Fantasy X

choices: One created later (VIII and above, also including Kingdom Hearts)
One created before (VI and below also including remakes)
121111111.content:
Cloud and the others his team had arrived to see Aerith praying.

“Hey Aerith, it's us!” Yuffie yells in a cheerful tone. Aerith turns to greet them when suddenly the expression on Cloud's face changes to dismay.

“Look out!” He yells as suddenly Sephiroth descends from the ceiling and tries to impale Aerith, who to the surprise of everyone had been ready to dodge, and then did so. Sephiroth is surprised that she dodged and is stunned for a moment. Aerith suddenly rushes at Sephiroth, punching him in the gut incredibly hard, which sends him flying into the water, leaving his sword behind.

Aerith reaches down and takes the blade in hand; suddenly her eyes become blood red and she jumps into the water, which seems to be knee deep on her dress. Sephiroth has started to get up, showing that he is bleeding internally by coughing up blood onto his soaking wet outfit.

“You can't possibly be human.” Sephiroth groans, coughing up more blood.

“I never said I am, nor will I ever be human.” A voice that was not Aerith’s but came from her body said. “You are an enemy of Anthony and Anthony wishes for your destruction.” Aerith grips the sword tightly. “So you must be eliminated permanently!” She lifts the blade in her hand, but Sephiroth blasts at her with a fire spell, which she dodges again somehow.

“No… impossible.” Sephiroth manages to say with a cough as Aerith brings the blade down on him, killing him instantly. She walks over to Sephiroth's still freshly bleeding corpse and removes a simple object from the now dead villain's inventory, a simple, but sacred katana which is smaller than a regular sized sword, but it seems special or at least to Aerith it is. Aerith climbs out of the water and walks by Cloud who is in complete shock at what he just witnessed.

“Aerith are you...” Cloud manages to say before Aerith suddenly lifts up her left hand to him.

“You will forget! You will forget what you just saw and instead remember that Aerith had died and was killed by Sephiroth, who you will believe is alive and also that you had never met Yuffie, and you Cloud will believe that Tifa died after she tried to take on Sephiroth, while none of the rest of you will remember meeting her! You will continue on your mission and save the world like fate tells you to, no questions asked.” Aerith' words make everyone except Yuffie freeze in a strange hypnotic state.

Yuffie looks at her allies worriedly. “Guys are you alright? Hey Baret are you in there?” Yuffie asks, waving her hand in front of Baret's face, which like the others has a blank expression on it. “Come on guys, this isn't funny! Stop being such zoned out zombies and talk to me!” Yuffie yells as Aerith approaches her. “Aerith! What did you do to them? How did you kill Sephiroth? Why are you looking at me like that? No! Stop it! Let me go...” Yuffie cries, gasping for breath as Aerith has covered her mouth, Aerith staring at her with a dark stare. “Why are you doing this Aerith? What are you doing to me?!” Yuffie cries as a jolt of electricity passes through Aerith’s arm and goes through Yuffie’s brain, the jolt changing her thought process to how Aerith wants it. Aerith lets go of Yuffie, and she drops to the ground gasping for breath.

“The reason why I did this was because I will do anything to make Anthony happy, even if it means killing someone! Now, come to me, and accept your place as a loving slave to Anthony.” Aerith says as she begins to walk off, with Yuffie following behind her as soon as she caught her breath.

“Am I dead?” Larxene asks, but to no answer. She sees her own body lying motionless, and she feels afraid, afraid of being alone in this void-like space. The feeling suddenly disappears as she feels something touch her arm, a gentle touch, like that of kindness. She looks to her left to see a familiar face, but she can't place who it is. She had long blond hair and is about the age of sixteen. Larxene tries to remember who the girl is, but the memory is just out of reach for her, when suddenly, a male figure approaches Larxene. The figure, though a dark silhouette, seems warm and inviting, Larxene wants to go towards the figure, but the sixteen year old girl holds her back.

“No! Don't go with him!” The girl pleads as if worried for Larxene's safety. Larxene nods and smiled.

“I remember who you are now.” Larxene says with a smile “You're me before my heart was devoured by darkness, but younger, am I right?” The sixteen year old nods and Larxene smiles even more, she looks back to see the dark silhouette fade away, and then completely disappear.

“You've done well, Larxene.” A voice, which makes Larxene jump a bit, and also made her excited, says. Larxene turns to see her younger self turn into. She hugs him in delight as she had almost given up hope that she’d see him again.

“How are you here, my love, and what happened to my younger self?” Larxene asks, before she kisses her love.

“That was actually me. I used your memories to take that form, which I could do since you drank my liquid self.” Anthony replies.

“What?” Larxene asks, confused.

“Don’t worry, you’ll understand soon.” Anthony informs her.

“Well, I got my heart back at least.” Larxene says.

“No, it isn’t that easy, the part of me inside of you is actually being a stand-in for your heart.” Anthony says as Larxene wakes up to find herself on a soft, plushy mattress.

***Larxene is no longer dreaming***

Larxene leans up, noticing she feels completely human again, and that she is the age that Anthony took as her younger self, with the knowledge of everything that’s going on, including that the part inside of her partially merged with her, changing her body to around his age, but not decreasing the size of her breasts, if anything, they are bigger. She also notices, that with her new age, that her cloak is a little too big for her. She blushes as she remembers that the guy she loves is currently being her heart. She wouldn’t be able to tell the difference, as he was beating inside of her like a normal heart. She gets up from the bed to see that she is all alone in the room, and quickly exits it via the door. Now out in the hallway, she hears sounds of excitement coming from a little bit farther down the hall way. She proceeds there, finds a door labeled “Anthony's room,” and then proceeded inside to find...
12111111111111.title: Cast away your dark heart, Larxene...

121111111111111.content:
Larxene enters the room to find you, as well as the rest of the gang, all sitting around your room. Lulu and Yuna are playing a game called Final Fantasy: Four Heroes of Light on two DS systems. You, Diva/Aerith, Tifa, and Yuffie are playing a GameCube game on the Wii, called Final Fantasy: Crystal Chronicles. There is no sign of Naminé anywhere, but Larxene figures that she is close by, possibly downstairs. No one notices Larxene has come into the room as she makes her way behind you, quietly, so as not to disrupt your game.

She watches as you and Tifa are fighting a giant tentacle plant monster, as Yuffie is attacking it with a small humanoid, though it is a smaller creature with a large lance. Diva/Aerith is serving as the mage of the party, as she is equipped with a couple magicite orbs in order to use spells, as she is casting Cura, as well as other stat based amplifier spells, allowing the party to not be poisoned by the monster’s venom strikes. Larxene watches as Anthony is about to strike the finishing blow, and can barely contain herself, as she watches you kill the monster, and then suddenly hugs you alerting all of her presence.

“Oh, hey Larxene. When'd you wake up?” You say, somewhat shocked to find her up and about so early.

“Just now, and congratulations on beating that monster.” Larxene says with a smile.

“Well, it really wasn't that hard.” Yuffie says, interrupting the two. “I mean, this is only, like, the third boss. It really couldn't have gotten easier if that thing simply just poisoned our part, but since Diva over here was banking on the heal spell, we pretty much kicked that thing's butt! No questions asked!” Yuffie smiles smugly and then Diva/Aerith speaks.

“So, now that Larxene is awake, how about we go find some more girls to posses?” She suggests.

“Hmm, maybe after lunch...” You all walk downstairs to find Naminé and You/Aerith both in kitchen aprons.

“Hope you guys like sandwiches!” Naminé says, and then brings out a tray full of grilled cheese sandwiches, as well as a few baloney and turkey sandwiches. You grabbed a grilled cheese; Larxene does the same, as do Diva/Aerith and Yuffie. Yuna and Lulu grab a baloney sandwich each, and Tifa simply grabs a turkey sandwich.

A half an hour later you all had finished lunch, you say that the sandwiches weren't half bad, which Naminé and You/Aerith blush at (although you/Aerith are just doing so to stay in character, since you feel it is fun).

“Now that that's over with, I say we go and get us some new companions!” You say.

“Alright then, now let's go bag us some new girls!” Yuffie says, and then you enter the game you chose, along with everyone else.

You awaken to find that you are just outside a castle, Castle Baron to be exact.

“So, where are we?” Yuna asks.

“Castle Baron, the home to our first target Rosa, and are second target, Rydia is also here.” You reply.

“So how are we going to do this?” Lulu asks curious of how you are going to storm an entire castle.
121111111111111.title: New members join the harem...

choices: We are in Mist (to possess the younger Rydia)
We are in Final Fantasy: The After Years (going for the girls of that game)
1211111111111111.content:
“You see, all we have to do is simply walk in, and simply 'request' a meeting with Cecil and Rosa. I made sure that we are in about the middle of the game, just after the party of Rosa, Cecil, Rydia, and Kain got away from the enemy forces by sealing the entrance to the underworld.” You say. “And while doing this, I’ll send part of me out to find and possess Rydia.” You then proceed towards the front gates, where two guards greet you.

“Halt! Who are you and what is your business here?” Guard A asked?

“My name is Anthony. I wish for an audience with King Cecil.” You say.

“King Cecil?” Guard B asked. “Maybe knight or paladin, but Cecil isn't a king, not yet at least.” He continues. “Although since everyone in Baron is calling for him to be king, I guess the mistake is understandable.”

“You seem to be alright, but what about those women behind you? Are they coming with you?” Guard A asked.

“Oh, will that be a problem? I am a traveling mistral, and these lovely women are my dancers.” You say as you materialize a small flute from your back using a piece of yourself.

“Oh really now? Than how's about ye play us a toon, mistral.” The two guards say in unison.

“Alright then, this one is called Grand Cataclysmic.” You begin to play your supposed flute as the sky around you grows dark, full of thunder clouds. As you continue to play, lightning strikes around you, though you know this is Lulu and Diva/Aerith, who are using electric based attacks in the background to put on a good performance. The Guards watch in awe as Yuna and Tifa dance around the lightning like that of would be demons. Amazed that this is actually working, you continue to play the flute as more lightning and thunder roll in as well as bits of rain, which quickly turn to ice thanks to Lulu and her blizzard spell.

A few more minutes go by as more guards gather around the front to see the show, and eventually, the performance ends, and all the ice, thunder, and lightning go away the second you stop playing your flute.

“Bravo! Bravo! Encore! Encore!” The crowd of guards cheer.

“May you now be so kind as to let us enter the castle now?” You ask humbly.

“Yes, go right ahead.” The guards say as you and the girls enter, several of the guards give the women lust filled looks, but that is it.

You proceed towards the throne room, and find Cecil, Kain, as well as Rosa all standing around, wondering what all that commotion was. As you enter the room they turn to see you. Right before entering the room, you separate a part of your liquid self, and send it to find Rydia.

“Who are you?” Cecil asks, wondering if these new people are intruders, as does Kain, who readied his lance.

“My name is Anthony, and I am humbled to finally meet you Cecil, but more importantly, I wish to speak with Rosa, if that is alright.” You request sincerely. Cecil and Rosa look at each other, and she nods, showing that it is ok.

“Hmm you would have to get rid of your guards, as well as get rid of any weapons you have on you.” Cecil says, sounding rather official.

“As you wish.” You snap your fingers, and have the girls wait for you outside. “There, now if you would be so kind as to-”

“Ahem aren't you forgetting something.” Kain says as he begins to glare at you.

“Oh yes, my weapons, do for give me.” You say and empty out your pockets as well as pad yourself down to show you have nothing else on you.

“Alright, fine then.” Cecil says. “You can have five minutes with her, but no more! We will break the door down if we hear anything suspicious.” With that Cecil and Kain exited the room, leaving you and Rosa alone.

“So what is it that you wished to talk to me about er...Anthony was it?” Rosa asks.

“That's right." You say to her.

“Oh, alright then. What is it you wished to talk to me about Anthony?” Rosa asks once more.

“Well you see my I was passing through, and heard of a gorgeous looking beauty of the land. I decided that said beauty would be great for my traveling troop of dancers.” You say rather inconspicuously. “Would you like to?”

“I'm sorry, but I have to decline.” Rosa replies rather sternly.

“Huh why so? Is it because you are in love with someone and can't bare part with them? That Cecil, maybe?” You ask Rosa, who seems stunned.

“How did-” She begins.

“I know? Well, the simple fact of that isn't what you'd think.” You reply with a deviant smile. “You see I have set my eyes on you long before I ever entered this world, Rosa. I knew that you would be here, as I did know that were interested in Cecil. Now please hear me out. After all...I just want you to join me and become my white mage.” You have at this point discreetly separated a part of your liquid self, and are having it move towards her.

"What did you mean by 'entered this world?' Are you from the moon? Are you a partner of that brute who kidnapped me?” Rosa asks.

“No my dear I am not. I'm just a simple human being who wishes to be surrounded by beautiful woman.” You say. The piece of you leaps up and enters her mouth. As it goes down her throat, she tries to scream, but it is muffled through the piece of you in her mouth. As you take control, she passes out, and an urge that you didn't notice before begins to subside a little. Soon you/Rosa begins to awaken. "Well, what do you say to my proposal now?" You ask, acting like she isn't you in control of that body.

"I have reconsidered, and I would love nothing more than to join you." You/Rosa says as you help her stand up. You make her blush as you say this. You then feel Rydia come under your control. The liquid part from earlier went into a drink she got while she wasn't looking, and she ended up drinking it. Cecil and Kain then re-enter the room, and you take your weapons back.

"So, what did you talk about?" Cecil asks. You/Rosa look at him.

"He asked me to join his group of traveling dancers." You/Rosa replies.

"So you refused." Kain states, sure of it.

"No, I agreed." You/Rosa says. They both look at her in shock.

"What?!" Both say in shock.

"I'm sorry, Cecil, Kain, but I'm going with him." You/Rosa says.

"But why?" Cecil asks, unable to wrap his head around the fact that the woman he loves is leaving him for you.

"I've fallen for him." You/Rosa replies as the two of you leave, leaving Cecil and Kain in shock. When you get outside, you meet up with your other girls and you/Rydia. You've taken direct control of all of them except for Larxene, Yuffie, and of course, Diva/Aerith.

“Welcome to the family, Rosa.” Yuffie says, being the first one to greet her new sister.

“Uh thanks for such a warm welcome.” You/Rosa replies shyly. You then exit the game, only to return to that world moment later at a different area. “Huh where are we now?” You/Rosa asks, although you already know.
1211111111111111.title: Thus we go with Plan A...

choices: A group of monsters show up
12111111111111111.content:
You turn back to you/Rosa, and reply with a smile “We are in Mist, Rosa, but more specifically-” Suddenly you hear an explosion.

“Anthony! What was that?” Larxene asks as she looks around in shock while Bombs are going all over the place.

"That would be a Bomb Ring going off." You reply. "We have to hurry! If we don't do this now, it will be difficult to get it done." You rush off to try to find the younger Rydia. You/Rydia uses the Chocobo summon, calling one Chocobo for each person in the group.

“You look all around, until you see a familiar little girl with green hair sitting beside a woman who wasn't moving, the little girl who is the younger version of Rydia is crying while shaking the woman. The woman is her mother, who was accidentally slain by Cecil and Kain because of how they killed the Mist Dragon, which caused Rydia's mother to die as well.

You notice several Bombs floating in her direction, and also see Cecil and Kain at the entrance of the town, but they can't see you yet. You slash the Bombs with your swords, then hit them with a blizard spell to finish them off before they can use their signiture 'Self-destruct' on you, which won't hurt you as much, but would allow them to pass you and get to Rydia. You finish fighting the Bombs, and then run towards Rydia. You quickly split off a piece of yourself, and have it possess her instantly. She spasms and slumps as you take control. You have her stand up.

“Are you ok?" You ask you/young Rydia, although you already know the answer.

"Yeah, thanks for that." You/Young Rydia says. "We should probably get going before anyone shows up." You nod.

Suddenly
12111111111111111.title: Saving Rydia...

121111111111111111.content:
You turn around to see several monsters approaching you. You/Young Rydia stands back as the monsters continue to approach. As you turn to face them, you see that they were that of several Bomb monsters. You grip your fist and then draw out your swords. The Bombs approach you, and then begin to shoot fire at you, while some try to close in to perform their signature attack "Self-Destruct."

Soon you are batting the Bombs away like baseballs. You then turn from defensive to offensive, and begin to destroy the bombs left and right before they get the chance to self-destruct. You think that you have gotten them all, when suddenly, out of some rubble, a Bomb shoots out and attaches itself to your back. It laughs manically as it begins to self-destruct as you try to get it off. You smash it into a busted up building, but it doesn't work. You try and cut it off, but it doesn't work either, and you can now see more monsters coming, this time in greater numbers. You then remember you can turn to liquid, and you instantly transform, but as you do, the Bomb detonates, sending pieces of you all over, leaving you scattered along the village. You hastily try and return to being whole, but while this is happening, one of the monsters prepares to attack you/young Rydia.

You reform just in time to tackle the monster. The monster tries to blow up on you like the last one did, but you manage to destroy the monster before it can come to that. The monsters keep coming, and you're not sure you can keep this up.

"Hold on!" You/Yuna shouts as she has Valefor dive bomb towards them, as she does, one monster looks up and watches in horror as Valefor crushes it. You/Yuna then rushes over to your side

"Good timing." You say, as all of the girls join up with you. You/Aerith casts Holy, Diva/Aerith lets out an electric shock, you/Tifa uses a limit break that you had her saving, Yuffie is throwing Shuriken after Shuriken at the monsters, you/Lulu uses her overdrive to multicast a single spell several times over, you/Yuna continues attacking with Valefor, you/Naminé uses the Keyblade, which you have awoken her ability to use, Larxene is constantly slashing at monsters, you/Rosa is firing arrow after arrow at the Bombs, you/Rydia is using Shiva on the Bombs, and you/young Rydia is casting Blizzard at the Bombs. Eventually, the Bombs are destroyed, and you've managed to evade the sight of Cecil and Kain. Diva/Aerith passes out right after the battle, and you catch her.

"She must have worn herself out." You say with a sigh. "I guess I'll just possess her right now, that way she can rest while also giving me a better body to use. After all I think that's far right? Oh well all I want to do is get some rest, I've done a lot today, and I'm tired." You yawn, and everyone returns to the room after you enter Diva/Aerith's body. You lie down on your bed, and then fall asleep leaving everyone else to do their own thing. When someone comes home, the rest can hide you and themselves, while having a part of you leave their body to keep anyone from wondering where you are.
121111111111111111.title: Burn baby burn...

choices: Meanwhile, with the piece of you heading to possess Katherine.
The four other girls you possessed arrive.
1211111111111111111.content:
As you awaken the next day you find you/Naminé and you/Yuna beside you, sleeping peacefully. You leave Diva/Aerith's body and you smile as you brush your hand through Naminé's blond hair, and smile then turn over to the still sleeping you/Yuna and Diva/Aerith, and then give them a small peck on their cheeks, and you can swear they blush, and then you carefully get out of bed, and then exit the room, being extra careful not to make a sound. You shut the door, and then suddenly a voice spooks you forcing you to jump a 180 degrees.

"Morning Honey..." Calls the voice of Yuffie as you nearly have a heart attack. Yuffie chuckles a bit and almost burst out in laughter when you tell her to keep her mouth shut as her laughing would wake up the others. Yuffie smiles and does the whole fake zipper across her lips and says her lips are sealed breaking the whole quiet thing. Mia and Anna walk by, and you have a look of shock as they don't react to seeing Yuffie.

"What's wrong, brother?" Zoey asks as she walks up behind you, having a grin on her face, looking like she was saying some sort of joke.

"How come-" You begin, Sarah, who walks up as well, cuts you off.

"How come we aren't surprised?" She asks. "Pay attention to the mind connection thing, we're all you, including mom, who has gone to work, and Megan, who has come down for a while as her mother is on a trip, and their grandparents can't watch all three." You/Sarah replies.

"Wait, but why did I, we, whatever, possess them all?" You ask.

"Because," You/Zoey begins. "we didn't want them to freak out, so we've decided to possess them for now, until we decide what to do with them."

"Except for me, I'm staying possessed, since I would give you so much trouble otherwise." You/Sarah says, acting like she actually is Sarah.

"That's not all." You/Megan says, also coming up. "We've also possessed Jill, Brianna, Rose, and Amy."

"Why?" You ask.

"Because," You/Anna begins "We learned from my memories that Rose has a crush on you, and once we possessed her, we learned that Jill and Brianna do as well."

"Yeah." You/Mia says. "Although we've left the three of them in control, just not minding you possessing them, and allowing it with no trouble at all at any time."

"What about Amy?" You ask.

"She came by, all your possessed bodies, and was going to freak out and make a scene, so you possessed her." Andy says, coming up.

"Andy? What's with you? Why aren't you freaking out?" You ask. Andy shrugs.

"I have no problem with you possessing the fictional girls, and I understand why you possessed the real ones," He replies.

"Good to have someone on my side without them being possessed, or having their mind altered in some way." You say.

"By the way," You/Anna says. "The four girls we mentioned before are coming over soon." You shrug and then walk downstairs to find you/Rosa, who is reading a book, a book in the Inheritance Cycle, your favorite book series (Note from Starfighter364, I added this because Anthony in Rosa's body reading a history book, and being amazed by the past of Anthony's world wouldn't make much sense. I don't know if Necroalex knows the series).

"What'cha doing Rosa?" Yuffie asks startling you/Rosa.

"Oh, Yuffie, you scared me for a moment there." You/Rosa replies and then took a breath. "I'm reading about this wonderful series since Anthony loves it so much." She explains, pretending to be the real Rosa. You head towards the kitchen door as Yuffie begins to ask you/Rosa various question both about Rosa's and this world. You smile seeing that they are getting along, and then walk into the kitchen to find something that makes you blush, you/Tifa in nothing but a black bra and matching panties. She seems to not notice you and continues to hum a tune similar, if not identical, to the chocobo song from her game. You slowly walk back out of the kitchen and head for the den to find you/Lulu searching around on the internet with your computer.

"Oh good morning Anthony." You/Lulu says, turning around in the computer chair. "How'd you sleep? Well, I hope."

"Oh I did Lulu, but how about you girls, how'd you all do after I fell asleep." You ask. You can find out from checking memories, but you feel like doing it this way.

You/Lulu smiled slightly and chuckles a bit, but then she replies "After you fell asleep, Naminé and Yuna went to bed right after, since they felt like sleeping in your bed. Tifa, Rosa and Yuffie all decided to look around the house and even played a little dress up *chuckle* I can't believe some of the things your sister Sarah wears. Such strange outfits and odd jewelry. Rydia, young Rydia, Aerith, and Larxene went and had pieces of you possess Anna, Zoey, Mia, and your mother respectively. I looked through the computer in order to read some stories on the internet. When Megan came, Anna had a piece of you possess her as well. Another piece of you is heading to possess Katherine. Your father didn't come home as he left for his assignment while you were at school yesterday.

You sit down at the dining room table, and then begin to ponder various ideas in your head, such as 'what do I do next? Should I stick with who I have for right now?'
1211111111111111111.title: Next day, new challenges

1211112.content:
You wake up the next morning to find Lulu giving you a gentle shake. You groan, having just slept on the most uncomfortable bed you've ever slept on, and look at Lulu with exhausted eyes.

“Didn’t sleep well?” Lulu asks with a small stifled chuckle. You groan and look away as you stand up, wiping off your dress on impulse. You walk towards a sink and look into a mirror to see that you had a rather bad case of bed head.

‘Ugh how do women stand having long hair?’ You groan inaudibly to anybody’s ears but your own. Lulu walks up behind you and looks at you in the mirror. You haven’t really taken control of her yet; you really had no reason too, well not at this point at least. Besides if you did you’d probably just let her run on autopilot right now anyway until you'd feel you could work two bodies without drawing suspicion to yourself.

“…Looks like you’ve got a bit of bed head, shall I brush it for you?” Lulu asks as you turn away form your thoughts.

“Huh? Sorry, I wasn’t listening...” You reply, still rather tired. Lulu sighs and raises her hands in the air as she shakes her head.

“Yuna, you need to be more aware of when people are talking, how else will you become a great summoner otherwise?” Lulu explains in a bit of a scolding manner.

“…” You frown and are about to apologize but Lulu stops you.

“But...I suppose, it’s alright, just this once. Now how about we fix that hair of yours?” Lulu asks sincerely. You rub your eyes and nod, taking a seat on the bed from last night. Lulu grabs a comb from a nearby shelf and soon begins brushing your hair. At first it is weird having someone brush your hair for you but you quickly get used to it, and after a few minutes, your hair now looks how it is supposed to. Lulu pulls the comb away one last time and smiles.

"There, much better." Lulu says as she turns away to put the comb away. You look into the mirror from before and smile, you do look a lot better, granted your eyes still seemed exhausted, but you figure you'll take a nap on the boat to Kilika. Lulu soon returns to you, and asks you if you are ready to go yet. You nod and walk with Lulu to join the rest of group up on the pass by the save sphere.

...

A few minutes later, you arrive at the boat to Kilika, having seen Tidus receive his Brotherhood sword from Wakka, as well as his fight with Kimahri. You even preformed your first summoning which made you rather proud of yourself.

“Heh heh!” You chuckle to yourself as you near the boardwalk, recalling the memory. It felt awesome, and you puffed your chest out a bit in triumph when you ordered Valefor to strike the killing blow. Tidus even complimented you which made Yuna’s body blush in response. You yourself didn’t blush but regardless you felt awesome as you strut your stuff down the boardwalk and onto the ship.

After a few more minutes you and the rest of the gang set off, you smile as you walk to the edge of the deck, leaning on the guardrail as you feel the salty air push up against your cheeks. It feels nice, yet, at the same time, it stings a little. You don’t mind, when suddenly, you notice something behind you. You turn around to see several various people, women and children, sailors, ext. all standing before you. They seem to be asking you various questions and also seem to be expecting you to answer them.

“Umm…well I guess…umm” You don’t know what to say, so you decide to let Yuna take over, just like before in the temple of Besaid.

‘I’ll…do my best…for you, Anthony.’ Yuna thoughts reply to you in her usual soft tone. You smile and nod in the midst of switching places as Yuna takes over

…

Several minutes pass, and soon the crowd around you disbands, leaving Yuna, and in turn you, alone. Yuna smiles, and readies herself so you can regain control, when Tidus suddenly walks up to you. You decide to let Yuna proceed as she normally would as Tidus climbs the stairs up to her, stretching his arms and giving a small yawn.

Tidus leans on the guardrail and looks out to the sea. Yuna tries to think of something to say, when you tell her to say that the weather is nice. Yuna nods, and speaks those exact words, albeit a bit slower.

“The weather…it’s nice.” Yuna says. Tidus nods in response, and Yuna smiles. The two then begin to laugh a bit, possibly due to finally having broken the ice together. Yuna then inquires about Tidus being a blitzball player, and it goes off from there. You kinda zone out in the midst of this, and when you finally do return from wherever the hell you went when you zoned out, Tidus is about to walk away, when suddenly, the ship suddenly shakes violently. Yuna slips and ends up falling, but luckily, Tidus grabs her before she, and in turn you, fall off the ship. Tidus pulls Yuna up, and you take control. You grip the rail and watch as huge waves almost capsize the boat as the boat continues to rock and shake.

Suddenly, the ship shakes once more, this time causing you to fall forward, causing Tidus to lose his grip. You roll forward and slam into the harpoon gun that, in a moment, will be used in a fruitless attempt to steer Sin away from Kilika village. Kimahri sees you hit the harpoon gun and jumps to your side. You look at the blue Ronso and nod, saying you are okay. Your attention then turns to see a huge dorsal fin erupt from the water.

“SIN!” Screams a random passenger behind you, causing you to jump. You watch as Sin moves along side the boat, seeing first hand how monumentally big Sin is.

“I-incredible…” You mutter to yourself in fearful awe. A crippling fear begins to over take you as Sin makes it to the front of the boat. You are only broken out of your trance of fear when Kimahri grabs you and pulls you back as the random crewmember from before runs before you and grabs the Harpoon gun.

You watch as the harpoon shoots out and nails Sin right in the dorsal fin causing it to begin pulling the boat. And here you thought the trip to Kilika would be smooth sailing. It would make you laugh a little if you didn’t know you were about to fight a giant celestial being of mass destruction!
1211112.title: A 'peaceful' trip to Kilika

12111121.content:
Soon scales begin to fly toward you, you to ready your weapon and, in a moment of just pure instinct, you grip your staff like a baseball bat and jump on the guardrail. You hear someone, probably Tidus or Wakka, ask just what you were doing as you wind up and swing causing the sin scale you hit to go flying back at Sin! You smirk as a feeling of power replaced your earlier feelings of fear as you jump backwards; Kimahri easily catches you and helps you ready yourself as everyone watches you in awe.

A gleeful smirk quickly grows on Tidus face as he readies to repeat the same action as a sin spawn comes barreling at him… only for it to land on deck, resulting in Tidus just whacking it in the face! You chuckle as Tidus backs away from the now enraged sin spawn foot trooper, Tidus groans, now embarrassed that he screwed up in front of you, as he gets into his normal battle stance, raising his sword before him. Kimahri takes a step in front of you, standing ready to protect you as he twirls his lance before letting out a loud bestial roar causing you, Kimahri, and Tidus to charge forward!

You grip your fist and twirl your staff in your hands just as the first Sin spawn runs toward you, Tidus was about to strike it when you smack it with your staff and deliver a rather weak punch that results in your hand getting a bit scratched up.

“Ow” you cry backing away, your hand bleeding a bit due to the enemy’s scaly, armor-like skin “I think I just broke my finger!” However while you were momentarily stunned from tending to your injury the sin scale shot forward and, just as it was about to hit you with it’s wings, Kimahri stepped in and impaled the thing through one of it’s three violet colored eyes causing it to fade into pyre-flies.

“Thank you, Kimahri” you say with gratitude, Kimahri nods and holds out his hand to you. You nod and hold out your own as Kimahri drops a potion into your hand. You look up at Kimahri and he nods before jumping into the air, probably to use his Jump command on another sin scale.

You look at the potion in your hand; it was a small corked bottle with a strange green liquid inside of it. You bite the cork and it opens with a pop.
