"How did you DO that?" He asked in disbelief, before his eyes went wide. "I was kissed by another guy!"

"Oh... I dunno how to explain, it's a long story, and I'm a girl right now, so there's no problem, and it was funny to see your reaction." You answered.

"Point taken." He replied to what you said about being a girl at the moment.

"Say, want to go to the Pokemon World?" You asked. He was getting more worked up.

"YOU can DO that?" He asked.

"Sure, how do you think I got this body?" You asked, taking him by the arm. You grabbed your Nintendo DS, and then you sent both of you in. Two Dawns in Pokemon. Sweeeeeeeeet...

Now, you were all in the car. Michael in the middle back seat, Jenny in the drivers seat, Joy beside her, and both Dawns on either side of Michael, the main you being on the right side. All the girls (You as them), with the exception of Jenny, who was still driving and had to keep her eyes on the road, turned around and said "Hi Michael!!!" Directly afterwards, both Dawn bodies kissed him on the cheeks at the same time, just to mess with him again. He blushed. Jenny laughed.

"So, Anthony... let me get this straight, we are in the Pokemon World, and you are controlling Dawn? One of them?" Michael asked.

"Not one Michael." You replied with your first Dawn body.

"I'm controlling all four bodies!" You continued with your Jenny body.

"And its gonna get better!" You continued as Joy.

"You wanna be Misty?" You asked with your second Dawn body.

Well, from this Michael was stunned. Being Misty? WOW.

Wait a second, what was his response?
152222222122.title: Please wait, returning to Real Life...

choices: Stay here... there must be something else to do!
1522222221221.content:
From this point, until otherwise stated, a character will be reffered to by what body they're in, except for the fact of the main body.

Michael, quite simply, could not resist. "Yes please!!!" He screamed.

Jenny headed straight for Misty's Gym, not too far away by this point. The conversation there though, was rather interesting.

"So... Anthony, wait, what should I call you?" Michael asked.

"Just call the characters by their real names, with the exception of the main body, which I'll be keeping as such for now..." Dawn replied.

"Might make it kind of easier..." Joy replied.

"Yup!" Jenny replied. (Far out! Driving while controlling four people was hard!)

"Which one would that be?" Michael asked.

"That would be me." You replied.

"Well, I can't call you Anthony like that, can I Ton-" He began teasingly, before he was interrupted by you as you glared at him.

"Call me Toni, and I won't let you possess anyone." You said. The only thing that annoyed you more than being called Tony, or Toni in this case, is how Brianna kept calling you Nathan. "Just call me Anne, in case you begin to slip up and come close to saying Anthony." Michael nodded, then turned to Joy.

"So... Joy... can I have sex with you?" He asked.

"Over my flaming dead body... This body is too perfect..." Joy replied.

"Oh... Jenny?" Michael asked.

"Nope." Jenny replied.

"Okay... Dawn? What about you?" He wasn't foolish enough to ask your main body with how you were feeling.

"I'm not having sex with any male aside from my original body." Dawn replied. "I can let you do a good bit if I put this body on autopilot, but no sex!"

"I'm good with that, I guess, I'll have my own female body soon." Michael said.

You cut off the connection with Dawn and put her on autopilot. She then took off her seat belt and started making out with Michael in the backseat. When your group finally reached Cerulean City, you had Dawn stop, then re-opened the connection, and she calmly sat back down.

"We're here! Ready for it Michael?" Jenny asked.

"Last question... can I be her in real life?" Michael asked.

"Yea, but you cant change back without my help." Joy stated.

"Or mine!" Dawn replied.

"Don't forget me!" Jenny replied.

"You know, it was kind of a silly question since you saw me in this body in the real world." You stated, causing him to sweat drop.

With all the girls walking into the gym, Michael trailed on behind, slightly afraid actually. Jenny approached Misty, who was sitting on the edge of the pool.

"Misty! You're under arrest for not being possessed!" Jenny said.

"Huh? Posse-...? Wha-?" Misty began, totally confused, but Joy, Dawn, and Jenny manhandled her and brought her over to Michael.

"Your punishment is to be possessed!" Jenny stated.

You walked over to Michael, took his hand, turned him into liquid, and then placed him on Misty's hand. Within seconds, Michael had slithered over her hand, her arm, and into her mou-... Nope, he started going down, straight into the vagina! After about a minute of an unconsciousness for Misty, she woke with a start, but Michael was in control.

"Anthony...? Is that you? Oh my gosh... its not a dream! I'm Misty!!!" Michael said in shock and joy. Michael stood up, Jenny and Joy letting go. Michael looked herself over. "Dangit! These breasts are flatter than I thought!" You placed your hand on Michael's new breasts, stirred up the liquid form, and made it cause the breasts to expand, luckily Misty had been wearing a stretchable swim suit when she was possessed. "Wow! That feels weird! Could you make me a DD Cup?!" You enlarged the breasts to a DD cup, and let go.

"What do you say about you two getting back to real life?" Jenny asked.

You had a choice. Return to real life again with Michael (As Misty), with your other bodies finding more girls to add, or stay here and do something else!
1522222221221.title: Michael loves Misty! A lot!

15222222212212.content:
"Staying here sounds good. We could go all over the place! Problem is transport... I think that by the end of this, a small car isn't exactly going to be... well, big enough." Michael said with Misty's voice.

"Well, I suppose we could wait for a passing bus to come..." Dawn said.

"Oh yes, and how many of them have you seen in the Pokemon games." Michael retorted.

"Well, true." Nurse Joy said.

"Well, first and foremost, I think that Nurse Joy is wearing way too many clothes. We should get her to find sometime a little more plain, white and pink and stuff, but more plain." Officer Jenny said.

"The Pokemon Center should have a few things." You replied.

"Alright, here's the plan then, Anne can go back, get Amy, and bring her in (How fun!!). Nurse Joy can get some plainer clothes, maybe something like a wilderness uniform or something that the nurses wear when travelling to sick Pokemon out of the city. Officer Jenny, Dawn, and I can go looking for a bus." Michael suggested. "If we're lucky, we might even find a Pokemon that can use Secret Power and hey, who knows? We could rival Team Rocket in size by building our own underground base!"

"Sounds like a good plan to me." Officer Jenny replied.

"That counts for the rest of us!" You, Dawn, and Nurse Joy said. So the plan was carried out. Nurse Joy went to the Pokemon Center, said hi to the other nurse, and proceeded behind desk to find a wilderness outfit that was still white and pink, but didn't flow outwards so much to make it hard to sometimes fit through doors. She then went back to wait outside the Gym for the other girls.

You left the game and brought Amy back in (after packing up the meal she made). You gave her a little more freedom over herself (enough so that she can function for herself), and slightly less die hard for you, otherwise it would probably cause problems. You and Amy then went back to the gym to wait for the bus.

Michael, Jenny, and Dawn went looking around town for a bus. Unfortunately, it wasn't as if there were any places that just happened to sell them. Eventually, they found a person working on a grey bus that looked fine.

"Hello there! I was wondering if you could help us please?" Officer Jenny asked.

"Oh, hello Officer. What's up?" The young woman asked, getting her head out of the bus's engine. The girl had dark brown hair, green eyes and was wearing a grey worker uniform.

"This bus here, is it fit to use yet?" Michael asked.

The young woman slammed the bus bonnet down. "It is now" She replied casually. "Did ya need it for something, or what?" Dawn looked first at Officer Jenny, then at Michael; they both gave a slight, yet evil smile.

"Oh yes, we do need it, and you're going to give it to us..." Michael said. When the young woman gaped a bit, Dawn took this chance to spit a bit of herself onto the woman. Dangit! You missed! But never mind. The woman suddenly let out a yell and jumped back, but it was too late, your goo had spread out all over her body, covering her from head to toe, then it forced it's way into her mouth until it was all the way down. The woman almost fainted, but Michael caught her, and you, now fully in control of the woman, had control.

"So, what's her name?" Dawn asked. You went through the memory of the woman, and found that she was Abigail Teresa, and she owned a small house in Cerulean City, fixing vehicles for people. The keys for the bus were in her pocket so you unlocked the bus and let everyone inside. Then you had her get in as well.

"So, the bus is ours! Awesome!" Michael said, sitting down on one of the seats, Dawn and Abigail sitting down as well, and Officer Jenny taking the driver's seat. You started up the bus, pulled out, and headed for the gym. Luckily, it was full on gas so you wouldn't need to worry about filling up anytime soon. When the bus arrived at the gym, Abigail opened the door and let you, who by this time had bought and put on a a pink headband and a pink, skintight bodysuit that was high heeled (which you learned how to walk in by accessing the memories of your female bodies), along with having your hair in a ponytail, on, as well as Nurse Joy and Amy, the only girl in this band of people who wasn't either being possessed, or possessing someone (even though she is under your control) on the bus.

"So, what are we going to do now?" Michael asked. "I'm feeling optimistic about this whole base thing."

"I'm all for it. We're going to need someone to build it though. Got any Pokemon that can use Secret Power, Dawn?" Abigail asked.

"Ummm... I got a Pidgeot in the computer with it..." Dawn replied.

"Lucky I got it out for you then!" Nurse Joy replied, holding up a Poke Ball and tossing it to Dawn who caught the ball in her hands.

"You realize that I've got all of my Pokemon with me too." You said, pulling a large bag seemingly out of nowhere (Note from Starfighter364: This is a joke based on how in RPG's, including Pokemon, you can store several large objects in a small backpack or pockets) and opened it up, revealing dozens of Poke Balls, all marked in some way to tell which Pokemon was in which Poke Ball.

"Any ideas on what else we could do?" Michael asked.
15222222212212.title: Anyone selling a bus?

choices: Michael wants Dawn to do it
152222222122121.content:
A time went by with no one suggesting anything, then Michael said "Secret base now!"

"Alright. Any ideas on where? I think Mt. Moon might be nice... Kinda out of the way..." You suggested.

"Right, except for the Pokemon." Nurse Joy responded.

"Meh. We'll 'relocate' them if they're in the way." Officer Jenny replied.

So, she drove the bus right up to Mt. Moon. Defying the laws of physics by driving up and over small cliffs (In the game remember, when you get out of Mt. Moon, it's a one way trip down to Cerulean until you get the HM 'Fly').

By the time you arrived at the entrance to the tunnel leading through, underneath, the bus was at least a little dented underneath from the ride. You and everyone else tumbled out. Jenny locked the bus and you all proceeded into the cave.

After walking for a short while, thankful for Jenny and Joy's torches, you finally arrived at a dead end. Which, in this case, was good, because it meant that it was unlikely for anyone to discover your base's location.

"Alright... Misty... You want me to make the base, or do you have some ideas?" Dawn asked.

"Ummm..." Michael began thinking.
152222222122121.title: Make the secret base now!

1522222221221212.content:
"You can do it if you want!" Michael said.

Laughing a bit at Michael, Dawn went up to the cavern wall. Dawn let her Pidgeot out and it flapped around unhappily at being stuck in such a small damp place.

"Pidgeot! Use Secret Power on this rock wall and make us a nice, smooth, large, rectangular shaped tunnel!" Dawn said to her Pidgeot. It settled down then started flapping it's wings madly at the wall, suddenly great beams of light shot out from them and enveloped the walls, when the Pidgeot stopped triumphantly, there was a nice corridor extending down the cave.

Dawn proceeded to continue making the entire complex. The small tunnel was enlarged to be more of a large garage that could hold about six vehicles and had a loading zone. (Remember that everything right now was just rock. You would later cover it over with concrete and steel) Dawn had Pidgeot create many more smaller rooms and passages based on three levels. The upper most had a window looking out into the shed. All in all, it was pretty impressive.

After being satisfied with the outcome, you went back to town alone. The others stayed in the large cavern/garage thing for you. Upon arriving at Cerulean, you found exactly what you needed, a large builders shop. Making a small piece of yourself come out, then expand and split into multiple pieces, you slowly took control of all the girls working there, including the very nice Asian Secretary at the front desk. Rather than being in them and suddenly coming to terms with A LOT more girls, you messed with their minds and gave them EXPLCIT instructions to do whatever you told them, without having any ability to say no. (So if you wanted, you could make them beat each other up, and mate, they would be vicious!)

You walked up to the reception desk, and talked to the receptionist.

"Hello there! I'd like to request a construction over at Mt. Moon please?" You requested.

The young woman there smiled and answered "Certainly, what resources do you require?"

"Steel, concrete, plumbing... the lot. Oh, and make sure that only girls work on it. Ha ha." You replied. The receptionist laughed and made the arrangements. Within half-an-hour, all the woman in the company were driving up towards Mount Moon with everything they needed. Concrete, steel pipes, wires... you name it.

Showing them to the new cavern, they immediately set to work. After two hours, they had already fully completed the large garage. (Being under your power, they worked at full capacity, without breaks, etc) Moving onto the corridors, they finished them as well quickly. Everyone was impressed by their speed. After about four hours, they were half done, and after another four they were done, and had packed everything up.

The underground complex had a large door covered with rock that was three inches thick. No one could get through there easily. The door opened to the garage, and that was fully done up with lights. In your 'control' room, you had state of the art equipment, all designed to show where everything in the world was, for tracking things, security cameras, everything. You and the gang wandered from room to room, admiring the place.

"They've done a real good job, on this." Michael said, liking her new quarters which opened up to a large pool area. Everyone else had nice rooms with adjacent things that they would find useful. Nurse Joy had a large clinic like place that was probably better equipped than most Pokemon Centers.

"So, how do you like it Misty? You asked, eventually turning to her.

"I love it so much! This is even better than home!" She laughed.

You now have a couple of options.

1. You can redo the minds of a load of girls (Preferably either good looking ones or intelligent ones) and make them 'run' the base for you.

2. Get some cool looking vehicles for the base. (Then get some workers later)

3. Separate a part of yourself, and a part of Michael, and go to town on your girls.
1522222221221212.title: It's my base now!

15222222212212121.content:
"Well Jenny, what do you think?" You have your Dawn body ask your Jenny body as they walk down the illuminated corridors of your new secret HQ; it is a new day, and you have your main body keeping Michael-in-Misty company at her new pad, and you have Joy tidying up her clinic, so you are keeping yourself entertained with a faux conversation between your Dawn and Jenny bodies, debating on whether or not to take over a multitude of women and have run the base with them, or get some sweet new rides, then take over some workers. Of course, you used two of your puppets to do it, arguing with yourself on which would be the best course of action. Of course, more hosts won out in your mind, and you began arguing with yourself about who to capture.

"I say we take over some gym leaders." You have Dawn argue. "They will be great if we ever need fighting force."

"Maybe." Your Jenny body concedes as you both round a corner. "But with more workers, we can have them run the base for us while we look for the gym leaders, and besides, we've already wormed ourselves into those worker girls who were so kind as to make us this base."

"Hmmmmmm..." You put a contemplative look on Dawn's face before saying "I guess you're right, but we should probably take it slow, we don't want to shock ourselves too much." Even as you say this, you are slowly taking control of the ladies you had previously hired to build your base, new perspectives swimming into your mind with each few seconds. First, it's a hot Asian secretary, then it's the builders, and within a minute, every female body and mind within the building belongs to a collective intelligence: you. You pile them onto Abigail's large bus and begin the two-hour long road trip up to Mt. Moon.

Meanwhile, your Dawn and Jenny bodies have left Mt. Moon, and you have Dawn send out Pidgeot. You have both bodies laugh when notice that Anna, who is in the pool in Michael's room with her, has splashed Michael and dived under the water to avoid Michael's wrath once he's recovered. After some time of flying through the air as Dawn and Jenny on Pidgeot's back in a random direction for the fun of it since you are contemplating who to get, you finally decide on a target...

"Where should we fly to?" Dawn asks, glancing at Jenny.

"How about... Celadon City?" You suggest through your policewoman body. "I think Erika would be more than happy to become part of us."

"Sounds good. Pidgeot, to Celadon City!" You say energetically, pointing a finger in a random direction, since you have no idea where the heck Celadon City is. The bird Pokémon caws an affirmative, altering its course to follow your command.

-------------------

Within ten minutes of soaring on the new route, Pidgeot begins to slow, gradually descending towards the city. When you're close enough to the ground, you hop your two bodies off of its back, wincing as Jenny's high heels smash into the ground. You open the Poké Ball, and the Pokémon returns to its Poké Ball in a beam of red energy.

"Now, let's get us a gym leader!" You say happily from within Dawn as you shrink the ball and put it in her pack, and are just about to go walking around when you stop yourself with Jenny, placing a gloved hand on Dawn's shoulder.

"Hold on, why don't we split up? I'll get the local Jenny and Joy, and you can get Erika." You both look to your right; you have landed in front of the Pokémon Center, which you note looks much more like its anime counterpart than you expected.

"Good idea." Your Dawn body says. "You go get Nurse Joy and the other Officer Jenny, and I'll get Erika and the trainers from her gym." You nod Jenny's head in agreement, and your bodies head their separate ways.

As Jenny, you walk into the Pokémon Center, and watch the people walk around before strolling up to the counter, where the city's Nurse Joy is standing dutifully at the counter, staring absentmindedly into space until she notices your Jenny body.

"Oh, Jenny!" She says, perking up slightly, thinking that this body is the one of this city's Officer Jenny. "It's nice to see you, but what's the occasion? I almost never see you during work hours." You shrug Officer Jenny's shoulders nonchalantly.

"It gets kinda boring in that office all day, you know," You have Jenny say, resting her hands on her hips and smiling. "I just had to get out for a few minutes; besides." Her smile widens, and you dig through her purse before bringing out a small, blue, squishy ball. "I tried this new candy, and it's so delicious that I knew you would love it." Nurse Joy takes the ball from your palm and looks at it curiously. "It may look kind of weird, but trust me, you've never tasted anything like it." You reassure her as she plays with it in her hand before looking up and giving you an appreciative smile.

"Well, that's certainly thoughtful of you, thanks!" With that, she pops it into her mouth.

Good news: You were in her mouth, not inside her like you'd be soon, but inside her nonetheless. Bad news: She keeps chewing that part of you, so you can't get down. She soon swallows, and you bolt down her throat. The pink-haired woman gives a shocked look as you go down her esophagus. She stares at your Jenny body with wide, panicked eyes.

"Wha-?" She never has the chance to finish, however, as the part of you in her body takes hold, and her body tenses, eyes rolling back into their sockets as her knees begin to buckle. Thankfully, you react fast enough to see her wobble, and hold her up with your gloved hands under her armpits. There's a moment of silence as her head falls forward, and then she comes to life as you take control of her nervous system, raising her head and smiling at you.

"Welcome back to the world of the living." You tease with Officer Jenny's mouth, releasing her from your hold and allowing your new body to stand. "How was the candy?" You smile gently through your new nurse recruit.

"Well, it was certainly like nothing I've ever tasted, thank you," You have your new mouthpiece reply, gratitude evident in her voice.

"It was nothing, really." You make Jenny shrug. "Just getting a new recruit for the gang."

"Well, it was awfully kind of you to draft me. I feel quite honored." You have Celadon City's Nurse Joy reply.

"There's still one more thing that you need to do before you can be fully accepted." You give yourself an inquiring look with your new nurse's eyes, although you already know since they both have the same mind. "Take these." You hand another two worms to your Celadon Joy puppet. "And give them to two other people. After that, you're in." Joy beams, clutching the goo in her hands.

"I'll make sure to give them to someone special." You nod Jenny's head, and exit the Pokémon Center to repeat the procedure with your policewoman's local counterpart as your nurse body resumes her pretense, assuming proper posture to play receptionist. Jenny's body has barely walked twenty paces when a woman strolls into the Pokémon Center. She has knee-length blonde hair and gray eyes, her left one covered by side-swept bangs. She was tall, about as tall as your Joy body, and her black high heels probably put her a good inch or two above your conquest's eye level. As she approaches the desk, you notice her outfit in closer detail:

She is wearing a black blouse, the top half of which is covered by a long, black jacket that contours to the curves of her waist before flaring out and ending below her knees, but has a V-neck so large that it reveals a bit of her cleavage. It is lined with black fur on its cuffs, collar and hemline, and has a tear-shaped zipper hanging just below her breasts. Her legs are covered by black, boot cut pants, and as you continue the facade of Nurse Joy as she walks up and begins making conversation with you, you can't shake the feeling that you've seen her before. As you mindlessly talk through the Celadon Nurse Joy, you wrack your mind for where you've seen this beautiful woman from.

It hits you like a Machamp's Focus Punch: how could you not have seen it?! It's Cynthia! As in, the Sinnoh champion! But why the heck is she in Kanto?! These thoughts, and many others, bolt through your head. However, it doesn't matter; you've got two worms, and she would be a more than perfect puppet.
15222222212212121.title: All Your Base (Workers) Are Belong To Me!

152222222122121211.content:
Note from Starfighter364: I just realized that nobody ever said which Nurse Joy and Officer Jenny it was that first got possessed. I'm going to have it be the Oreburgh ones.

You continue to talk to Cynthia through the Celadon Nurse Joy, all the while trying to figure out how to get her to take the "candy" and eat it somewhere where no one would see her pass out. As you think, you suddenly feel the Celadon Officer Jenny's body come under your control. Cynthia wraps up the conversation, and begins to walk away.

"Wait a minute, ma'am." You say through Celadon Joy. Cynthia turns to you.

"Yes? What is it?" She asks. You hold out Celadon Joy's hand that is holding the piece of yourself.

"It's not often we have such a famous visitor." You say. "Please take this, it's really good."

She enters the room she's been given, and sits on her bed, then she plops the piece of you into her mouth and begins chewing. Meanwhile, you feel Erika's body, as well as the bodies of every girl in her gym come under your control, however, you put the girls that aren't Erika on autopilot, intending to slowly assimilate their minds like you did the workers in order to avoid overloading yourself. You finally feel Cynthia come under your control as she swallows the piece of you. You're well on your way to your plans to get the female gym leaders and other girls who can help run your base, however, there is a problem that needs to be addressed, you can't have all of the girls go with you yet, as you have no way of getting them back where they are needed when they are needed. However, you have the perfect solution to your problem.

---

Back at your base at Mt. Moon, you get out of the pool in Michael's room and dry off, after explaining that you have something that you have to do. You wring the water out of your original Dawn body's hair, and go into the dressing room, where you change out of the bathing suit you are wearing on her body, and put the outfit you had on her body earlier back on. You have the Mewtwo belonging to your first Dawn body teleport to Saffron City, you have your second Dawn body, after picking up Oreburgh Jenny, fly on Pidgeot to Fuchsia City in order to get Janine and the female trainers in the gym.

---

Mewtwo teleports you to Saffron, and you head to the gym. You enter, and see that it is seemingly empty. You search through the gym using the warp panels that were your main reason for coming here, as they can be used for instant transportation if need be. You eventually come to the point that Sabrina usually waits at, and you find her there, which you are a little surprised at since everyone else seemed to be missing. She looks.

"So, you finally arrived, Anthony, is it?" She asks. Your eyes go wide.

"What?! How did you know?!" You ask her.

"I sometimes receive visions of the future." She says simply. "I saw you coming, and this entire conversation happening. I also know how this ends."

"So what are you going to do?" You ask, ready to fight if need be.

"Simple, the only thing I can do in this situation." She says with a sigh. "Go ahead and take my body." You do a double take.

"What?! Why are you just giving up?!" You ask.

"Because, thanks to you being here and not part of this world, you can make many different futures." She replies. "I've seen all of them, and in all of them, I either end up possessed or in the insane asylum due to telling people about this. I'd rather have my independance ended than spend my life in the insane asylum, so there's no point trying avoid it." She opens her mouth wide for you to enter, and just so she can't possibly pull anything sneaky, you get right up to her before having your liquid self enter her body.

---

Your Oreburgh Jenny and second Dawn bodys have just arrived in Fuchsia City. You have the Oreburgh Jenny body perform the same process that you did in Celadon, while as your second Dawn, you go into the Fuchsia gym. You see several girls who look like Janine, remember that they are disguised. You would simply go for them all normally, but you remember that one is actually a guy. You let out that body's Mewtwo, which you have put all the people in the gym into a trance. You have Mewtwo command the male to leave the gym, and forget that he was ever one of the gym trainers. You then have all of the girls in the gym line up and open their mouths to each receive a piece of your liquid self. You soon have them all, but use the same process as you did with the workers and Celadon gym trainers. Your second Dawn body meets up with your Oreburgh Jenny's body, who you have had complete her task by that time, and the two fly off to Mt. Moon, as you have your first Dawn body's Mewtwo teleport that body back to Mt. Moon.

---

Moon base, you have your worker bodies working on the warp panels to the places your bodies would need to be using the knowledge of how they work that you got from Sabrina, and afterwards, you place the corresponding ones at the places so that your bodies can warp back afterwards.

“I'm your new neighbor, Amy…. I just moved in next door, and my aunt wanted me to come by and say hi. Well here you go, hi.” Monotone enough, Amy really had no desire to be there either. Anthony, of course, made his introductions.

“Nice to meet you Amy.” Anthony said.

"So, is that Mortal Kombat vs DCU?" Amy asked.

“Sorry, I don’t normally talk to people who are normal. I saw through your window that you have a P...S...3.? I thought you might enjoy some company. That’s when my aunt forced me over here.” Amy’s voice was getting less monotone and more feminine, if Anthony didn’t know any better he would be infatuated with her.

“Won't you come in then? I've just started, so I’m not that far in yet." Anthony gloated to his new neighbor. Amy glided in; the bottom of her dress hid her feet. Normally when you enter a room for the first time there is a hesitation, but Amy had no hesitation. “I've only started off with Sonya, she was one of my favorites back in the day, but I'll pick someone else if you want.”

“So Sonya was the first Vessel for you then? Super!!!” Amy grinned, Anthony just booted up the system. By the time he realized what she said, it was too late. Amy grabbed hold of Anthony’s hand and soon they both were liquid forms being sucked into the screen.

Ouch, wow I didn’t realize that I was bigger than Sonya in most places.” Anthony/Kitana said as she felt her uniform now gripping her body. Then Sonya looked at Anthony/Kitana and smiled. “Yeah, you did a great job so far, I can’t wait to create my own drones.” Amy/Sonya said to Anthony/Kitana, who was shocked to see the former body of the woman he spent so much time building up.

1552322112111111.title: Punishment explanation

155232211211112.content:
You decided to leave Sailor Mercury's body and show her your world. Of course, you would be controlling her in such a way where she would not freak out or try to hurt you again. That would defeat the purpose.

'This is going to be interesting.' You thought, as you proceeded to exit her body. 'I could have my own Anime party in my room, with a little more practice.'

Unknown to you, your cousin Megan had been dropped off at your house, to live with your family for a while. They were originally all going to stay with your grandparents but your grandparents couldn't support more than two so Megan was elected. She was not happy, seeing her family being broken up, so soon after her dad's death. She let out a low sigh and immediately searched for the one person she could talk to... you.

GLUB! GLUB! GLUB! Your liquid form was quickly falling from Sailor Mercury's mouth, to the floor. You were half way out when a soft knock came to your door. Of course, you were unable to respond at the time.

'Oh, Crap!' You thought. 'Bad timing!'

Megan, not hearing any response, opened the door and walked inside, thinking you were preoccupied with a game and did not hear her. "Anthony?" She asked. "I need to talk to... (GASP!)"

She stopped dead in her tracks as she witnessed a heavy liquid falling from a teenage girl's mouth, a girl dressed like Sailor Mercury! She continued to watch, shocked, as the heavy liquid reformed and became you.

"Hello, Megan." You said, calmly. "What's up?"

"How... How did you..." Megan started to say, then fainted, falling to the floor.

You sighed, shaking your head then...
155232211211112.title: Megan discovers your power.

1552322112111122.content:
You walked over to Megan and kneelled down before carefully taking her into your arms. "I'm sorry you had to find out this way, Megan." You said, though she could not hear you. "I don't fully understand this power myself."

"Who is she?" Ami (Sailor Mercury's real first name) asked.

"My cousin, Megan." You replied, carrying her unconscious body to your bed. "She must have come by for a visit."

Then Ami looked around, slightly confused. "Where am I, exactly." She asked.

"Ah, you are in my world." You said, pulling your covers over Megan, to her shoulders. "I visited your world and thought you might be interested in seeing my world."

"I see." Ami said. she paused. "Thank you for the offer but my friends will be worried when I come up missing."

You smiled and pointed at the television. "Don't worry, they won't notice you are gone." You explained. "You see, in my world, you really do not exist." You then shrugged. "In retrospect, in your world, I don't really exist."

"A parallel world?" Ami asked, intrigued.

You chuckled. "Not quite." You said, hoping not to have to force her. "I'll explain more later."

Ami looked at you, then at the television. finally, she used her power and returned to her civilian form. "I can stay for a while, I suppose, as long as my friends are in no danger."

"Great. What would you like to do first?"
1552322112111122.title: Put her on your bed.

15523221121111221.content:
"Um... do you think it's alright to just leave your cousin here, alone?" asked Ami, concerned.

You smiled. "You have a kind heart, Ami." you told her. "She'll be fine, I'll have a talk with her when she wakes up."

Ami nodded, partially satisfied. "So, how do you intend to explain my presence here while I'm visiting?"

You had not thought of that, you just wanted to show Ami your world. It was a safe bet that people would see her as a mysterious friend and start asking questions. This would especially be true with Kat, who still had a huge crush on you. Then there was Megan, who decided to visit you at a bad time and saw you in mid transformation, if one could call it that. She was intelligent and knew how to keep a secret but you were concerned that she might want to visit an Anime world. You somehow knew that you could do this but you were concerned that you and she may become separated or she may end up getting hurt, or worse.

"Anthony?" asked Ami, pulling you from your thoughts.

"Yes, you will be a friend I had talked to online for a while, here on a surprise visit." you said, turning to her. "Megan came to visit and fainted for some reason. I put her in my bed to rest up."

"I guess that could work." replied Ami. "I am from Japan." she looked over at Megan as she began to stir. "Megan is starting to come around."

"I'll talk to her." you said, walking over to your bed. "If anything, to get our stories straight."

You pulled a chair from your desk then sat down by your bed, just as Megan opened her eyes. she looked around for a moment then spotted you and Ami." How did you do that, Anthony?" she asked, slowly sitting up. "Who is your friend?"

"This is Ami." you replied. "She is sailor Mercury from the Anime cartoon, Sailor Moon."

Megan's eyes widened, surprised. If you had told her this without her seeing your transformation, you knew that she would have thought you were crazy. She opened her mouth to speak but you quickly cut her off, knowing what her next question would be. "I really don't know how I got these powers, Megan." you told her. "I just know that I now have them."

You went on to explain what you had figured out through experimenting with your new power and what you had done with it so far. As you explained your new found power, Megan's eyes began to tear up with a touch of hope in her eyes as she pulled the covers off herself and sat up on the bed.

"If... If you were to go into one of these Anime worlds, could they effect this world?"

"I seriously doubt it." you replied to her tears. "Why do you ask?"

Megan began to sob a little louder. "My dad... he.... he.... (gulp/sob!).... he was murdered last week in Europe!"

You turned slightly pale, as did Ami, and you both bowed your heads slightly. "I'm sorry." you said.

"It must have been very hard to take." said Ami, tearing up. "I am very sorry."

She came down to Megan's level and offered her a hug, which she gratefully accepted, crying quietly on her shoulder while you contemplated how to help her.

"I... I take it that your mom is now doing the traveling." you said, trying to be gentle.

"She is." replied Megan, talking more than she usually did. "The family has been broken up. Jacinta and Hannah are living with my grandparents but they can only afford to take on two, I've been sent here to live while mom is away."

"I will help you unpack." you said, standing up. "The spare bedroom is still open." you turned to Ami. "Care to join us?"

Ami nodded. "I'd be happy to." she replied. "Come on, Megan, we can all talk while we get you unpacked."

Megan nodded, getting off the bed and followed as you led them out of your room.
15523221121111221.title: Ami is worried about Megan

155232211211112211.content:
The spare bedroom was just across the hall from Anthony's room so it it was no trouble entering without being noticed. Megan's luggage was resting along one wall. It surprised Anthony that Megan had so little as it all seemed to fit inside two large duffel bags.

"Is this all of your possessions?" asked Anthony.

Megan shook her head. "It's all I could carry." she replied softly. "The rest had to be left behind."

"I take it you were moved out of your house in a hurry." said Ami.

Megan nodded. "Mom packed them, just the bare essentials."

Unzipping the first duffel bag, Megan pulled out what Anthony guessed to be her most prized possession. He had expected it to be a doll or teddy bear but instead, it was a photograph of her father. Anthony and Ami teared up slightly, seeing her give the man in the picture a kiss and placed it onto the bare nightstand by what was to become her bed.

"Would you like me to unpack your clothes?" asked Ami, stepping forward. she grinned. "I don't think you want Anthony touching your unmentionables."

Anthony blushed slightly as Megan smiled slightly, the first smile since she woke up in Anthony's room. "That's fine." she said, pointing to second duffel bag. ""I like my undergarments in the top drawer, please."

Ami nodded and got to work as Anthony then peered into the first bag and found a small rag doll. "Is this your friend?" he asked, pulling it out.

Megan nodded and gently took it from him. "Her name is Lilly." she said. "Dad... took her with him when he.... traveled."

Seeing the tears flowing from her eyes again, Anthony pulled her into a gentle hug, which she accepted. It took a moment for her to regain her composure but she smiled upon breaking the hug. "Thank you, Anthony." she said.

"That's what family is for." replied Anthony with a smile.

The unpacking went smoothly after that and soon, Megan was settled in. "I must ask you not to tell anyone about what I able to do." said Anthony, firmly but kindly. "If word got out..."

Megan nodded. "I won't tell anyone." she promised.

After leaving Megan in her new room for the time being, Anthony and Ami walked towards the stairs to hear someone arguing behind a closed door. Anthony recognized the voice as Mary, his 21 year old sister, who was home on vacation from college. "If you think you can intimidate me like that, you are mistaken!" came her furious voice.

"Who is that?"asked Ami, curious "What's going on?"

Anthony shook his head, confused. "That's my sister, Mary, visiting from college." he replied. "I can't be sure but I believe someone has gotten under her skin, not an easy task, I might add."

"You want me of the case, show me you're not involved!" said Mary's angered voice before the sound of the receiver slamming down reached their ears. "It's not like Mary to be that upset with anyone." thought Anthony.

Just then, the door opened and Mary spotted toy and Ami before...
155232211211112211.title: Helping Megan unpack.

1552322112111122111.content:
Mary, who would have normally questioned Anthony about a strange girl in the house, slowly walked away without a word. There was a certain awkwardness in her step, as if she really did not want to be around anyone she did not know, which worried Anthony greatly. "I need to find out what's going on." he thought. "Ami, can you knock my sister out without hurting her?" he whispered.

Ami nodded and Anthony motioned for her to do so then watched as Ami walked up behind Mary and touched her shoulder in a particular way, causing her to sigh before crumbling to the floor with Ami softening her fall. "Just gently hold her there." said Anthony. "I'm going to have a quick look at her memories and see what's going on."

With that, Anthony transformed into his liquid state and entered Mary's mouth while Ami gently held it open. Mary, although unconscious, fought the sudden rush of liquid into her mouth but Anthony made his way in and possessed her. Opening her eyes, Mary stood up and turned to Ami. "We better get into Mary's room, the rest of the family will be returning home soon."

Amy nodded and followed Mary into her bedroom where she sat down onto the bed as Mary took a chair while, inside, Anthony searched her memories. What he found, however, sent a chill through his mind as the first impression he received from her memories was an overwhelming urge to end her own life. Fearful for his sister, Anthony resolved to discover why..

It was about a week ago when Mary was looking through a number of cold cases and found one her uncle Hank had been working on in Europe. It was a multiple murder case, involving an entire family. The bodies were discovered in a shallow grave on the grounds of of a factory, owned by a powerful industrialist, named Devlen Zeus. This made him the primary suspect as he was known to threaten people who got in his way.

As Anthony dug deeper into Mary's memories, he saw Mary investigating the case from her end on campus as Devlen Zeus owned a factory only a few miles away. At first, Anthony thought Mary to be foolish, taking on such a case alone until he discovered the murdered family was her best friend who had vanished with her family. Two days after starting her own investigation, she received word that uncle Hank was found murdered in his hotel room in Europe and his family was sent threatening notes, moving them to flee into hiding.

"This is insane." thought Anthony, inside Mary. "Whoever killed uncle Hank must be trying to warn Mary off. But why does she have this urge to commit suicide?"

The answer came to him with the next wave of Mary's memories. He saw through her eyes as a man attacked her in a park on campus and proceeded to strip her of her clothing. "You are way over your head, little girl." said her unknown attacker. "Consider this bit of fun a warning, get off the Zeus case."

Mary screamed, fighting the man but he only slapped or punched her viciously with each attempt to resist. The man had her completely naked within a minute and was pushing her legs apart when a number of hands grabbed his shoulder and pulled him off. A group of students had heard her screams and rushed to her aid, chasing the man off after a struggle. Only, these students were all in Mary's class and Anthony knew that Mary did not like anyone to see her naked, let alone looking helpless....

Having seen enough, Anthony retreated from Mary's body and returned to his solid state. As he did, he considered the option to keep a part of himself within Mary to keep an eye on her due to her desire to end her own life.

Does Anthony keep a part of himself within Mary?

155232222222222212.content:
Anthony, bored, sat down at his computer, twiddling his thumbs while he thought about which game he wanted to tackle that afternoon. He spun his chair around, and it hit the desk, causing a game case to fall out of the above rack which had stacks upon stacks of games (some of which were his sisters') on it.

The game case hit the floor and Anthony knelt down to pick it up. It was Dungeon Siege 2: Broken World.

"Aw yea." He smiled lightly. He hadn't played Dungeon Siege in a while, and he still had an unfinished game. Inserting the disk into the drive, the all too familiar menu screen appeared. Clicking on the 'continue' button, the game faded to the loading screen, and before long, his party was standing at the remains of the town of Amanlu, right outside the tavern.

Anthony wasnt much of a person for pets in the game, so his party consisted of his main character (male), Eva, Taar, Lothar and Finala. He moved to the inside of the tavern, to check if any worthwhile equipment was available when he suddenly started to feel a little lightheaded. Suddenly, everything blurred around him as the computer screen got brighter and brighter until his whole world was pure white. There was an explosion of colour, and then he found himself in an unfamiliar place.

Until he saw the sign above him.

Which was the sign for the Amanlu Tavern. His eyes went wide, or they would have, because he suddenly realized that he didn't have eyes. Or anything. He was a solid mass of blue liquid flat on the ground. He wasn't very big, about the size of an average foot. He didn't know why, but he was able to move. Sliding quietly along the grass and then walls, he moved into the tavern where he noticed his own party browsing an assortment of weapons, armour, shields and spells.

"This is werid." He thought. Suddenly, Eva grunted loudly in dissapointment and stormed outside. Finala rolled her eyes and looked at Taar, who went out to console Eva over the fact that the shop didn't exactly have what she wanted. Lothar continued to browse the goods, oblivious to what was happening behind him and trying out a broadsword which Anthony really didn't like the look of. Thankfully, Lothar put it back down as if on cue from Anthony.

Anthony slid back outside to see what was happening, Eva was sitting on a low wall with Taar beside her.

Eva: http://bp0.blogger.com/_XMMbo_EHbwA/R9mG...

"It's pathetic. We're trying to save the whole world from the Overmage, but we can't do it without proper equipment!" She said bitterly.

"These people have suffered much. Be thankful that they at least still have something to sell." Taar said sympathetically.

"Hmph." Eva said quietly. Anthony didn't know why, but Eva resembled Anthony's frustration at not being able to find the right gear in shops.

He slid up to Eva. Taar gave Eva a pat on the shoulder and walked back inside. Eva was by far the most attractive woman in the game, with a ponytail sticking out behind her and a large rack with some shapely hips as well as killer body. She was epic.

Curious as to how much more werid this game could get, Anthony wondered if he could get inside Eva. He slid up her leg, but she didn't even seem to notice him. Anthony headed straight for her mouth, right over her chest, yet she still acted as if he didn't exist, well, until he started sliding into her mouth and down her throat, then she spasmed. Suddenly, he blacked out, and when he awoke, he found that he had two arms, two legs, a head, and was lying face up on grass with his legs over a fence.

Wait, 'his' legs? He brought his legs down and sat up, looking over himself, noticing that, among other things, he had breasts, he found that he had actually POSSESSED Eva!

"Oh my gosh!" He cried out. His voice had changed as well. He stood up, well, 'she' stood up and climbed back over the fence. Taar came back out.

"You alright Eva?" She asked.

"What?" Anthony asked. 'Oh no! Uhh... What do I say?' She thought. "Uhh yea, just fine!" She said with a smile. Taar raised an eyebrow but went back inside the tavern. 'That was close'

Anthony, now in control of Eva, sat back down on the fence. 'I wonder if I can get back to the real world.' She thought. Suddenly, everything went bright and white, after the explosion of colour, Anthony found herself back in her own room at the computer. Except, there was a difference. She was still Eva. Not only that, but Eva's portrait in the game was grayed out and when she clicked on it, nothing happened. (Usually it would move the game camera to where they are)

Anthony stood up. She walked around the room, admiring Eva's poise and stunning good looks. But what now? Find out more about Eva, or go back into the game?
155232222222222212.title: Dungeon Siege 2: The chronicles of Anthony...

Anthony sat down on her bed, considering this unexpected situation. She was now officially in possession of one of his favourite characters from Dungeon Siege. Even though she was sure it couldn't get any stranger, she was curious as to see just what was possible. Lying down on her bed and looking up to the ceiling, she thought about what she knew about Eva, her past, what she wanted to do in the future, that sort of backstory infomation.

Suddenly, she found her vision fade to a blurry dark blue scene, with what looked like trees around him. Flashes of Eva's life appeared between the trees, they all showed different parts of Eva's life, when she was born, her sword practising, and various other things that looked unfamiliar. Anthony walked up to the image that showed Eva being born and touched it with his hand.

"Ha. Wouldn't it be hilarious if I was watching it happen..." He murmured. The image suddenly flashed, and there Anthony was, staring down at baby Eva herself in the picture! Anthony stood back and gasped. "So... This is her mind! Whoa!" He said. Anthony thought about what he could do to change things for her, to make some... 'improvements'. He walked along the misty path and found some more images, and some other things, including a long piece of parchment attached to a tree which detailed everyone she knew from the game and her thoughts on each person. (Including Taar, Lothar, Finala, etc)

Anthony thought for a second, a smug smile appearing on his face. He took the pen that was attached beside parchment and added his own name to the bottom. He added a few extra lines of documentation to describe more about him. By the time he was done, Eva would treat Anthony as the most important person in her whole life. She wouldn't care about the fact that she didn't know where she knew him from or how, the most important thing to her would be to serve him in anyway possible. Anthony made it so that she thought the best way to serve him was to be possessed by him.

Anthony finished writing, and suddenly she found herself lying back on her bed still in Eva's body. She sat up, looking around, still taking in the fact that she was now a young woman in her early twenties. Anthony concentrated a bit more again, and suddenly found her vision black out. He had returned to the blue sticky mass from before and was crawling his way up through Eva's throat and out of her mouth.

He splashed out of her mouth onto her legs and the bed, seperated into two parts, but still feeling as one (But with split vision). He looked around as his larger part, and then up at Eva. Then he looked around as his smaller part, though being difficult, quickly adjusting.

'No way...' Anthony thought. Meanwhile Eva had already stood up and was walking around Anthony's room, trying to adjust to a completely different enviroment. She looked around the room, and then back towards the bed where she spied the blue mass.

"Oh! Anthony! How good to see you! Please, help me achieve my goals and possess me again! It feels so great to have all this weight of my body completely off of me!" She said, smiling and showing her perfect white teeth. Anthony sorta smiled (or would have if he still had a face to smile with), and then crawled over to Eva, who took the larger part of him and promptly thrust him down her throat. She gagged a bit but Anthony quickly found that he was back in control of Eva, and now still had split vision with his/her smaller mass part.

Anthony thought about what he/she could do as multiple parts and two ideas began to form in his/her heads...
