After playing games for a while and getting a weird urge, you get a call from your friend Brianna, asking you to come over to play some games with her. You quickly get everything you need and begin to leave. You rush downstairs, and nearly fall, but you end up being caught by your sister, Anna.

“Are you alright Anthony?” Your sister asks, worried about you.

“Yeah, I’m fine.” You say as you stand back up. "But why are you home? Weren't you swimming at a friend's house?" You ask your sister, who has her swim suit on, but you now notice that she seems to be paler than usual, and her nose seems to be rather runny.

“I’ve gotta-“ suddenly Anna breathes in heavily and lets out a loud “ACHOO!” You run over to the kitchen, and grab a paper towel for her to wipe her nose. You have always been a nice brother to her, unlike how you act towards Sarah, and with good reason, she despised you and all of your friends, and you disliked her for a better word. “Thank you Anthony.” Anna replies as you hand her the makeshift tissue. She blows her nose. "I left early because I started getting sick." Then you walk with her to the kitchen to fetch her water, however, you accidently slip your finger into the water but figure that the water will still be okay to drink. Unknown to you, a small liquid is now in the drink.

“Here you go sis.” You say as you hand her the glass, which she downs in mere seconds. She smiles and blows her nose once more. You then head to Brianna's house, barely noticing that the urge has lessened.

"What took so long?" Brianna asks.

"Anna's sick, so I helped her out before leaving." You reply, to which she nods in understanding. The two of you begin to play video games for a couple hours, but you soon have to go home. Before you leave though, you get the urge again, and feel like you have to vomit. You head to the toilet and begin to do just that. You flush, wash your mouth out, stumble out of the bathroom, unaware that what you had vomited up had stuck to the side of the toilet, and is beginning to take form. You apologize and head home.

Later, about half way from Brianna's house and your own, you hear faint, yet clearly close footsteps as they approach you, you look up and behind you to see that you are staring in the face of Sarah, who is in what must be one of her sluttiest outfits of all. During all of this, you feel the urge lessen slightly.

“What are you doing here Anthony? I thought you were just going to stay home and play your stupid video games.” Your witch of a sister sneers at you with evil eyes.

If you were any other person, and weren’t related to her, then you’d probably kick her butt, but unluckily you are so all you say is “Leave me alone.” and then continue walking home, but Sarah jumps in your way and continues belittling you. You eventually have enough, and as the urge comes back, you spit at her, to which she jumps back. You head on home again, not noticing that the "spit" has begun moving towards Sarah.

You make it home to find all quiet, and that Anna is passed out on the couch. You decide that since you’re so nice, that you’ll carry her upstairs and bring her to her room. You are surprised, as oddly enough, she is relatively easy to pick up, and I mean she was like picking up a small dog, rather than a full hundred pound human being. You make it up to stairs, when you feel the urge lessen slightly again. You continue to walk towards Anna's room, then gently lay her down, and cover her up. You then get a chance to notice Anna’s face, and find that she no longer looks as pale as she did before, and it even looks as if she is getting better. Looks like that water you gave her actually did the trick, or that’s what you think anyway.

Once more the urge hits you as you go to your room and begin playing a certain game, trying to ignore it. You are so intent on ignoring it that you don’t even notice that your body is beginning to transform until your whole lower torso is transformed into some strange bluish liquid. You can’t believe what is happening to you, and yet, here it is, right behind you in broad dimly lit daylight. You fall, and feel something else fall with you, the thing that fell is your Nintendo DS system. You begin to descend into the game. You feel as if you are being pulled in against your will, and yet, there is nothing you can do. You reach out your right hand, which is almost completely liquid like the rest of your body, and beg for someone to help, yet no one does as you black out into digital darkness.

You awaken later, but realize that you feel completely different, you are now female, and the urge is gone. You can't believe what has happened, and yet, still you wish that it is a dream. You pinch yourself, and that is the first time you hear your new voice.

"Ow! That really hurts." You say as you stop pinching yourself and rub he spot. You sigh and then examine your new body. You find that you are wearing a small blue bra that is covered up by a spaghetti string pink shirt. You are also wearing a blue skirt, and also pink sandals. You sigh once more, and get up, but quickly stumble forward, as you are unaccustomed to the new weight on your chest. You apparently also have about b-sized breasts. You stand back up, and steady yourself, as you carefully begin to get used to this body, though it is rather slow progress.

You barely manage to walk a few steps without falling, or stumbling, but you eventually get it and then proceed to actually take a look at your surroundings. You are standing before a large building, which seems to be like a bank, or maybe a museum. It didn't really matter as you notice that the sky is ablaze red and seems to have a weird portal opened up in the center of it. "What's happening here?" You asked yourself, only to run into someone, a girl.
15523222222222222221211.title: A long day

choices: Search for allies to help fight agianst Naoya and Kaito...
Head straight for the place where Midori's friend is being held...
155232222222222222212112.content:
"Watch it will you!" A young sounding female voice cries as both of you fall on your backs. You groan as you look at the girl before you who you might have injured.

"I'm sorry. I wasn't watching where I was going. My bad." You say as you help the girl up. The girl dusts herself off and then you finally manage to get a good look at her. She has long purple hair, and light blue eyes that go rather well with her pink glasses, she is rather cute, or at least, that's what you think. You then examine what she is outfitted in, and it seems to be large pink dress, with a small white blow that she is wearing underneath the dress as it opens up towards the bottom. You also note that she is wearing black stockings and pink high heeled shoes.

"Could you maybe help me with something? I wanted to help out a friend of mine, and with your help we could most likely do it." She says. You want to question her, but figure you should just follow her lead for now. She looks around quickly, and then pulls out something from her pocket, a small device about the size of your DS from back home, though this is pink and yours is a different color.

"What's that?" You ask curiously.

"This is..." Suddenly, three black bolts of lightning explode behind her, and then out of the cloud appears several strange individuals, one looks like that of a snake, though it has several heads, all of which are attached to only one body. Another of the creatures is like that of an elephant, though it is garbed in armor, and is wielding a curved sword, possibly a cutlass, from what you can tell. The other demons seem to be different from the first two, but they seem to be going elsewhere, and you don't really get a good look. "Even better, I get to show you-" Before the girl can do anything, you charge in front of her and rush at the demons. You punch the closest one, which is the elephant demon, in the face, only for it to simply bat you off like a gnat, and then it stabs you in the chest, before flinging you through a nearby store, which had definitely seen better days.

Outside, the girl yells out and asks if you are alright, but she can't get a reply, as it is blocked out by the elephant monster's roar, and then snake monster's movements. She begins to fight the snake monster using her pink DS-like device to summon up two monsters of her own that look like cat swordsmen.

Back inside, you have finally come to a crashing stop as you smack against the wall. You are pain, but then feel it go away rather quickly, though you have no idea why. You don't even notice that the stab wound on your chest is gone, and that all that is left is the ripped clothing and some bare skin. You look around and find that this place is actually a weapon store, though most of the weapons are either destroyed, or too damaged to use. You dig through some rubble to find that of an old ancient katana that is completely unscarred, and looks well maintained. You smile, as you can finally fight back against these abominations to nature. You pick up the sword, and quickly duck, as the elephant monster has found you. This time you are ready. You stand back up and unsheathe the blade, then take a defensive stance.

"You wish to fight me mortal!?" The elephant monster asks, then chuckles "So be it!" The monster charges at you, but thanks to your training with swords in the past, as well as your knowledge of the topic, you realize that if you can get this guy in a small bit closer that you can quickly chop him and finish him off. You allow the monster to move closer to you, and then, thanks to your slick and light weight body, you easily dodge the attack, and quickly slice the monster's head off as his blood gushes out like an explosion. You end up getting your clothes kind of dirty, as are blood splotches all over you and your blade.

You walk outside of the store to find your new friend and then she runs up to you and hug you, glad that you are alright. You smile and say rather toughly while sheathing your katana "That monster was no match for me!" Your friend smiles and then laughs happily.

"Well it's a good thing that I chose you as my friend then." She chuckles. "Oh, by the way, I never told you my name. It's Midori, Midori Komaki." She curtsies before you, and you do the same. While doing this, you try to figure out how to greet her, since you can’t give her your real name, and you don’t know whose body you are in, when suddenly the name comes to you, along with many of your host’s memories.

"Nice to meet you Midori. My name is Yuzu Tanikawa." You say, to which Midori nods. "So what is it you wanted me to do again?" You ask as you begin to walk with Midori through the ruble of the city? Midori crosses her arms, and then makes a pouting face, which you find even cute than what she normally looks like.

Midori begins to speak, though this time, in a more serious tone "Yuzu... could you fight a friend who has saved your life, and then chose to do something you don't approve of?"

"What do you mean Midori? Like what, drugs or something? If not there's always-" You begin, but Midori gives you a glare that scares you to the core. "Sorry, I thought what you meant was something kinda minor, or at least easy to handle." You apologize. Midori sighs and exhales slowly like that of a cocky smoking anime character, though Midori isn't cocky at all, in fact, it seems like she is actually...scared. You can't explain, or even know how or why you know, but she is scared of something.

"Yuzu do you remember those monsters we faced a little bit ago?" She asks in a low tone. You nod in response.

"Yes, I do, why?" You ask.

"Well..." Midori slowly exhales once more, then continues to speak in a serious tone "…a friend of mine wants to get rid of those monsters-"

"That's great Midori!" Midori continues talking.

"My 'friend' is going to become an overlord, and control all of them, but to do it..." Midori pauses, and then turns towards you with a fear filled look on her face. "He has to cast away his humanity!" Midori seems even more scared now, and you don't know why, but you do as well. It is as if every fiber of your being tells you that this is bad, really, really bad. You take a small breath, and then look at Midori, who is now crying. You hug her softly, and allow her to continue to cry for a few minutes, until she stops crying, and you ask her if she is feeling better now, to which she nodded and speaks once more. "I'm alright, but those jerks Naoya and Kaito are going to turn my friend into a monster, and I can't do anything to stop them!" You look Midori in the eyes.

"I'm not going to let anyone turn anyone turn into a monster, especially if it's a friend of yours, Midori." You say happily, which causes Midori to hug you.

"Thank you! Thank you! Thank you Yuzu!" Midori repeats, over and over again. You smile as she continues to hug you, but then tell her to let go of you, as you were starting to have trouble breathing. Midori lets go of you, and apologizes, before you say it’s alright and then begin to...
155232222222222222212112.title: Midori my friend, I shall help you...

choices: The run into trouble when they get there...
Something happens before they make it...
1552322222222222222121121.content:
"Wait Yuzu first we should recruit some alleys or else no matter how strong we are, Naoya and Kaito will still beat us" Midori said jumping in front of you suddenly. You nodded and gave her an odd look as she seemed to be posing like a would-be super hero. You shrug and then ask her "where do we start?"

Midori makes a angered face as if she was mad at someone and you apologize since you figured you did or said something wrong but she said "No it's not what you said it's just that...well..."

"What's wrong Midori? Isn't there anyone that can help us" just as you say this someone suddenly stumbles across. The girl appeared hurt and a clear gash was slashed across her upper face. She seemed to be bleeding rather badly as you and Midori run up to her. "Are you alright" you asked rather stupidly as she clearly wasn't. She was about to answer but she fainted from most likely blood lose. Midori begins to panic but you stay calm though be it for some strange reason, as it seemed that strange urge from before had oddly returned. You couldn't explain it but it seemed like the urge wanted you to spit into the open wound. You thought it was strange but there wasn't anything else you could do but watch her die. You gulped and just then you spat into the open wound as your saliva blended into the girl's blood but what was actually happening was your 'saliva' was actually making its way into the girl's body. It first went to work by making its way to the girl’s brain, and then it enveloped it and began to regenerate the damaged parts of brain. After this the wounds on the girl quickly healed up to your astonishment. The girl’s eyes began to twitch and then they slowly opened as she let out a groan of pain.

“Whoa she’s still alive” Midori said in amazement but quickly stopped being star struck and then helped bandage the girl up. As you touch the girl you feel something go back into you like a piece of yourself had returned but you didn’t notice much.

“What…what happened” groaned the girl as she began to fully awaken? You smile knowing that she would be alright and then carefully help her stand up. She seemed to be rather confused as to where she was and also kept muttering to herself saying things like “Remiel? Remiel where are you?” As you hadn’t the slightest of what she was talking to or about you simply gave her a strange look.

“Are you okay” Midori finally asked the panic stricken girl? The girl snapped back at her as if she had no recollection of what had happened to her for the past several hours or perhaps days.

“I…I don’t know” the girl snapped back still panicking!

“She must amnesia, Midori” you deduce and then walk up to the girl and embrace her in your arms. “Don’t worry if you have lost someone we’ll find it and if you are defenseless than I shall protect you!” You whisper into her ear and she calms down significantly because of it.

“Thank you” she replies and you let her go “please tell me…your name.” You smile once more and then tell her that your name was Yuzu. She smiles slightly and nods “I see… oh sorry where are my manners? My name is Amane, Amane Kuzuryu. So now that we have formalities out of the way…what do you want us to do now?”

“Well I figure that since you have amnesia maybe we should try and clear that up first” you reply “do you remember anyone that could maybe help us out? We’re trying to save someone and defeat these guys named Naoya and Kaito-“

“Wait did you say Naoya” Amane snaps back curious of what she heard was correct?

“Yes but what does Naoya mean to you? Did he do something to you” Midori asked?

“I don’t k-“suddenly Amane grips her head in pain as if something hard hit her. She grasps at her face as if it were going to fall off and then returns to normal a moment later though her face was covered in sweat. “I…I remember him, Naoya…” Amane stutters as if a memory was on the brink of coming back into being. “…he’s the one who hurt me like this” Amane’s words strike you cold as begin to grow angry. You grip your fist in anger and punch a nearby rock and to your amazement it’s reduced to rubble under your strength. You ignore it and walk back over to Amane and Midori who hadn’t noticed what you had done.

“Yuzu are you alright” Midori asked as she noticed that your hand was bleeding slightly. You notice and then tell her that you were fine but she shakes her head and says “No it’s hurt so we should bandage it up.”

“Actually…” Amane speaks up somewhat shyly and you two turn towards her “…oh well I can heal it for you with my magic.” You shrug and tell her to give it a shot which she does though as she gets closer to you, you noticed that your wounds were already healing themselves anyway though you kept your cool and allowed Amane to heal your wound. She takes your hand and calmly exhales as if nervous then slowly mutters a world so low that you barely understood it.

“Dia…” Amane said under breath and a small pink light shined around both your and Amane’s hands then it faded mere seconds later. Amane removed her hand and then noticed that your hand was completely healed now and smiled slightly.

“Good job Amane” Midori cheered and hugged her which Amane blushed at due to the surprise hug.

“Uh…thank you Midori” Amane replies and Midori lets go of her “I guess that even without Remiel I can still be of use” Amane frowns slightly as if saddened, possibly due to the loss of Remiel. You walk up to her and gently kiss her on the forehead while embracing her in another hug.

“Don’t ever doubt yourself Amane” you whisper into her ear thought this time Midori was able to hear. “You don’t need to worry about anything. I’ll protect you from Naoya if need be” you say and Amane smiles as if new hope was flowing into her.

“Thank you Yuzu…you’re a true friend” Amane says as a smile grows on her face. You let Amane go and then asked Midori where to go next. She passes by a few times before you and then an idea comes to mind of where to go next.

“There’s this strange place where my friend once told me that some special forces were at maybe we should try going over there” Midori replies and you pull out your katana and slice it through the air.

“Let’s go than” you say and then fall behind Midori as you stay close by to Amane keeping your word.
1552322222222222222121121.title: Fallen angel: scared amesia girl...

choices: She stays there and radios her boss what happened
15523222222222222221211211.content:
After a few minutes of walking and avoiding demons you make it to what seems like a subway tunnel entrance. There was destroid cars all over the place as if someone wanted it to look liek a bad idea to enter but you shrugged it off liek it was nothign. “This is it guys” Midori cheers and gets ready to charge inside but suddenly you hear the sound of a gun click and shout out Midori’s name but she finds out all to late as you hear shots fire. Several rounds of machine gun are heared as they are fired, all aimed directly for Midori.

“Midori…”

“Yuzu but…”

“I don’t care what you say or do but I won’t allow anything to happen to my friends so-“as the smoke clears from the surrounding area it turns out that you had somehow ended up in front of Midori which put you in the line of fire instead, as shown by the several bullet holes in your back, arms, and legs. You collapse to the ground before Midori and Amane rushes towards you but suddenly she gets shot in the head and ends up collapsing, most likely dead or soon to be.

“Amane” Midori shouts and then suddenly the sounds of footsteps are heard heading towards her and her downed companions. Out of the shadows walks a woman with bright orange hair and eyes who was wearing a SDF officer uniform.

“I’m sorry but no one can escape here alive” she replies back and then notices your body and gasps in horror as if she had done something terrible which in fact she did though it was all for her mission. “It’s that girl from before who was with that boy with the head phones. Dam it! I don’t want that bastard in green going near me” she said punching a nearby wall.

“Well…maybe you should come with us” you say as you manage to stand back up to both Midori and the woman’s shock. Suddenly the sounds of small metallic objects dropping on the ground come from you as bullets fall out of your chest before your wounds quickly heal up much to everyone’s shock. “I mean what’s there to lose right? It’s not like there’s a worse place to be besides by yourself with monsters running all over the place” you smile and then stand up. You wipe the blood from your face as a small blood trail was running down the edge of your face and down towards you chin. You reach out a hand to the woman but she stands there spell bound. She looks at you then at your hand then does a double take before speaking in a stutter tone.

“What…what are you” she stutters as if afraid though she’s trying to hide her fear?

You look yourself over and besides finding everything normal except for the bullet holes in clothing on your back. You smile figuring that you were one lucky guy/girl but something told you that this wasn’t just luck. You shrug it off like it was a minor scratch and then reply to the woman.
“Why…I am just a normal human girl” your reply scares the woman even more.

“You aren’t normal! You’re a monster” she shouts back!

“Well than if I am a monster than I guess we’re in luck cause it’ll take a monster to slay a monster” you reply and walk back over towards the lifeless body of Amane. You crouch down besides her and carefully examine the wound on her head, it was indeed what you thought, already healing but she was unconscious so you just shook her a bit and she began to awaken.

“Huh what happened” Amane asked you but you smile and then reply with a smile.

“You just took a little nap that’s all so how’s about we leave now” you ask and take Amane’s hand? Midori runs up to you and then the three of you begin to leave but you stop shortly afterwards as the girls continue on. “If you want to come with us than so be it but if not than stay there and die for all I care! It really doesn’t matter to me because you shot at my friend and nearly killed another one. So your call…”
15523222222222222221211211.title: Bullets fly and the immortal girl...

choices: Something inside of you snaps and you begin to fight back harder than ever...
You may be hurting now but the cavalry has arrived...
155232222222222222212112111.content:
"Wait" called out a voice as you and the girls stop a few feet from the subway tunnel. You turn aroudn to see the woman from before with her gun slung over her back as she was running towards you. She managed to make it half way towards you but tripped and fell. You, being such a nice guy, walked over to her and help her up. "Thank you" she says in a strange apologetic tone "I'm sorry about before” she apologizes. You service to say didn't trust her but when Midori and Amane walked over you figured to allow them to decide if she should be trusted.

"So you decided to join our team" Midori asked and the woman nodded "Well than..." Midori smiles and then shoots her hand up into the air "...you are now a part of team Yuzu!"

"Team Yuzu" the woman questioned?

"Team Yuzu" you repeat in the same matter of asking tone?

"Yeah Team Yuzu! I figured that since you're the one that helped me out along with saving Amane here that we'd name the team after you. Since it was a unanimous vote than we're going by the name of team Yuzu" Midori declares with Amane chuckling in the background. You shrug and smile then the woman behind you speaks up.

"My name is Misaki Izuna, Lieutenant of special forces posted in the Tokyo Lockdown! My mission was originally to contain the lock down with my superior Fujin but things changed when that guy in green and his friends talked to Commander Fujin. They told him that if we didn’t raise the final options’ time than they would kill us and what could we do? He had the power of a god on his side or something. I don’t know what he said exactly but I knew for one thing is that he could summon demons and control them” the woman said informatively.

“Well what’s this about a final option” you asked confused?

“The final option is what we are being forced to use since the demons and their tamers are so wide-spread that we can’t contain them anymore so we have to…” she pauses and takes a breath “…we have to use a neutron bomb to annihilate the whole lockdown before anyone can get out!”

Midori and Amane gasp in shock and it takes you a second to realize why. You remember from school that a neutron bomb has the power to level a whole entire city while causing minimal property damage. You feel your blood boil as you realize this and punch the ground in anger, as you bring your fist back you look back at Izuna and then ask.

“How long till the bomb goes off” you asked in an anger stricken tone? Izuna is hesitant to answer but you asked once more and this time you scream it at her “how long till we get bombed! Tell me!”

“We only have about five hours till it’s set to go off and even then I’m not so sure if they’re right” Izuna replies sadly.

“They” you asked?

“The angels” Amane replies for Izuna as if a part of her memory had returned “Remiel was one of them before Naoya destroyed him!” Amane seems saddened by her own words and you notice that and quickly walk up to her and comfort her the best as you can and tell her not to worry.

“Don’t worry I won’t allow that to happen” you declare “I won’t allow my new friends to be killed!”

“But what are you going to do? You’re not going to challenge him are you” Izuna asked?

“If we don’t than hell will come to earth so…yeah” You pull your sword out and then asked Amane if she remembered where to find Naoya? Amane thought hard but could exactly remember anything except for someplace called the Hill’s building. You nod and hen rush off towards the building only to be stopped by Midori who had a question that she was itching to ask you.

“What is it Midori? We don’t have time for idle chitchat” you yell at her, worried about how much time you had left!

“Yuzu…” Midori begins and you calm down a bit and apologize for yelling at her. “Yuzu…how did you survive getting shot so much in the back? And why did Amane survice after getting shot in the head? Why do you seem like one of those demons we’ve been trying to get rid of and why do you seem so…so… distant” Midori franticly asks and you frown sadly of what you were about to tell her.

“You want to know why I’m not human, huh? Or why I survived getting shot in the back so many times? I survived because I no longer can die? I received this gift or curse or whatever it is before I suddenly woke up here. I didn’t want to tell you because I didn’t want to believe it myself! The reason Amane didn’t die from that head shot was because I somehow inserted a part of myself into her. I only did it because I was worried about her and I couldn’t stand to see her get hurt! There does that answer your question” you yelled! After this you continued towards the Hill’s building as somehow you remembered where it was.

When you arrived you found the place deserted as if the area had been wiped clean but in a mere minute later the air around you became foul and stank of rotting corpses and garbage.
“Hmm it seems another morsel has entered my realm” cackled a malus and despicable voice. Suddenly you could feel the air as if suddenly began to transform into that of poison. You coughed extremely and if it wasn’t for this power of yours you’d probably be dead by now. “Oh I see that not all mortals are as weak as those from ages past. Oh well I guess I’ll plant my eggs inside of you and spawn my children.” A large black shaded figure appeared before you as you looked up. The poisonous fog moved away from the being as if repulsed by the figures appearance and soon you knew why. The being was that of a large monstrous fly creature whose staff was made out of human bones and to top it all off he reeked like that of blood drenched corpses who’ve been left to rot in a burning trash heap! Dam he smelled!

“Jesus you smell” you gasped for breath. The demon cackled blissfully as he ‘smelled’ the air. He then smiled from what you could tell and replied
“Why thank you mortal I am pleased that you find me so repulsive” the demon said happily “I am the right hand of darkness, Beelzebub!” You could’ve sworn that when the demon said his name he curtsied though he wasn’t wearing any type of human garb at least you couldn’t see.

“Oh yeah well you’re about to become the next jerk to die by my blade” you spoke with an intent as if you were the devil himself.
“Ha I like you mortal and so I shall make sure to devour you whole, bones in all. You should be honored” Beelzebub said as he got into a battle stance with one of his hands on his staff and the other three forming what seemed to be hand signs. He waved one of his arms to signal you to attack him and you happily did.

“Rage chant…” Beelzebub chanted and suddenly you could feel yourself suddenly be taken over but quickly fought back via using you gift. Beelzebub was stunned for a moment as his attack left him open and you quickly sliced off one of his arms and half of his left wing, cutting the skull and crossbones in half.

“Here a little something that I recently thought up… Agidyne” you shout and suddenly Beelzebub was lit ablaze as he screams/ screeches in pain before suddenly she shoots his staff up into the air and chants another spell this time something called ‘Dead Rain’.

Suddenly the sky above you transformed into that of storm clouds and soon out of them black rain began to fall and when it touched your skin it burned. You shout out in pain and quickly retreat towards the building to find cover but Beelzebub blocks you off and smacks you across the face with his remaining left arm whose claws were razor sharp that torn into your face.
155232222222222222212112111.title: She decides to join you...

1552322222222222222121121111.content:
Am I even human anymore?
You are flung through the air by Beelzebub’s attack as blood shoots out of you like an uncorked bottle of wine. Through your massive blood lose your body still clings to life thanks to your power as your wounds begin to heal up. You blink a few times and are amazed that you are still alive and feel your face to find that new skin has grown over the previously scratch marks.

“I-I’m still alive” you questioned as Beelzebub laughed thinking that you had died. “That attack should’ve killed me but-” you pause and examine your body. All the spots where the black colored rain had touch were quickly healed to your astonishment. Then something clicked in your brain, something primal, as if this new power was simple instinct now. You smiled as if a madman and then picked up your blade that had also slid with you when you where cut. Beelzebub was unaware as he still was laughing victorious and then suddenly you stood up and shouted at him.

“Beelzebub…” the demon turned towards you as if he had heard a ghost but rather than being afraid he was angered that you still were of the flesh rather than of the bone as he put it.
“I was sure that my attack was deadly enough to kill you but even if you survived the scratch you should’ve been killed by the poison in the air. How is it that you, a mortal like you are still alive even though you’ve suffered such indescribable damage” Beelzebub yelled angrily?

“It’s simple insect…” You raise your blade though instead of being pointed at Beelzebub it was pointed at your stomach. You bring the sword down and stab yourself through your chest cavity piercing your heart as well as left lung. You stand there, blood seeped out of you and yet you still stood as if nothing had happened. Beelzebub was amazed that such a power as yours existed! He watched as your wounds from before were healed as if they were never there. Beelzebub was quick to realize he was facing something far beyond that of a mere mortal female. In fact he believed that you were a being of as might caliber as his holiness Lucifer, who he himself was on par with the mighty YHWN.

You removed your katana from your chest and then quickly ran up to Beelzebub. With a mighty slash you slice one of Beelzebub’s right arms clean off making him now having an even number of arms on each side. Next then you do is make him loose a eye as you gouge out one the huge red eye on his head before you and rip it out and toss it to the ground. Beelzebub screamed in agony then tries to chant another spell, possibly one that would heal his injuries but the pain was far too much for the right hand of darkness to bear. You quickly take advantage of this opening and hack off his head, killing the Right hand of Darkness once and for all. Blood gushes out of the now headless corpse, burning your skin with its touch but you don’t move or even flinch. You stand there as the blood drenches you, burning your clothing and skin. It only takes a moment for your skin to regenerate.

You take a breath of clean air as you watch the old poisonous verity takes its leave, just as its master had. You stand there motionless as for a few minutes before you notice movement a few feet away. You quickly ready your sword and get ready for another fight. However when you see who it was that was coming towards you stop and lower your guard. In fact you were on the verge of tears as she stops in front of you.

“Yuzu*gasp* I finally*pant* caught up to you” Midori exclaims gasping for breath. You don’t move as you notice two other people approach.

“Amane and Izuna as well” you whisper as the two approach you. Amane quickly runs past Midori and embraces you in a sorrowful hug. You look at Amane to see her eyes filled with tears as she cries headfirst into your chest. “Amane…” you begin but she cuts you off.

“Why? Why did you run away?” Amane yell at you still with tear filled eyes. “Why? Why? Did you think we’d hate you because you’re not human? Did you?” Amane asks hitting you in a fit of emotional distress. You sigh and hug Amane lovingly and then speak.

“I’m… sorry Amane” you begin “I just thought you’d hate me, just like you hate the demons.”

“No that’s not true Yuzu-“

“Actually my real name’s Anthony” you explain and back away from Amane. “You see this body isn’t actually my own. I’m just borrowing it.” You begin to gather what seems like saliva in your mouth but is actually a liquid version of you or rather part of you. You let part of it fall to your hand and form into a small piece of candy.

“What the…? What is that” Izuna asks you slightly panicked?

“You see this is what I used to control this body, as well as what I used to heal Amane. However because of that piece inside of her I can assume absolute control of her at will. The ‘candy’ turns back to liquid form and returns to you via your mouth.

“Wow…” Midori exclaims in a bit of star struck amazement.

“Unreal…” Izuna comments returning to her normal calm mindset as she removes her hand from her gun and places it back into its holster.

“Yuz- I mean Anthony…” Amane says stunned.

“Now do you see why I ran away? No one wants to love a monster like me” you reply but suddenly Midori and Amane hug you. You blush slightly and Midori speaks.

“Even if you’re some sort of monster. We still like you! We like you just the way you are. Who cares if that isn’t your body? Even if you change bodies! We’ll stand by you always.” You smiled at Midori’s words and lovingly kiss her on her forehead then you do the same for Amane. Midori chuckles “Yay! Team Yuzu…er I mean Team Anthony is back together again” Midori cheers and you give chuckle.

“Anyway I’m tired can we go home now” you ask them as if you didn’t already have the ability to?

“Wait what about the dead line!” Izuna replies in a panicked tone of voice.

“Huh? Oh don’t worry about it-“

“D-don’t worry about it! We’re all going to die if we don’t-“you interrupt Izuna and speak.

“Just down one of these and we’ll be safe” you say tossing Izuna a piece of candy that was similar to the one from earlier.

“B-but…” Izuna says hesitating.

“Don’t worry I’m sure we’ll be fine” Midori explains as you hand her another piece of candy. “After all what’s a team without trust?” Izuna still hesitates so with a move of your hand the piece of candy transforms into liquid and shoots its way down Izuna’s throat, much to her surprise. You feel it take root in her stomach but instead of taking control of her you allow her to remain in control.

“There now we can go” you begin and suddenly you transform into liquid and reappear outside in your room. The three look around in wonder as they adjust to their new surroundings. Izuna nearly passes out but you quickly help her stand up.

“Sorry I didn’t expect something so…normal” Izuna says exhausted. You lead her to your bed and she sits down. “Thank you Anthony” Izuna says. You quickly run down stairs and then return with a glass of water and hand it to Izuna. “Heh well thanks again” Izuna says giving you a small chuckle and then downs the glass.

“I won’t blame you if you all feel tired. After all you’ve been threw a lot” you say taking a seat besides Izuna. Midori lets off a yawn and though she tries to hide it so does Amane. “It seems you are all tired. I’ll give you guys my room. I’ll just sleep downstairs” you say walking out into the hallway.

“Oh no we can’t” Midori replies grabbing you by the arm “There’s no way we could let you sleep on the couch, even if we’re your guests.” You sigh tiredly as you walk back inside. You lean against the wall but before you can speak you pass. Midori looks at you and gives a sigh of relief then sits down besides you. Amane does the same and lays down so that her head is on your legs.

Okay so maybe Yoowhoo...(Get's punched in the face again this time leaving a black eye)..."Okay I'll stop I promise! Please don't hit me again!" I scream in pain! Oh well back to the story at hand, will it be Midori? Now instead of saying something (and me being lazyXD) I shall use wikipedia to fill in her bio.

Bio: A popular internet cosplay idol who calls herself "Dolly." She was in Tokyo for an event and couldn't get out due to the barricades. Eventually, she acquires a COMP and takes it upon herself to "rescue the innocent" out of a sense of justice. Her father constantly taught her to protect people and defend her beliefs, even if no one else does; as such, she constantly risks her life hunting demons, protecting people who misunderstand her due to the fact that she summons demons to protect them. She would've met a untimely death, if it wasn't for the Hero and his party stepping in to save her from a mob of humans marking her as a witch. Realizing the error of her ways, she joins with the party to see what real justice is. Refers to herself as "Magical Dolly" and speaks and behaves in a very mahō shōjo manner. (pretty much in a nutshell she is a good guy, does good things. Can be missunderstanding sometimes, and is fun to play with in the game).

155232222222222222212121.content:
Okay let us start shall we...

You decide to play Smt: Devil Survivor to releave some stress and just to play in general as you are kind of a fan. "Alright now to save Dolly." You say, pressing the start button. You hear intro music and begin to play, when suddenly, you feel like you body was like water, as if is liquidizing. You eventually collapse to the ground and turn into a puddle. You notice only a few things before you lose consiousness. That your vision has now become so you can see all around you at once, and that you were being sucked or pulled into the DS, into the game, into the Tokyo lockdown...

You wake to find nothing but darkness.

"Huh what is that?" A feminine voice asks.

"I don't know, but it might be a demon." A male's voice says.

"A demon!" A few voices from different genders gasp. The next thing you hear is screaming and then a very familiar voice.

"Don't worry, Magical Knight Dolly has arrived!" Suddenly you are able to see and notice that before you at least a few steps is Midori Komaki, or just Midori for short, reading her COMP to summon her demons. Everyone else has backed off and moved to a different spot, a spot out of view, which was lucky, as you suddenly. as if by instinct shoot at her and force your way under her skirt, under her pink panties, and into her vagina.

"Oh no this is so wrong!" Midori says as in terror as she looks around, and then she tries to pee you out but you are too far in to be forced out. Midori jets up and begins to scream out in pain as you suddenly make your way into her womb, and then suddenly, she collapses to the ground and you black out. The next thing you know is you hearing a voice

"Midori! Midori! Are you alright? Hey come on wake up!" The voice asks. You open your eyes to see...

1552322222222222222121211.content:
"Midori wake up! Darn it! What the heck happened? I heard her scream and then suddenly find her here, unconscious." A voice says, followed by another voice.

"Ok Keisuke now let's just calm down and think."

"What we need to do is to wake Midori up!" The first voice yells, which is supposed to be Keisuke.

"We need to figure out what happened, that way we aren't going to be attacked." The other voice replies, followed by a female's voice.

"Keisuke, calm down! I hope this wasn't your fault!" The female quickly shut's up of her own will and then apologizes. "Sorry it's just..."

"What!?" Keisuke replies angrily. "You think i did this!"

"No it's just..." The female's voice stops as she notices a hand on her shoulder which is the game version of Anthony's, (I.E. Hero or the protagonist of Devil survivor) Game-Anthony shakes his head and Yuzu understands this. "Sorry Anthony, I didn't mean what I said just now but..." Game-Anthony nods and smiles, symbolizing that he understands (Not having Hero talk just yet).
"Ow...my head!" You groan as the four look to see you in Midori's body waking up.

The four quickly run to you and Keisuke asks "Are you alright Midori?"

"Yeah I'm okay" You reply, not noticing being called Midori because you are groggily. You stand up with the help of Keisuke, and then proceed to take a calm breath.

"So, Midori, why did you scream?" Yuzu, who was dressed in her usual outfit i.e. a blue skirt and pink t-shirt with her pink hair band asks. You now notice being called Midori, but decide to play along until you get some time to yourself.

"Oh sorry I just got a bit... scared." You reply.

"Wait you were scared? But that doesn't so-"

"Atsuro, be quiet!" Keisuke snaps back and grabs your hand then quickly makes his way around the corner with you following. You follow Keisuke for some time, until you finally stop at a park.

"Keisuke what's up? Why did you bring me to the park?" You asks with a whine in your new voice to make things more believable.

"Midori, why were you being so careless? You were attacked while your guard was down, and you're lucky to be alive!" Keisuke yells at you.

"Sheesh, I think I'm now officially deaf." You groan, covering your ears.

"And why are you talking like that?!" Keisuke asks while still yelling.

"Ah it's just...uh...Hey look over there it's Belder!" You shout. Keisuke looks over to see nothing.

"Midori, why are you stalling?" Keisuke asks as he looks back to find you are long gone with a cloud of dust left behind. "Ah darn it! Where did she go?!" Keisuke yells out in anger as he tries to find you but finds that you are nowhere to be seen.

You stop to catch your breath and duck into a nearby alley as you hear Keisuke run by you so fast you can't believe your now female eyes. "Ah thank god." You breathe a sigh of relief, then sink to your knees and sit on the ground. You then begin to realize what the heck just happened and scream in your head so that you aren't found. 'Oh my god! How the heck am I a girl? Why am I in a girl's body? Oh my god!" You start to freak out and begin to cry the usual anime style tears, but quickly snap back to normal... well, as normal as you being in Midori's body as can be that is. "Hey it isn't so bad, I'm in one of my favorite video games, though I figured if I'd of become anyone, I would have become my game self, but I'll figure out how to become normal later." You laugh and stand back up. "Now, time to figure out how and why I was brought here." You say with a laughing cheer.

What happens next?

15523222222222222221212111.content:
You look around to see the coast is clear of any main characters and/or sub-characters, then you proceed back towards the park. At the park you stop to see some people dressed in strange orange outfits, along with a woman whose face you can see, who you find very familiar. You walk towards them and smile a casual smile as you approach the woman.

"Oh, hello there!" You say to the woman. The woman, who now that you get a better look at her, appears to be around the age of a teenager looks over to you and introduces herself.

"Hello, my name is Amane Kuzuryu and you are?" She asks.

"Oh my name is..." You begin. 'Crap can't tell her who I am, but wait!' "...oh my name is Midori, Midori Komaki!" You reply with a small laugh.

"Oh, I see, nice to meet you." Amane replies, and then she begins to walk towards the other orange clothed members.

"Wait! Hold on! Can I show you something first?" You ask. Amane turns around and sighs.

"Alright I guess so." She replies. Amane follows you to an area of the park where no one else is around, and hopefully, not watching. "So what is it that you wanted to show me?" Amane asks.

"Well I wanted to..." Suddenly you fall back, and pretend to be pain, causing Amane to be surprised.

"Hold on I'll help you!" Amane says in a small, almost panic tone. Amane places her hands over you as her hands begin to glow, but then you separate a part of yourself and shoot it out of your mouth; it hits home as the piece of you makes its way into Amane's mouth as she tries to cough it up, but to no success. Finally, Amane is silenced as the piece of you finally gets all of the way in her and Amane collapses to the ground, unconscious as you take control. A short amount of time passes, and you/Midori sit back, waiting for her to wake up. She eventually does.

"Wakey, wakey, sleepy head!" You/Midori says as she helps you/Amane up to her feet. "Good to see you're up."

"Yeah, I feel soooooo much better!" You/Amane says with a girlish giggle. Both of your bodies are still feeling tired, so you go and find a safe place to rest, and when you find it, you lie down and start to go to sleep.

"Nighty night Amane..." You/Midori says to her.

"You too Midori..." You/Amane replies as the two of you fall asleep and begin to dream.

The next day...

155232222222222222212121111.content:
You/Amane yawn and start to get up with you/Midori still sleeping beside you. You/Amane pat her on the head and then walk a bit away from your other body when you notice some people approaching you. You freeze in place as a panic starts to occur in your mind as the people approaching you are Hero, Yuzu, and Atsuro. You begin to whistle to make it seem like you are the normal Amane as the three finally make their way to you.

"Hello Amane how are you doing?" Yuzu asks.

"Oh... uh fine." You hesitate which makes Yuzu give you an odd look.

"Are you feeling alright Amane?" She asks you.

"Yes, fine." You quickly reply and take a step backwards.

"Hey, Amane, didn't you want us to defeat that demon of Bel inside of your mind?" Atsuro asks which makes you sweat.

"Oh, uh, yeah." You say with an odd smile. 'Crud I don't even know how the heck to do that!' You think to yourself, but then you begin learn how to as you search Amane's mind for the information. "Alright so...uh let's begin!" You say as you raise your hands into the air, then you mutter some strange words and suddenly, you/Amane, Hero, Atsuro, and Yuzu are transported inside your/Amane's mind to find it oddly different from when you went there while playing the game normally. Inside Amane's mind, you find the place like that of... well, a video game store (on account of you possessing Amane).

"Wow I didn't know you liked video games, Amane." Yuzu says surprised with Hero's and Atsuro's eyes shining with delight as they smile in pure joy, and you are likewise happy. The two of them quickly run up to the walls to see multiple titles lining the walls, ranging in various consoles like PlayStation to X-box to Wii to handled games. Atsuro picks up a copy of a video game and quickly reads the title aloud.

"Shin Megami Tensei: Devil Survi..." He begins before you cut him off.

"Atsuro no!" You shout, then you run up to him and snatch the game out of his hand before he has the chance to read the rest of it.

"Amane! What did you do that for?!" Atsuro asks with a bit of a wine.

"Ah, sorry, but this game is very...uh special to me so please understand." You say as Yuzu gives you a strange look.

"Okay, I understand, but I just wanted to look at it." Atsuro tries to take the game back but you refuse.

"Atsuro! Leave Amane alone!" Yuzu yells at Atsuro, but he still tries to get the game from you. Hero grabs his arm to try to stop him, but Atsuro gets out of his grasp and go after it again.

"No Atsuro!" You scream, and then you punch him clear in the face and send him flying back into a rack of games. Yuzu runs over to him and helps him up as you begin to apologize. Yuzu finds that Atsuro now has a bloody nose. "Oh no! Atsuro I'm so sorry." You apologize. "Please forgive me."

"Heh." Atsuro begins laughing. "You must really love that game, Amane." Yuzu quickly gives him a punch on the head, and he replies with "Why did yah do that for Yoowhoo?"

"Because you just got punched half across the room, pissed of Amane when she told you no, and now you're laughing about it! Atsuro you make me so mad sometimes!" Yuzu shouts back angrily. Suddenly you begin to hear a rumbling in your ear and push Atsuro out of the way as a tank like creature bursts from the wall and smashes into you before it and you collide with the wall to Yuzu and Atsuro's shock. "Amane!" Yuzu and Atsuro cry as they try and run towards you, only for the tank to aim its gun at them and charge a shot. Hero grabs the two and pushes them aside making him be the target instead as the beam of energy fires at him sending him into a rack full of games which then fall on him. "Anthony" Yuzu cries as she runs over to his aid to find him unconscious, but alive.

"Human! Humans must be destroyed!" The tank roars as it suddenly transforms into a monstrous beast. As it transforms, you/Amane are shown to reveal you are alive though unconscious, with some of yourself leaving her body through her mouth; leaving Yuzu as the only one awake and able to fight, much to her dismay.

"Crap I'm the only one left to fight!" Yuzu says in a scared tone. "Anthony, Atsuro..." Yuzu looks to see her friends are unconscious, making her even more scared. "Amane..." She looks again to see you/Amane still unconscious. "Please, I need your help! Anybody? Somebody, help me!" Yuzu begins to cry as the beast approaches her and readies its claws to strike.

"No!" A voice shouts from another part of the room. "I won't allow this!" The monster looks around the room to see no one but then suddenly gets shot in the back of the head by a bullet. The monster turns around to see your normal body.

"Who the hell are you?!" The monster roars.

"The name doesn't really matter as you are going to learn soon enough." You say as you walk over to the still unconscious you/Amane and pick her up. You then walk over to Yuzu and tell her "Keep her safe." before turning around and pulling out a sword from a pile of knocked over video games.

"So you want to fight me, is that it boy?" The monster asks as it flexes it's claws. "Well then, I hope you made a will!" You charge at the beast and quickly deliver a drop kick to the monster as it tries to strike at you. The monster falls to the ground and you jump onto the monsters back and stab it right in the head with the blade. It cries out in pain and throws you off and knocks you against the wall, stunning you for a moment.

"Yuzu! See that liquid near you?" You shout, as some of your liquid self is near her. "You have to swallow some of that and then you can beat that thing!" Yuzu nods and manages to get some of the liquid into her mouth then swallows hard to the monster's shock.

"No this can't be! I won't allow you to beat me! I forbid it!" The monster summons up a giant pink glowing ball of energy and levitates into the air! "Now die!" it shouts and throws the ball at Yuzu, but before it hits she turns into liquid and dodges it. "No!" the monster screams in anger.

"Ha, Finally! I can beat you now!" Yuzu shouts and readies her COMP, as you have given her free will, allowing her to control her own body for the time being. Yuzu summons up a demon know to her as Loki and tells it to destroy the demon before her. The Loki demon shoot out its arm and knocks the monster back as you shoot a part of yourself out at it, and to its disgust, the blue liquid hits home and goes down the throat of the demon as it begins to take control.

"Finally! It's over!" Yuzu cries in joy as she collapses to the ground, exhausted, as the world begins to turn black to her. You/Amane wake up and confront the new addition to your team.

"Well, Jezebel, finally you are under control. Now if you would be so kind as to..." You/Amane begins, knowing full well that you are in control of her as well.

"I understand." You/Jezebel as you/she sends everyone, excluding you actual body, which re-enters Amane's body, back to being outside of Amane's mind. You/Amane smile as you/Amane return to outside of Amane's mind. The first thing you see is you/Midori, who has helped the others wake up as Yuzu walks over to you/Amane and hugs you/Amane while whispering something into your/Amane's ear.

"I know now that you are not Amane. Thank you for letting me have control."

"You're welcome." You/Amane reply. "I shall let you continue to have free w..."

"No, I just want to be with you." Yuzu says softly so no one else hears but you. "I want to be your servant or slave." Yuzu says with no help from the piece of you inside her, surprising you.

"But do you truly want this?" You/Amane ask her, still embraced in her hug.

"Yes." She replies. Tears beginning to fall from her eyes.

"Then you will." You say softly, which makes Yuzu smile. You end the hug, and Yuzu wipes the tears from her eyes so the boys don't see.

"So what do we do now?" Yuzu asks. You/Amane begin to think and decide...
155232222222222222212121111.title: Jezebel welcome to team Anthony...

1552322222222222222121211111.content:
"Hey maybe we could go see my cousin." Hero says as the two of you try to think of something else to do.

"Hm, maybe that would work." You/Amane say with you/Midori nodding for a second opinion. "Alright then let's set out and find him!" You/Amane declare pointing up towards the sky.

Somewhere else in the city, Naoya sits at a table eating some lunch when "*Achoo* Wow that was a big one!" He says, surprised. "I wonder who is talking about me?" He continues to eat his lunch.

Back to you and your friends as you guys head toward Noaya's apartment, you/Amane are still tired from the battle earlier, and it is starting to show, as you/Amane are slowing down and showing signs of exhaustion.

"Are you alright?" Yuzu asks.

"Yeah, I'm just tired from earlier." You/Amane reply with a simple thumbs up.

"Alright, good, now let's get to Naoya's place so we can figure out a plan." Yuzu says as she helps you walk.

"Maybe we should stop and rest." Atsuro says as he points off to a nice little corner where you guys could sleep. "After all it is getting dark." Yuzu, Hero, and you/Midori nod, but you/Amane don't since you/Amane are trying to stay up without Yuzu's help, but you fail and simply fall to your/Amane's knees, gasping for breath. "Amane take it easy." Atsuro says as he and Yuzu help you back up. The group chooses to rest and make you/Amane a place to place to sleep since you/Amane are the most tired, then you/Amane to lie down and rest as the rest of the group stand guard, as Hero had noticed some demons moving around the area earlier.

A few minutes go by as you/Amane have finally gone to sleep, with you making Midori your main body before you go to sleep. A sudden noise startles the group as Hero and Atsuro spring into action and jump into the bushes to find the would be attacker only to hear the person shout back in protest

"Hey! what the hell are you doing!?" The voice of the would be attacker yells as it turns out to be Haru. Atsuro and Hero apologize, and the three walk back over to the main group. Yuzu and you greet her and show that the other you (you/Amane) is sleeping so they both told her to keep her voice down. "So are you guys playing babysitter or something?" Haru asks, trying her best to whisper.

"Well...uh." You hesitate as what to tell Haru, but Yuzu gives you a small smile and you exhales a sigh of relief. "Well, we are currently headed over to Hero's cousin's place so we can talk to him about the lockdown." A few more minutes go by but nothing seems to be going on but something seems to be off.

"Psst, Midori..." Yuzu whispers to you. "Hey are you going to possess Haru as well?" You think for a moment, but decide maybe not to at the moment, although something seems odd. You look over to Haru to find her smiling, which you find a tad bit creepy. A thought of shock shoots threw your mind as suddenly you see the group begin to pass, out with only you and Yuzu staying awake.

"Anthony what's happening?" Yuzu asks quietly, with only the two of you and Haru, who begins to laugh maniacally, still being awake.

Haru stands up and her eyes begin to turn black and her hair becomes pure white. She raises her hand into the air and her black gloves begin to glow with ancient blood red symbols. "How unfortunate." Haru laughs "Weak little humans. Trying to survive this ordeal but only two remain." You are suddenly shot in the chest by some sort of red energy.

"No!" Yuzu shouts in fear as she goes to check on you, but is backhanded into a wall, knocking her out. You cough heavily as your liquid abilities begin to restore your body, and you see the demon approach you slowly with an evil laugh.

"How foolish you are human, but your suffering will end now!" The demon's hand glows with a dark twisted power as you finally black out from the pain. No one noticing that a part of yourself is leaving Yuzu's body.

What happenes next?
1552322222222222222121211111.title: Haru joins team Anthony, A evil Devil in disgues!

You run into another demon clone
15523222222222222221212111111.content:
"Ow, my head!" You/Midori say as you lean up in a doctor's bed. You look around to see none of your friends, that you are now wearing a patient's outfit, and that your hair is combed down for some strange reason or another. You then find something even strange than that as you notice the room you are in has a strange eye ball like thing in the corner of the room and it seems to be watching you.

"Hello test subject Alpha." A voice that appeared to be coming from the eye like camera thing says.

"Who are you?!" You yell, somewhat scared for your life. "Where am I, and why have you brought me here?!"

"Ah such an angry one you are." The voice laughs as another voice goes over the eye camera.

"Hello there, my little mouse." A deep voice says. "If you want to know where your friends are, well then, take a look!" Several screens appear before you showing multiple people, including your friends, and even the other you (you/Midori).

"No! What are you doing to them?!" You scream as you then notice they are hooked up to some strange machines.

"Hahaha! Calm yourself, child! Your friends are quite safe, though there is the thing..." The voice pauses "You see your friends are going to become demons, and quite soon as a matter of fact." The shock sends you into a blind rage as you grab the bed and smash it into the camera. You have a part of you leave Midori's body, and you make that part the main part.

You notice a silver door before you and you decide to open it and escape, with you/Midori behind you. Outside the room, you find the place ravaged with some sort of organic compound on certain parts of the walls. You avoid most of it and then notice something beyond you. You look to see two demons, who appear to be like werewolves, standing guard of a room labeled "Room 666!"

You look around to try and find a weapon of some sort, only to find nothing usable, so you pretty much felt screwed, but then remembered you could turn into liquid and easily slip under the door, which both bodies begin to do, but suddenly, a female demon approaches the two. She looks as if she is about the age of 16, but there is something strange about her. You look at the demon's hair to see it the color blood red, and you notice her eyes are the same color, but then you notice that she is wearing a pink top under what appeared to be a strange mystic dress.

"Wait it can't be, can it? Yuzu?!" You question in shock, which makes the female demon turn around to the sound. She fires off a blast of Bufu, which makes you freeze for a moment (you/Midori had already turned to liquid, and hadn't been seen), but you quickly thaw out and both bodies proceed towards the door. You manage to sneak your way in as the demon Yuzu walks in, with you still wondering what is going on as you can still feel a connection with Yuzu.

"Ah how I find this so bizarre of master Lucifer." Demon-Yuzu says with a sigh as she begins to brush her hair. "I mean why would he try and turn humans into demon? Demons are much stronger than those pathetic excuses for test subjects." You take this time to make your way towards Demon-Yuzu, and manage to possess, her but something is off as you notice inside of her mind that she only seems to be a hollow shell.

"What is this...?" You ask yourself. You begin thinking, trying to make sense of everything, as you can now feel control of two Yuzus, one normal, and one a demon with a hollow mind, soon your mind begins to piece together an idea: Maybe Demon-Yuzu is an experiment, a clone! Content with that for the moment, you focus back on controlling Demon-Yuzu's body. Suddenly you hear a voice contacting Demon-Yuzu (The voice is unaware of the fact you are in control of Demon-Yuzu, and received her message instead).

'Yuzu, I wish to speak with you in the lab. Come quickly, and see our next experiment.' The way the voice says experiment makes you uneasy as you proceed towards the door, with you/Midori still as a liquid following you.
15523222222222222221212111111.title: Test subject: Yuzu

You arive to find a guest, Demon-Yuzu's sister.
155232222222222222212121111111.content:
You make your way to the lab quite easily, not even needing Demon-Yuzu's memories, as you are led by the two werewolves who were guarding the room you had been in. "So master Lucifer wants to see you eh?" One of the werewolves ask.

"Yeah, well, than that is to be expected as he 'loves' his daughter so much." Laughs the other werewolf.

"Yeah, but we'd better show some respect after all." Snaps the other werewolf as he seems to show more honor towards you/Demon-Yuzu. "Now here we are princess." The more honorful werewolf says as he opens a door which says "operation room" with the sign blinking as if it had a short in it. You enter to see the room covered in blood. Though dried, it still gives you the creeps as you walk towards a demon with red horns who is wearing a bloodied lab coat.

"Ah princess Yuzu I've been expecting you." The demon says in a raspy voice as if he just had the wind knocked out of him.

"Good day Mitra where is my father?" You ask the demon, relying on Demon-Yuzu's memories to identify him. The demonic scientist approaches you, his hands covered in blood.

"Why he is just in the next room with our next test subject." He replies as he points to another door at the other side of the room, which you promptly walk towards, but he stops you a second later getting blood on your dress, which infuriates you. "Sorry princess, but I just wanted to ask you a few questions, then you can proceed to your father, alright?"

You grip your fist in both anger and impatience as you want to see who this 'Father' is and what he is planning, but you turn around and then sigh before saying "Alright, what do you want to know exactly?"

"Well I would like to do a diagnostic of your current state so that I can send this information to your father." Mitras says with a small chuckle.

"Fine." You reply, and just like that, the checkup begins. First he does the usual stuff like blood pressure, pulse, ext... then the tests become more of a work out as he starts to ask you strange questions that you would only know if you yourself were a demon, which in this situation you are. 'Thank goodness.' You say in your head for the fact that you can use Demon-Yuzu's memories as the checkup goes on.

After a few more questions Mitras then asks you to remove your shirt, which you find quite odd, but none the less, you do as you are told, and he presses his stethoscope in between your breast to check for a heartbeat, which makes you surprised that demons even have hearts. He then grabs your left breast, and readies a needle which is filled with some type of liquid. You then feel that something incredibly wrong as Mitras brings the needle closer.

You then notice him say under his breath breath "Yes! Now for you to become my new slave!"

"You creep!" You shout, but not completely you as you lose control of Demon-Yuzu. You realize that you accidentally gave her free will for a moment. She then blasts Mitras across the room; his body lit a flame via an Agi spell from Demon-Yuzu.

"Try that again and I will burn you to death, and then I'll let my servants feast on your bones!" Demon-Yuzu shouts, before you retake control and walk through the door which leads to your 'Father.' Inside you find a horrific sight as one of your friends, which is Atsuro, has been strapped to a lab table, and hooked up to a strange demonic machine, which appears to be pumping some type of liquid into him. Beside him was what appeared to be a white human male with bleached light blond hair who was wearing a purple suit.

"Ah, daughter, I figured that was you but..." He pauses for a moment. "Where is Mitras?"

"Back there amongst the rats, and may he burn to death." You reply with a bit of indirect anger.

"Why is that?" The man asks you.

"He tried to inject me with a mind control serum so that I would be his sex slave." You reply as you begin to growl in anger!

"That insignificant..." He mutters then looks back to you. "He shall pay for that with his life, but then again, you did stop him..." The man begins to think, and then looks at you with an evil grin. "Ah I've figured out what his punishment should be!" The man snaps his fingers and a small orb appears before him and you showing Mitras chained up to a wall with his arms bent backwards so far that you swear you could see his bones, and that a small demon was before him most likely his punishment. "Let him experience torcher for a day, then let him back to the lab." The man before you says and then the orb flashes and disappears.

"Now daughter about this human..." The man says.

"Yes, father." You reply turning to Atsuro who still remained unconscious.

"What do you think we should do about this one?" He asks you, asking for your opinion.

"I say we..." Your mind goes blank as you can't bring yourself to have them experiment on Atsuro, but maybe this means that if you play along some more you can find your friends and free them as well, but at what cost? Does Atsuro have to die for the greater good?

The man notices you are in great thought and chuckled a bit. "Calm yourself daughter.' He says in a soothing voice. "If you want, we can try this tomorrow." He says, and you quickly nod, knowing this may give you more time to think about the situation.

"Alright, we shall continue this experiment tomorrow, so please get some rest." The man says. "Oh and another thing..."The man begins. "...please say hello to your new sister on the way back to your room." With that, the man before you teleports away, leaving you alone in the lab with Atsuro. You want to rip him out of that machine right here and now but something stops you, not fear, not courage, not another demon, but you/Midori, who finally returns to her normal form.

"Let's get some sleep." She says, then she turns back into a liquid, and enters Demon-Yuzu's body. You walk out the lab doors, outside the office where Mitras formerly was, and out into the hallway.

When you make it to your room you...

1552322222222222222121211111112.content:
You make your way to your room, and you hear a yawn, which makes a chill run down your spine. You quickly open the door and an icy smile greets you.

"Hello sister." A familiar voice says. The person before you appears to be Midori, but not quite Midori as her dress is as white as snow and her left hand is like that of an ice claw, with her other hand being just a normal human hand, which is holding a black frost demon plushy.

"Oh Midori what are you doing here?" You ask her, doing your best to keep your cool.

"Oh I just thought I would come and see my sis." Demon-Midori says with a smile and gives you a playful hug.

"Oh okay Midor...I mean sis." You say embracing the hug, and you notice that Demon-Midori still seems to be kind of like the original, though with a few added icy parts (I.E the ice claws and the frost dress). "Hey, sis..." You start and she looks up to you. "Do you know what father was doing with the boy in the lab?" Demon-Midori lets you go and sits back on the bed with a worried look. You sit beside her and ask her what's wrong, but she doesn't reply, instead she merely snuggles up to you and lies in your lap.

"Father was trying to turn that boy into a demon like us, but..." Demon-Midori pauses for a second and you hear faint whimpering. You place your hand on her head, pick up a nearby hair brush, and begin to brush her hair. After a few more strokes with the hair brush Demon-Midori speaks up in a small cry. "...Father wanted to turn the boy into a demon, but what he wants to really do is to devour his soul and turn him into a mindless soldier." Demon-Midori then begins to cry in your arms.

"Hey there sis, it'll be alright." You say trying to comfort her. Demon-Midori stops crying for a moment and looks up to you. "It's okay, we can save that boy if you want." You say, hugging her.

"Bu... but wouldn't father get angry with us if we did? After all, he might punish us if we get caught and we might..." Demon-Midori tries to continue, but you calm her nerves with a small hug.

"It's okay sis..." You embrace her in the hug and say something in your head. 'I won't let anything happen to you! I will protect you!'

You break the hug and Demon-Midori asks you "Do you mind if I sleep in here tonight? I don't want to go back to my room." You nod and tuck her into your bed then follow her and both of you fall asleep shortly afterwards.

Demon-Midori says something to you before she passes out "Thank you, Yuzu..."

"You're welcome Midori...Goodnight." You reply as the both of you fall asleep and begin to dream. You wake up the next day.

Pathetic.” The demon says before she raises her hand and says one word “Mabufudyne.” which sends a hail of ice down at you and your friends. The bodies fall off the crosses and then transform into some sort of zombie like creatures, though they each have two pairs of devil wings sticking out of their backs and their hands have turned into blood red machine claws which seem to glow with a malevolent aura.

"I call these creatures Slaughters, oh and just so you know, they do not have a gender, although I see no real point of you knowing that, although I wonder how you got in here. Anyway, prepare to die!" Haribel's voice laughs and fades away again, signaling the creatures to attack. Three of them dart their way at you, and are mere inches from you when...

"No! Stay away from me!" Yuzu screams, and suddenly, your body switches to the body of Yuzu, and then you shoot out a blast of pink light, which vaporizes the Slaughters.

"Hey, Yuzu, calm down!" You say, making your body return to its original form (the form you entered with).

"Sorry Anthony I'm just..." She begins.

"Hey it's going to be alright so calm down and just let me handle this, okay." You say and Yuzu calms down.

"Alright Anthony just keep those things away from us and we'll do the rest." Yuzu says before returning back inside your mind.

"Can do." You say smiling, and then materializing two white beams of light which you then turn into swords. "Time for some fun!" You say smugly and charge at the remaining five Slaughters.

"Are you hurt anywhere?" Yuzu asks you.

"Well, now that you mention it, I seem to have broken my left arm, although my abilities are healing it." You say with a small chuckle and groan as you realize your arm is broken. Yuzu places her hand on your broken arm and suddenly, your arm begins to glow with a small pink light.

"Diarahan!" Yuzu says in a soothing voice as the light begins to brighten, helping out your healing abilities, and then disappears.

"Hey! Are you done healing Anthony yet?' You/Jezebel asks. "Because me and Amane just finished and we were wondering if you guys are still up for kicking Haribel's butt?"

"Yeah, we're all set." Yuzu replies as you and her stand up.

"Alright girls, let's go bag us a demon chick." You/Jezebels declares, materializing a gun.

"Alright, let's go!" You say, and storm into the chapel area of the church...

1552322222222222222212121.content:
Alright, so we all know how the beginning goes: Getting home from school, deciding to do something you fall asleep, yadda yadda yadda blah blah blah. Boring stuff, right? Right. So let's just skip ahead, shall we?

----

Your eyes shoot open as a wracking cough forces its way out of your chest, and you sit up straight on top of your bed. You pound your chest ease the pain, but the spasms have already subsided. What happened to you, you think while rubbing the sleep from your eyes, blinking into the darkness of the night. You can hear the door click open softly, and a head pokes in.

"Are you alright, Nabiki? I heard you coughing."

"Yeah, I'm fine, sis," you answer without thinking, waving the girl off. "I just got something in my throat."

"Alright, then. Good night, Nabiki."

"Night, Kasumi."

It isn't until the woman closes the door that you realize exactly what was wrong with that exchange: First of all, your name (despite what the first layer of your thoughts say) isn't Nabiki, it's Anthony. Secondly, while you have sisters, none of them are named Kasumi. So why did you respond the way you did? Too curious and inquisitive to fall back asleep, you begin your investigation.

---------------------

"Hey, Kasumi, I found this in my room this morning. You know what it is?" you ask, showing the older girl the gooey thing in your hand. She looks at it curiously, then back to you. She shakes her head

"Oh my! I've never seen anything like it. I'm sorry, Nabiki."

"It's alright, sis. You'll know in a bit." And then you shove the worm into an unsuspecting Kasumi Tendo's face, where it quickly crawls up her nose and dissolves into her. She falls limp for a few moments -and you have to hold her up by the armpits to keep her from collapsing to the ground- and then she comes back to life.

"Oh my, Nabiki, that was quite an experience."

"You can thank me later. Right now, I'm gonna need you to get some of that into our baby sister," you tell her, coughing out another worm into your hand and handing it to her. "Think of it as an... initiation for you. This club's too exclusive to let just [i]anyone[/i] in." Kasumi nods in understanding.

"I'm sure Akane will enjoy being part of it as much as I have, once she joins." Of course she will, since you'll be the one animating her, just as you've been animating Nabiki and now Kasumi. Without saying anymore, you quickly walk Nabiki out of the kitchen while you set Kasumi to preparing breakfast, hiding the worm like a dagger. Not long after, Kasumi's ears pick up the light steps of Akane as she hops down the stairs.

"Akane, can you come in here, please?" you ask in Kasumi's kind voice.

"Sure! What's up, Kasumi?" the youngest Tendo asked as she entered the kitchen.

"I'm thinking of adding something new to your breakfast," you say, showing her the worm in your hand. She barely has time to look at it before you shove it into her face. It darts up her nasal passage before she even has time to react. In Nabiki's room, you smirk victoriously as you feel Akane's muscles warm up to your control and a new pair of eyes open to see Kasumi. She smiles kindly at you, and you smile back.
