15523222222222222222211.content:
"Hey! Hey you! Wake up!" A voice yells. "I said wake up!" Suddenly you are punched in the face extremely hard, which feels as if someone just dropped an anvil on your head. You cry out in pain as you open your eyes cupping your nose as you try to hold back the bleeding, although you are quickly healing.

"What the heck was that for...Jeane?!" You say, shocked. Before you is a woman who is dressed like a martial arts fighter. She is wearing a white top, has red stripe like tattoos running across her arms, she appears to be wearing a red thong, but you might mistake them for some shorts (You aren't really sure), and she is wearing white boots which, you're sure have small bits of red on them.

"You didn't answer my question!" She yells at you, kicking you in the rib. "Who the hell are you?!" Jeane readies her fists, and throws a punch which seemed to send you flying, but you stayed put. You look to your left to see the body of a familiar character.

"No way! Travis!" You rush over to the body to confirm that it is indeed Travis Touchdown, although he is now dead. "Crap, he's dead, but this can't be happening! This has to be a dream." You then remember your nose and how much it hurt, although no longer since you have healed, due to Jeane's punch.

"This isn't a dream!" Jeane yells. "You're as pathetic as my brother beside you!" She commented, which makes you mad. "You see, when I beat him up enough he just passed out. Though oddly enough, he isn't dead, even though I'm sure you think he is. He is only unconscious, so I recommend you leave before I have to kill you." Jeane says in a somewhat sarcastic tone.

"How did it come to this?" You ask yourself.

You remember that you were in your room after you got home. You were playing no more heroes, had gotten to the final boss (Jeane) but got killed by her signature attack. You then took a nap and woke up here... well... after your body suddenly became water and was sucked into your TV, much to your surprise. You think for a moment and think that this sounded quiet stupid, but heck all this is actually real as noted by the pain from earlier. Jeane approaches you and lifts you up by your throat

“You're going to die now, so I recommend you say your prayers…” Jeane suddenly is suddenly silenced as your body suddenly turns into water and begin to enter her body. “Get out of me you son of a bitch!” Jeane screams, punching herself in the ribs to try to force you out, but instead, you merely slip deeper in. Suddenly everything goes black and you seem to feel a sharp pain in your chest.

“Huh? What happened?” You wonder out loud, noticing that your voice has changed, it sounds like Jeane's voice. You try to stand up, but notice that you now have a somewhat noticeable amount of weight on your chest. “What happened to me?” You ask to no answer. You look at yourself all over, and discover that you're wearing Jeane's clothes. This makes everything come together, and you realize that you're in Jeane's body You walk over to Travis' body as you decide to help the guy out since his is, after all, the 'hero' of this game. You begin to pick him up, but suddenly you cough up blood, much to your surprise. You then suddenly black out again and wake up in your room.

“Well at least that is over...wait...” You look yourself over to discover that you still are Jeane or at least are possessing her. “Man this feels so strange, I hope this isn't permanent.” You say and suddenly you spit a piece of yourself out, which forms into your normal body. Suddenly the world goes black again, though you wake up shortly afterwards to see Jeane standing over you.

“Well, welcome back to the world of the living, dip shit.” Jeane says in a sarcastic tone, though you still feel like you are in control of her, even though she seems to be acting normal.

“Uh Jeane how...how are you feeling?” You ask hesitantly, thinking she might beat the ever living crap out of you as you subconsciously try to will her to be kinder to you and not want to harm you, also making her fall for you.

“Fine, I guess.” She replies.

“So what do you think we should do now?" You ask Jeane. She thinks for a moment, and then speaks up.

“Let's go back and see if we can recruit some more girls into our little harem! Don't you agree?” She asks, to which you nod at.

You turn the Wii back on and start up No more Heroes again. After you load a game which is right before you (Travis) is about to face a female opponent, you and Jeane turn into liquid and enter the game. You look to see that you are now...

155232222222222222222112.content:
As you start to awaken you hear screams of sheer terror, you spring up and suddenly you are splattered with blood. You gag and vomit as some of the blood had landed in your mouth. After you stop vomiting someone walks up to you holding a sword in hand.

"Are you alright?" The being. You turn to see a white haired, dark skinned women who seemed like a school student. You stand up smile a bit after wiping off some vomit.

"Oh, sorry, my name's Anthony and you are?" You ask her, not wanting to cause her to question how someone she's never met knows her name.

"Oh, the name is Shinobu." She replies.

"Well, that's a nice name." You comment, before looking behind Shiinobu to see a trail of dead bodies. "Did you kill those guys?" You ask hoping that Travis might have been here first, but Shinobu's blade has red liquid dripping from it.

Shinobu's face turns to a cold expersion, she lifts her blade up in the air and as she tries to swing the blade down onto you. Suddenly Jeane appears in between the two of you and blocks the hit with her hand.

"Jeane?!" You say, shocked.

"You were expecting someone else?" Jeane asks with a laugh and grabs Shinobu's blade before breaking it in half with her incredible strength.

"No!" Shinobu shouts, dropping to her knees in defeat. You walk up to Jeane, and then Shinobu speaks "Well? Finish me off! I lost, so you have to kill me!" She demands.

What happens next?
155232222222222222222112.title: The art of the...female assasin?

1552322222222222222221121.content:
You shrug in nonchalance, Shinobu's demand not fazing you in the slightest; in fact, you've thought ahead, and planned for this. "Sure, whatever." You say, digging in your pocket for something. You bring it out of your pocket, and offer her the piece of blue goo in your hand. The dark-skinned girl looks at it, and then up at you in question. "It's a poisoned piece of candy." You say, answering her unspoken inquiry. "I brought it along, just in case. Eat this, and you'll be down in seconds." She takes the 'candy,' and examines it one last time, before flipping it into her mouth, swallowing it with no visible hesitance. You see the lights go out in her eyes, she slumps like a marionette with its strings cut, and then you feel a second body coming under your control, this one far more feminine than your real body.

You raise Shinobu's head, and look at your main body and Jeane, both of whom are smirking at Shinobu's body. You smile with your new, female mouth. "Well." You have Shinobu say. "I guess you killed me in a sense, but I've come back as a better person."

"Damn straight." Jeane affirms with a nod of her head. "You're nothing but Anthony's puppet now." Indeed, you muse, Shinobu has become nothing but a literal extension of yourself, a thing for you to play with; she is little more than a puppet, and you are now her puppeteer. Speaking of which, you think with two minds as you raise the newly-dominated Shinobu to her feet and massage her breasts with your hands. You need to figure out who else you want to add to your collection. The possession of the 18 year-old has diminished a desire that you had no idea was present, but you have a feeling that it will come back unless the process is repeated. With this in mind, you scan your memories (as well as Shinobu's, as her possession has given you access to all of her memories) to figure out the best girl to add.

The answer hits you from two different directions at the same time: There's Dr. Naomi, Travis Touchdown's mechanic, as well as researcher and developer of beam katanas (including the Tsubaki series, Travis' personal weapons), and professional scientist and engineer. With her intellect on your side, combined with Shinobu's skill, you could easily power your way through the rest of the game.

On the other hand, you could go for Sylvia Christel, Travis's love intrest, as well as member of the UAA - with her knowledge, you can rig the matches so you have an advantage all the time.
1552322222222222222221121.title: Shinobu's possession

1552322222222222222221122.content:
"Hey! What the hell!?" A voice shouts. You look over to see the face of Travis, who seems rather pissed off.

"Sorry, I beat you to her, but I can think of another solution..." You begin.

Travis groans a bit and says "You do relize that you're fucking with the whole game right?" You nod and smile slightly.

"Yes, I know that, but it doesn't really matter, I got here first, so I got to do it." You reply with a shrug.

"Yeah, I guess, but man I really wanted to fight. My adreniline is pumping." Travis groans.

"Well then give Anthony here one of your beam katanas, and both of you can fight for the next rank Loser dies." Jeane offers, snagging one of Travis' beam katanas, and tossing it to you. You examine the beam katana to find that it is the Blood Berry, which is Travis' first beam katana, leaving him with one of the superior desighed ones.

"Crud." You say "I got the Blood Berry." You say in a depressed tone, although you know you'll win since you'll recover from anything he does..

'Hey!" Travis says to you. "It's not the sword, but it's the swordman, and how it's used."

"Wow that's...deep of you Travis." You say perking up a bit. "Where'd you learn that from?"

"Some strange anime porn online." His answer makes you face plant, and also laugh your but off. After another minute of laughing, you smile.

"Let's fight!" You say, and Jeane backs off to watch the fireworks fly. You and Travis roar battle cries as you charge at each other, creating a sword duel.

"Very nice" Travis comments.

"Likewise." You reply and both jet back becuase the sword duel ended in a draw. You were still fired up, and so was Travis as you again ran at each other, though this time, he jumps and sliced his beam katana into your arm, nearly severing it, but you manage to knock him away with a swing of our own, doing some damage to him as well, the difference was, you are the only one who healed. "Time to end this, I haven't been using my full powers, but I guess it's time I stop holding back." You summon up a small ball of your liquid self, and instantly chuck it at the still shocked Shinobu, the ball goes inside her, and then takes hold, allowing you access to her sword skills, which you happily copy knowing that this will make it so that you can switch up your style so that if someone gets used to one style, you can switch to throw them off.You adjust you beam katana to work with Shinobu's style, and then release a loud battle cry.

You rush at Travis with incredible speed, suprising even Jeane in the stands. You manage to strike a heavy blow on Travis' left shoulder, as noted by the now present large gash on his shoulder. His shock at your change of style gives you a major advantage, and you slice into Travis' left arm. You snap to your senses as soon as the fight was over as you had delt a criplling blow on Travis having broken Travis' left arm with your strike.

"As of now, you are ranked Eight, though I would recomend resting a bit before continuing on your quest." You say in a profesional voice. "Oh, by the way, I'm gonna keep this beam katana." Travis' doesn't object and passes out. You have Shinobu carry Travis home, since you want to leave Travis there to recover, thinking that Sylvia (who you are conteplating whether to posses or not) thinks less of him. You bandage Travis up with a first aid kit and then decide to leave the game, making sure to save the game so that Travis would remember this whole thing.

"So what are we going ot do about my brother?" Jeane asks you in her usual though this time slightly concerned tone.

"Well first..."

***Back in No more heroes***

Travis wakes up with a groan, and also sees a note from you left on his bedstill. He opens it up to find two pictures left from you. He examines them for a second and then screams out loud "Damn it! I never got the guy's name!" Travis begins to have a nose bleed and rushes to the bathroom as the note and it's contents fall to the ground.

The contents of the note were two pictures one of Shinobu and another of Jeane, though the really big suprise as well as what made Travis nose bleed was the fact that both of the pictures were that of the two women top-less. As for the note it read "To my new friend Travis Touchdown. Great fight as well as great sportsman ship. Hope you enjoy these nice pics ^_^" the message was followed by two words "Shinobu" and "Jeane" with arrows pointing to what was suposed to be the pictures though they had fallen out. A message was left under the spots for the pictures "By the way the name's Anthony."

***Back to you in your room***

You have gone ahead and taken direct control of Jeane, leaving you with three bodies sharing one mind. You begin to think of what to do, and come up with an idea...
1552322222222222222221122.title: A bloody dance of swords...

choices: inside what seems like a large stadium with enemies all over it...
Inside a strang vortezx world and the sky is the shade of blood...
15523222222222222222211221.content:
You began to think when your cell phone rings with the familiar melody of No more heroes 2.

"Wait that melody..." You begin mesmerized by the melody as you/Shinobu hands you your cell phone. You answer the phone regretfully to find that it is your mother. "Hello." You say, answering the phone.

"Hello? Anthony it's mom, I just wanted to call to let you know that we'll be out for longer than we first thought, so we may or may not be back tomorrow, if not we'll be gone for a while, then." With that your mother hangs up.

"So what was that about Anthony?" You/Jeane asks, you're acting like you aren't yourself in the girls' bodies, so, she has to pretend that she doesn't share a mind with you.

"Oh nothing." You reply. "Just a message from my mom saying they'll be back late."

"Good, then we should go back to possessing more girls." You/Jeane say, to which you nod in agreement.

"Who are we going to go after?" You/Shinobu asks you shyly.

"Margret Moonlight..." You declare!

"And who's that?" You/Jeane asked as if wondering who it is that you are going after?

"Well, she's one of the high ranking assassins, at rank 4, and she's rather beautiful." You say, blushing a small amount. You put No more heroes 2 into the Wii console, then load up a save file just before the 4th ranked battle, and proceed to enter the TV with you/Jeane and you/Shinobu.

You open your eyes to see that you are outside the bathroom in a room just before the roof door, which is to your left, upon exiting the bathroom. You get up and walk into the next room to find that Travis isn’t around.

“Huh, guess he’s outside still fighting. Oh well this’ll make it a small bit easier.” You say with a smile as you pull out the Blood Berry that you had gotten from Travis earlier, and after looking it over, you slip it back into your pocket, ready to whip it out if need be. As you open the roof door, it makes an eerie creaking sound as it reveals the rooftop. You walk out into the open and begin to walk around on the roof as a strange, and yet enticing melody plays in the background.

“Hmm hm hmm…Reaper, reaper hmm hm.” You hum along to the beat as a small red laser pointer slowly, but surely, makes its way up your spine. You stop dead and speak. “You know that song of yours is actually quite beautiful.” You comment as you turn around, the laser pointer’s dot was now right in the center of your forehead. Far away from you atop a billboard was a woman, her bladed weapon glows in the moonlight

“Hmm it seems that you are not afraid of being shot, correct? Well than I will ask you one last question, why is it that you are in the UAA?"

“Well, I’m not in the UAA per say, but really…I’m just in it for the chicks.” You say jokingly.

“Hmm it seems you take death as if it was something you could easily wash off with soap, like the dirt on those shoes of yours. So be it then. If you defeat me, then you may do whatever you wish to me.” The woman replies as she jumps down off the billboard. You run up to catch her and narrowly make it before she touches the ground. “Oh and such a gentle man as well…” She says impressed slightly.

“I’m sure all the other men you meet don’t treat you with such courtesy.” you say setting her down.

“No, all the men I meet, I cut their heads off.” Margret says as her blades wrap around your neck like a snake, with a small amount of room left for breathing room.

“Oh aren’t you such a diva.” You say as you move her blades away with your bare hands. Margret back flips away and her expression shifts into one of a fighter.

“Well then, let us begin” you say as you withdraw the Blood Berry from your pocket. You activate the beam saber and then the fight begins…

“Reaper reaper that’s what people call me…” You begin to sing for the heck of it as you twirl your beam katana in your hand. Margret then continues after you as the song becomes that of a strange duet.

“Why? Cause they all die!” She sings. “When I sing this song, I end their lives…” Margret sings as you block her strike and back flip away. “You act as though payback makes you a noble man. Is that a fact?” Margret sings, and fires off a round which you easily dodge and continue the melody.

“Well you’re a *BLEEP* Philistine.” You sing, censoring your vocabulary slightly, and then drop kick Margret as she begins to fall you catch her.

“Requiem aeternum, Bullets right through the sternum…” Margret sings in your arms as you spin around and then twirl her.

“Lullaby to heck, babe…” You sing as you two slip your weapons in between each other and hold each other’s blades respectively an inch from their opponent's throat.

“Reaper's got your name…” Margret weakly sings as you quickly slice her across her chest with the beam saber, which sends her into the air.

“Guess I win babe.” You say as you catch Margret one final time as her blood begins to soak her gothic Lolita style clothing.

“So you do…please…remember my song well.” Margret replies with her finally word but you protest.

“Don’t think you’re going to die now Miss Moonlight.” you say with a happy smile as you materialize a small piece of you in your hand and transform it into that of the shape of a piece of candy.

“But I thought you were going to kill me.” Margret questions as she begins to chuck up blood?

“No I would never kill a woman, especially such a beautiful one. That is why I want you to swallow this.” You say as you show her the small piece of yourself disguised as a piece of candy.

“But-“ Margret protests, but you slip the ‘candy’ into her mouth, and she swallows it. You lean in and gently kiss her on the lips as the piece of you begins to take control.

A few minutes later, you escort you/Margret outside to find you/Jeane and you/Shinobu with about a thousand bodies behind them. Shinobu’s blade is coated in blood, yet her clothes remain clean, though you/Jeane is the opposite, with her hands and clothing covered in blood.

“Well you seem to be having fun.” You say as you looked at Jeane's bloodied attire. You/Margret smiles and chuckles a small bit.

“What's so funny, prissy girl?” You/Jeane asks as she cracked her knuckles, clearly not tired from killing all those henchmen behind her.

“Well, it's the fact that you are so feisty and act as though the blood on your hands is nothing.” You/Margret replies with a chuckle.

“Well thanks, I guess, but are we done here? I really need a shower” You/Jeane complains.

“Yes Jeane, Mission complete." You reply, and then transport all of your bodies back to your room. As soon as you arrive back, the first thing that happens is you/Jeane, in order to keep up the act, asks you where your shower is, and after you answer, she bolts for it.

“Guess she really wanted a bath.” You say with a sigh as you plop onto your bed. “All I want to do now is take a nap *yawn* that fight really took it out of me.” You/Margret smiles and walks up to you, then begins to stroke her chest along your chest which actually feels very nice.

“You’re going to need more strength if I know what assassin we’re going after next.” You/Margret says as her sharing a mind with you of course allows her to know everything you do, and vice versa.

“Yes master, rest up, and then when you wake up, we can fight again.” You/Shinobu says as she walks to the door to keep watch, so that when your siblings get home, you will not be caught in this situation. You/Margret gets in your bed and sleeps in it with you.

In the morning you decide to shoot for one more girl and when you appear in the game you see you are now...
15523222222222222222211221.title: A melody for the moonlight...

choices: You reform much to the girl’s surprise
Instead the girls take revenge upon the one who ‘killed’ you…
155232222222222222222112211.content:
When you open your eyes you see that you are on what seems to be a large stadium based baseball field and to add a bit of flavor to the situation there were loads of enemies around you, all of them garbed in baseball gear. You instantly release control of all the girls, seeing as how would be really difficult to fight simultaneously with four different bodies.

"Well they seem quiet authentic of them" Margret chuckled as she readied her blades.

"Well I guess they wanted to dress for success. Too bad the destroy players haven't won a game in years" Shinobu said shifting into a fighting stance.

“Well than I guess we should put them and their stupid outfits back into the grave than" Jeane said cracking her knuckles.

"Heh this should be fun" you say as you activate your blood berry and then the four of you rush the group of quiet possibly thousands of enemies. You laughed and smiled as you sliced three guys in half with your beam katana. Shinobu congratulated you on your kill as did Margret but Jeane just told them both to shut up and told you not to be cocky. You laughed as you continued to attack as the girls seemed to be having fun as well. Shinobu was quick and nimble allowing her to easily slice thru tens of small enemies with ease. Margret was pulling back on defense with her gun-scythes though she was farther back then the rest of you she still was having fun as she blasted her advisories' head's off. Jeane, who was the farthest up, seems to simply be acting like this whole this was just a job and yawned after she had cracked two guy's skulls by smashing their heads together.

"Man this is so boring" Jeane complained as she ax kicked another guy this time breaking the dude's spine with a loud snap!

"If you don't like it than hurry up and kill the rest of them, so we can get to the assassin" Marg-ret recommended as she slices threw two enemies.

"Don't order me around prissy girl" Jeane yelled back as she threw two enemies at Margret who easily sliced them to pieces without getting a trace of blood on her clothing!

"Now, now ladies if you're done fighting..." you said in a joking tone of voice.

"We've eliminated all the enemies Master" Shinobu explains as she sheathes her katana.

"Thanks’ for the status update Shinobu. You're such a sweet girl" you say with a smile and pat her on the head similar to what pet owner does to their dog for doing something good.

"Pfft whatever, Teacher's pet" Jeane says under breath though Shinobu heard it and quickly withdrew her katana.

"What was that skank? You say something" Shinobu says threatening Jeane?

"Hey now that's enough of that ladies! No more fighting until we get downstairs" you yell an-gered by the constant bickering. You start to run off and the girls chase after you but you’re a lot faster than all of them thanks to your copy ability that you used to combine Margret's and Shinobu's speed. You are the first one to arrive at the 'boss' door so to speak and after taking a deep breath you go inside.

A few minutes later the three girls had finally arrived just before the boss room, all of them out of breath as they had to fight their way here as you didn't kill any of the enemies for them figuring that it would be a punishment.

"God dam it*pant* why the hell did he have to run off" Jeane cursed as she tried to catch her breath.

"Probably because you started it" Margret said catching her breath.

"You wanna go sister" Jeane threatened but Shinobu stopped them as she put her blade and a kunai to the two girl’s necks.

"Say another word and your blood’s going to paint the walls red" Shinobu threatened meaning every word. Margret sighed and Jeane regretfully withdrew thus ending the conflict for now when suddenly a loud agonizing scream was heard, a scream from you!

"Anthony" Margret and Jeane said in unison both worried for your safety!

"Master" Shinobu cried as she opened the door only for suddenly someone coated in blood to be sent fly back and smash against the cement wall. The three women ran at the being and to their surprise it was you thou you’d seen better days. Your head had been smashed in and your chest was smashed in along with blood gushing out of your head like a broken faucet. The three girls frowned saddened to find you had died, heck even Jeane showed sorrow though she didn't allow the other two to see it. Shinobu begins to cry wildly and begins to ball into Margret's shoulder. Margret sighs sad to see this event come to pass and strokes Shinobu, trying to comfort her.
155232222222222222222112211.title: Bad Girl! Bad Girl! What you gonna do?

1552322222222222222221122112.content:
“Dam it” Jeane curses as she punches the wall in rage. “That bastard died before I could… God dam it!”

“Wow Jeane I didn’t know you cared so much” Margret exclaimed in a bit of surprise though to Jeane it sounded like Margret was making fun of her.

“Shut up bitch! Before I do to you what I did to my old man” Jeane threatened!

“Jeane I didn’t-“

“Stop making excuses” Jeane shouts and moves in to punch Margret but Shinobu blocks the strike with her sword, specifically the bladed edge of front of the blade. Though the sword cuts into Jeane’s flesh she continues to push, making the blade go even more into her balled up fist.

“You’re just like my old man! The bastard used to molest and rape me then he’d make up some excuse like ‘it was an accident’ or ‘this is the last time, I swear’. I fucking hate him! I hate him dam it! I hate him” Jeane screams as she throws another punch though this one hits the wall. “Dam it! Dam it! DAM IT” Jeane shouts collapsing to her knees, tears streaming down her eyes.

“Dam it!” Jeane sorrowfully cursed punching the ground “I’m balling like a fucking baby! Why? Why dam it?!”

“Jeane…” Margret

“I’m sorry. I never knew” Shinobu explains trying to sound sympathetic.

“Yeah well fuck you! No one gives two shits about me. Who would? I’m some cold blooded assassin with a mind so fucked up that no one can stand me. Hell Travis didn’t even know about me until the end of the game. Dumbass” Jeane sadly chuckles.

“Well what about mast-er I mean Anthony” Shinobu asks?

“Huh what about the shit head” Jeane asks in her usual tone though tears were still falling from her face.

“Well didn’t he posses you first? That can’t be just a coincidence” Margret says trying to cheer Jeane up.

“Nope when he first appeared I nearly killed the shithead. Broke his nose and gave him a black eye. I don’t even think he knew he could possess me until I was already his. Besides I’m just a pawn anyway. It’s not like I can go anywhere I want, do whatever I want to do. I’ll have to follow him like the little toy I am. Hoping that he won’t discard me when he gets a new one” Jeane replies sinking her head into her knees.

“Dam it why do you have to be such a pain in the ass” Margret groans annoyed?

“What did you say?” Jeane shrieks enraged, bolting up right and grabbing Margret by her collar.

Margret smirks “Got yah!”

“What the hell are you talking about? Answer me dam it!” Jeane yells shaking Margret violently by the collar.

“If you stop shaking me I’ll tell you” Margret explains and Jeane stops.

“There I stopped, now answer me” Jeane demands!

“You stopped crying” Margret says with a smile.

“So what” Jeane asks getting angrier?

“You know I think I figured you out, Jeane” Margret explains “It seems to me that the reason you fight and bitch so much is because you don’t want to seem weak. That’s why you always called Anthony dumbass as well as just about everybody you came into contact with. Am I right?”

“…” Jeane let’s go of Margret and begins to walk off when Shinobu stops her.

“Where are you going” Shinobu asks? Jeane doesn’t turn around and instead continues to walk towards the boss door.

“I’m going to kill the bastards who killed him” Jeane says before turning the knob and walking inside. Shinobu looks at Margret and in a unanimous decision by the both of them, they decide to follow suit.

Inside Jeane and a girl dressed like a pink version of Margret were talking.

“So that dumbass who walked in here and got himself killed was what, your boyfriend or some-thing” the girl asks?

“…” Jeane doesn’t reply instead she grips her fists, hard enough to make them start bleeding.

“Huh cat got your tongue? Well whatever…” the girl stands up from the yellow stained couch she was sitting on. “…it doesn’t matter who the fuck you are. I don’t even care if you just wan-dered in here by accident. You’re still gonna pay!” The girl points the baseball bat she was car-rying at Jeane showing that it was stained with blood.

“…you’re not the one whose gonna get payback” Jeane mutters not looking at the girl.

“Heh tough talk for some bitch in a thong” the girl taunts when suddenly Jeane rushes at her, forcing the girl to dodge out of the way. Jeane instead punches a large hole in the couch that the girl was previously sitting on. “Ha got you” the girl shrieks insanely as she raised her bat high into the air intending to smash Jeane’s skull in. Jeane turns around to face the girl but doesn’t move anymore than that. The girl laughs crazed as she smashes the bat onto Jeane’s head, severely damaging Jeane’s skull but strangely this did not kill her. Jeane’s head began to bleed out from the injury, blood streaming down her face, and drenching her hair.

“Huh…” the girl quickly bolts away then once she was enough feet away to still strike Jeane but not the other way around “…how the hell are you still standing? You skull should be paste!” Jeane doesn’t reply and instead she once more rushes the girl, except this time instead of dodg-ing the girl swingers her bat at Jeane only for her to dodge and deck her in the face! The girl tries to hit Jeane once more but Jeane grabs the bat and crushes it with one of her bloody hands.

“Fuck!” the girl screams right before Jeane grabs her by the neck. The girl struggles to get free but Jeane was far too strong. No this was not some benefit of being your pawn, this strength was all her own. After all what would all that train she paid for be if it didn’t show results. It’s the one ‘good’ thing that came out her horrible past.

“You know you’re a lot like me…” Jeane said in a stoic tone of voice.

“Shut the fuck up and kill me already. Or do you plan to bore me to d-“Jeane punches the girl in the chest causing her to shut up.

“…you remind me of what I used to be like. Not letting anyone boss you around, beating people’s faces in left and right. Yeah you’re a lot like me…”

“Dam it just shut u-“once more Jeane punches the girl, this time hard enough to break the girl’s ribs, every single one of them!

“However one thing is different, I have someone in my fucked up life who means something!”

“Yeah who” the girl asks?

“The bastard you murdered with that broken bat of yours! He’d probably brain wash you by now but here’s the thing…” Jeane whispers the last part as she gets closer to the girl “…I don’t have that power!” For once in the girl’s life, she felt like all those she had once killed, a feeling that she had never felt before, fear! The girl began to scream but Jeane covered her mouth and begins to squeeze, slowly cutting off her remain oxygen! However, just before the girl was about to pass out Jeane removed her hands, causing the girl to collapse to the ground, desperately gasping for breath.

“*cough* you*wheeze*bitch*gasp*” the girl gasped cursing Jeane’s very name. Jeane pulls her hand back but suddenly something grabs her.

“That’s enough” shouts a voice. Jeane whirls around and sees none other than you! “That’s enough Jeane! It’s over. You’ve won” Jeane doesn’t say a word and backs off. You ap-proach the girl who you knew as the second ranked assassin Bad Girl. She looks at you with fearful eyes as you place your palm over her open mouth, shooting out a rather large piece of yourself inside. Bad Girl passes out during this process having no strength left to fight with.
1552322222222222222221122112.title: Her horrible life...

15523222222222222222211221121.content:
“Mission Acomplished” you say in a hollow tone of voice.

“Anthony!” “Master” calls the two voices of Margret and Shinobu as you stand back up. You turn back around and Shinobu is the first to embrace you via a hug.

“Master I was so worried! I’m glad you’re still alive. I always knew that you wouldn’t let yourself be killed so easily!” Shinobu praises as she continues to hug you.

“Alright Shinobu I think that’s enough hugging” you say and Shinobu let’s go of you.

“Sorry Master I just am so happy that you aren’t dead” Shinobu says with a bow.

“That’s okay just give me some breathing room, I nearly bit the dust after all” you joke.

“But Anthony when we last saw you, your head was smashed in and your rips were outside your body. How did you survive being nearly bludgeoned to death” Margret asked?

“Well actually I don’t really know. I guess it’s just some added bonus of my powers. Heh frankly I wish this thing came with an instruction manual” you say with a playful laugh.

“Idiot” Jeane whispers.

“Sorry Jeane what did you say” you ask only to see Jeane pull her arm back.

“DUMBASS” Jeane shouts at the top of her lungs as she delivers a bone shattering punch to your face and sends you flying back. You begin to smash through wall after wall until you eventually make it outside and crash into the pavement.

“Anthony!” “Master!” Margret and Shinobu shout in unison as they see you come to a halt, several feet away. The two quickly run towards you while Jeane, angrier to the oomph degree, slowly walks after them.

A short few seconds later Margret and Shinobu finally make it to you, just as you come around.

“Anthony, are you okay” Margret asks concerned? You groan as you lean up, your back hurting the worst but other than that you were pretty much fine. You didn’t even have a cut or mark on your entire body!

“I’m alright but my back’s killing me” you groan, standing up. “Jeane must’ve been taking it easy on me” you laugh. It was then that Jeane arrived and you look at her and smile.

“What are you smiling about? I just put you threw about ten walls! Don’t make me make a new addition to the pavement” Jeane warned but you simply smiled. Jeane blushed slightly and turned away. “At least you’re not dead…” Jeane says silently as she walks away saying the last part when she was out hearing range “…I’m glad you’re alive.”

“Well regardless I think it’s time to go but first” you suddenly switch main bodies to Jeane, temporarily taking over her for a moment just as Bad Girl begins to wake up.

“Ah what happened” Bad girl groans holding her head in pain?

15523222222222222222221.content:
(Author's Note: I'd like to take this storyline, if you people don't mind. Also, I kind of borrowed some of my content from Seuzz, and some from ductorPhil)

"Ugh." You groan as you flop into the chair like a dying fish; you're glad to be home after the last day of school for the school year. You browse through the sites that show anime for new fan subs, and you notice that there's a new Fairy Tail episode up. Mentally cheering, you click the video. It's a great episode, so great that you don't notice yourself becoming more and more tired as the episode continues, and by the time you realize you are tired, your head hits the desk and everything goes dark.

You wake up to find yourself in a completely different place from where you went unconscious. You feel a flash of fear, but that is quickly replaced by curiosity of finding out where exactly the heck you are. The only noise you hear is snoring, and you notice the only light in the building is the moonlight that shines through a window. You try to stand up and look around, only to find out you can't, although you can rise up, and realize that you are in some type of bar-- an extremely messy one, as there are more bottles and barrels strewn about the establishment than you thought possible-- specifically behind the counter, and it's full of sleeping people.

'This all looks very familiar.' You think as you look down at the table you have put your hands on to lean—

--and only then do you notice that you no longer have a hand.

Instead, where your arm should be, is a long, glowing blue tentacle. You stare at it in shock, too stunned to even scream. You look down, but only have a brief glimpse of the rest of your body similarly transformed before you collapse onto the ground. You raise yourself up again. You feel nothing like bones or muscles. Instead, you see bluish, goo-like pseudopods shoot out and pull back into your body.

But do you even have a body? You try to look at yourself, but as near as you can tell, you are only a puddle of goop. You try to roll along the ground, and find yourself forming into a serpentine coil. You slither around the now-large counter to take a better look at your surroundings, and you suddenly find a figure sleeping peacefully on the floor. The figure's chest slowly rises up and down, and you suddenly realize that the figure is female.

It is then that a feeling, an almost instinctual desire to get inside her body, sucker-punches your mind, and you are so taken by surprise that you are swept up by the feeling, and lunge towards her face. You can feel her violently twisting as you greedily start squeezing into her mouth and nose, but you don't care, and continue forcing yourself into her facial openings. You wake with a start, gagging. Getting your breathing under control, you look around; you're still in the bar, but something seems different. You sit up and lean on your arm, trying to figure out what's missing.

"What a weird dream..." You whisper, putting your hand on your head. "Wait..." You say, as something has clicked in your mind. 'That's not my voice!' Your eyes travel to the arm with which you're holding your head; it's more feminine and paler than what you remember. 'That's not my hand! What the heck?!' You look at the rest of your body, only to find a pair of girl's arms, girl's legs, and- ARE THOSE FREAKING TITS!!? And why are you wearing a dress?! 'Abbaba... Ihavea... Whattheheck...?' This is, of course, too much for your brain to handle, and your eyes roll back into your head as you fall right back to unconsciousness, flopping back to the floor limply with one last thought going through your head: I wanna go home.

----------

The world comes alive around you, and her mind opens up to you.

You're watching another life from another perspective on what feels like fast forward x1000, but you process it perfectly: The girl you possessed was named Mirajane, and that right there freaked you out, because that's the name of a character in the anime Fairy Tail. That's not all, you become more and more freaked out as her life reveals itself to you, because it turns out that she IS the Mirajane from Fairy Tail: Her younger siblings are Lisanna (who she thinks is dead, but you know she isn't via the manga) and Elfman, she's the head waitress for Fairy Tail, and she's an S-class("S" for "Super awesome") mage.

Mirajane: http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20...

Pretty much everything in her life, you live for her, and when it's all over you find yourself in front of a gigantic forest, and back in your own body, though it feels like you've never left. Between the trees flash moments of Mirajane's life, everything from an argument with young Erza, to Lisanna's death. You actually feel sorry for her loss, especially because you know she's really alive. "I wish I could change that..." You mutter. Suddenly, the image flashes white, and you find yourself right next to Mirajane, crying over Lisanna's gradually disappearing body.

"Whoa!" You shout, but you are merely an observer as Lisanna's unmoving body finally disappears, and Mirajane collapses into tears. Another flash of light and you're back in front of the forest. Suddenly, an idea hits you: "If I can look at her memories... maybe I can change them!" You say to yourself, though it sounds much better in your head. Regardless, you begin to walk into the forest, exploring the memories of the Fairy Tail poster girl.

Eventually, you come across a large paper booklet, bound by what looks like gigantic paper clips. You look at it, and realize that it has every member of Fairy Tail, and every person she's ever met, and her thoughts on them. You wait a second, and then smirk and grab the pencil attached the bottom of the booklet by string, and erase her knowledge of Lisanna's death, instead writing down that she has left on a trip for two years, and will be coming back soon. Then you flip to the very back of the booklet and write your name down, and add a few sentences about you in the document. By the time you have finished, Mirajane a crush on you that is augmented by unwavering devotion and desire to please you by any means. And of course, she now thinks the best way to please you is by being possessed by you.

You put the pencil down, and fold the book back, and then you suddenly find yourself not at the bar, but in your room, on your bed. You sit up on the edge of your bed, and the two swinging lady lumps on your chest confirm to you that you are still inhabiting Mirajane's body.

'How did I get back to real life?' You wonder, but you've really stopped trying to figure this crap out. All you know is that you're in a hot girl's body, and you've got nothing to go on for anything regarding a cover story or disguise. Thinking back to what just happened, you try to call up her memories, and everything reveals itself to you; her memories, her mannerisms, her powers, all information within Mirajane's mind assimilates into yours. You could, if you wished, impersonate her perfectly. Her mind is nothing more than a pretense, and a persona that you can assume at will. You even know Japanese!

However, you have other issues to attend to at the moment, because you can feel something in your stomach that you just can't hold, and you run to the bathroom. Mirajane's high heels and dress not a problem since her muscle memory guides you. Once in the bathroom, you hurriedly lock the door and kneel down in front of the toilet, before closing your eyes and letting it fly.

Even though you can see the bathroom, it is doubled with another and very disorienting sight: walls, hard and white and curved, rising around you. You lean back over the toilet, in case more vomit is about to come out of you, and are shocked to find yourself looking into Mirajane's face, which seems to looming largely over you. You are also shocked to find that your vomit barely has any actual vomit in it, but in fact is made up of a blue, snake-like goo. You gasp, dully noting that Mirajane's voice sounds very cute.

"Yeah!" You have Lucy chime in happily, adding to Erza's grateful statement, and you note how weird it sounds for the girls' Japanese voices speaking perfect English. 1552322222222222222222222222112.content:
-a little bit earlier-

Tsubaki quietly entered the cheerfully noisy lecture theater, while her eyes scanned the faces of all her classmates. Her eyes rested upon her best friend Maka, who seemed to be scanning herself with her hands. Tsubaki asked Maka if she was OK.

-present time-

"Hi Tsubaki." You respond, trying to stay in character to keep Tsubaki from suspecting anything as you start pulling things out of Maka's bag, and placing them neatly on her desk. "How are you?"

"I'm fine, thank you." Tsubaki replies. "By the way, what were you doing just a minute ago, did you lose something?" She asks wondering why her friend was moving her hands around her body.

You smile at Tsubaki and answer 'Yeah, I was, but I'm fine now, have you finished your assignment yet?' You ask, scanning Maka's memories, and found out they had an assignment, and you know Tsubaki isn't finished. You know you can use this to get Tsubaki's body as well, but first you have to get her to come to Maka's house.

Tsubaki stops sorting her pens and highlighters, and looks at her friend in disbelief. "It's not due for another week!" She sits down. "Don't tell me you've already finished!" You shrug.

"Well, I suppose I can do another proof read. You nod to yourself, as if this is a good idea.

"I'm so jealous." Tsubaki says with a little sigh. "I've done all the reading for it, but I haven't even started writing yet." She stares gloomily at her books. "I just can't get my head around some of the ideas."
You pat her back in sympathy.

"Hey, that's not a big deal, why don't I help you?" You grin encouragingly. 'This is perfect.' You think, knowing this is the opening you have been hoping for.

"No, you don't have to." Tsubaki sulks. You roll your eyes.

"I know I don't have to, but I want to help you." You say to Tsubaki. Tsubaki looks up at her friend. Your green eyes suddenly become wide with mock excitement. "I have the best idea! Why don't we have a study session tonight at my place!" You exclaim. "I'll make dinner, and you can sleep over, it'll be loads of fun!"

Unable to resist your infectious enthusiasm, Tsubaki laughs and says "Ok, and I'll bring something for dessert."

"Deal!" You say. Tsubaki nods and laughs as you start going over the finer details of preparation for that night. The class's teacher, Dr. Stein, then rolls into the lecture theater on his office chair, only to crash as its wheels caught on the tiny ledge in the doorway. You whisper "You'd think someone so smart would learn from his mistakes by now." You don't actually care about this, but you need to pass the time, so a conversation won't hurt. Tsubaki nods in agreement as she laughs quietly.

The class starts, and you busy yourself with taking notes, trying to imitate Maka, which isn't that hard since you can access her mind, allowing you to act like her. Tsubaki did the do the same thing, still excited about the sleepover. Class finished early because Dr. Stein had some important experiment he wanted to do.

"Alright lets go shopping for dinner, then go to my place!" You say, cheerfully.

"I should go back to my place and get my pajamas and a change of clothes." Tsubaki replies as she goes to her house. An hour later, she is in front of Maka's apartment door. You got ingredients for creamy chicken pasta, and a store bought strawberry cheesecake, and have put them in the fridge. Tsubaki knocks, and you open the door to let her into the small, but cozy, apartment that is now yours. You are thinking that you are a better actor, or now actress, than you thought before since you have imitated your host without arousing suspicion from anyone.

"So, should we study in the living room?" Tsubaki asks.

"Sure" You say as you get two cans of juice out of the fridge, and go into the living room. You hand one to Tsubaki, having put some of yourself inside of it.

"Thanks." Tsubaki says with a smile. You smile back as she settles down at the coffee table. "Alright, let's get started." An hour and a half later, Tsubaki is astonished at how good a teacher you are. You are very patient, and explain things so clearly that Tsubaki now has a firm grasp on everything she needs to write her assignment. This is tiresome, but Tsubaki continues on. "You are good at this." Tsubaki says. You laugh.

"Not really, I just study hard." Knowing that Tsubaki didn't know how right she is, since you are still doing a good job of pretending to be Maka.

"No, you really are good at this,' Tsubaki says, firmly.

"Thanks." You say with a smile. You decide to take a drink, wondering when Tsubaki will drink the part of you in the juice. "Should we start dinner?" You ask, getting up from the coffee table.

"Yeah, I'm starting to get a bit hungry." Tsubaki says.

"Ok, I'm going to start cooking." You say. You soon have lunch made, and you bring it out to the table, which Tsubaki had set while you were cooking. "Alright, let's eat!" After dinner, the two of you decide to watch TV on the couch and eat strawberry cheesecake. "That was a good meal." You say as you return from the kitchen with another slice of cheesecake.

"I know." Tsubaki giggles she licks the end of her fork.

"We should do this more often." You say.

"Definitely." Tsubaki nods, eyes on the TV. She finally begins drinking her juice, and just like that, you are finally in control of Tsubaki.

15523222222222222222222222221121.content:
Your two bodies continue eating their pieces of strawberry cheesecake in silence, allowing you to accustom yourself to the practice of operating two bodies simultaneously and getting used to the differences between the girls’ bodies. By the time they’re finished, you can operate them so freely and naturally that it would appear that Maka Albarn and Tsubaki Nakatsukasa were two independent people with wills of their own and not merely meat puppets that move only because you wish it. “Hey, Maka?” you speak as Tsubaki when the two of you have finished with dessert.

“Yeah, Tsubaki?” you have Maka respond while you do the dishes with two sets of hands, having left half the cheesecake for Soul who, as you know from Maka’s memories, would grill her quite hard if they had left none for him.

“Thanks for helping me with the assignment.” Maka’s green eyes look up to Tsubaki’s indigo orbs, which are shining in gratitude.

“It was my pleasure, Tsubaki, don’t worry about it.” Of course, neither of you bother to mention the little gift Maka had given to Tsubaki, either. You continue to stare at each yourself with two pairs of eyes, not in the way that lovers do, but rather, as if trying to see into your soul.

Wait a minute...

‘See into the soul, eh?’ Actually, that gives you (Or maybe it’s Maka) an idea. You close Maka’s eyes in concentration, and Tsubaki backs up a few steps, already knowing that her friend is planning. Suddenly Maka’s eyes shoot open, revealing black pupils that weren’t previously there. From behind Maka’s eyes, you inspect Tsubaki’s soul. You see the pale, luminescent orb that is Tsubaki’s soul, complete with long tail. Everything seems to be normal, except... you squint Maka’s eyes -as Tsubaki, you almost flinch under your own intense gaze- It almost seems like there’s something surrounding the weapon’s soul: an almost imperceptible layer just above her soul, almost like a witch’s Soul Protect, except there’s nothing to disguise. Both you and Maka’s mind, provided with information of your abilities, deduce that this is the soul of your real body. Lucky for you, you can barely see it, and you’re almost certain that no one -even Professor Stein- would notice it unless they were looking for it. As Maka, you blink, disengaging your Soul Perception, and grin at your also-possessed friend.

“You look normal, Tsubaki.” As if she doesn’t already know. Tsubaki just smiles.

Finally, you manage to remove the tree branch from your back as you gasp for breath, and then scream out in pain having bit so far into you lip it became sliced open.
Soon after your loud yell, you gasp for breath, and then realize that you are still breathing, even though the branch surely would’ve breached your lung from the angle it entered your back. This intrigues you, yet you shake it off, and then proceed back towards ‘your’ house, only to find Maka out cold, and her scythe on the ground, with its eye closed, as if asleep.

You shrug and pick up Maka. You put her over your shoulder, and then look over and grab her scythe, figuring that you’d be nice, and in return, they wouldn’t try and kill you again. You walk over to the door of your house to find that your house was actually that of a large pumpkin.

“Heh, I guess I really do live in a fairy tale world.” You joke, and then walked inside. You carefully place Maka on the couch, cover her up in a blanket, and gently put a pillow under her head. She seems to snuggle right up, and then drift off. You smile, and then walk back to your room, scythe in hand. You decide to place the weapon in your room, and then after setting it in the corner, you decide to take a nap as that fight was rather tiring. You yawn and soon fall asleep on you lush bed, not bothering to cover up or anything.

Upon a few hours later, at sun rise, you awaken once more to find that the scythe that was originally left in the corner is now gone. In its place is that of a young teenager with white hair wearing a yellow and black jacket and red pants. You walk over to him to see if he was alright to find that he is out cold, and you decide to lift him up, and carry him outside, only for him to begin to stir upon you helping him stand.

“Huh? Maka? What happened.” The teen asked, thinking you were most likely Maka, though you don’t know why.

“Don’t worry, your friend is down stairs.” You say happily and the boy nods still half out of it. You escort him down stairs to the living room, where you find the blond girl just waking up. She begins to stretch and groan, clearly hurt. “Oh my, I hope you are alright.” You say concerned as you and the boy walk over to her. You then get an idea, and reach into your pocket to find a strange little blue piece of candy. You don’t know why but you feel you should give this to Maka and somehow it would make her feel better.

“Here, take this, it should fix you up as good as new.” Maka looks at you and rubs her eyes most likely half asleep, just like the boy beside you.

“Huh…oh, thank you.” The girl says as you hand the piece of candy to her. She quickly downs it and then ask you for a glass of water. You turn around to find a kitchen like area, and soon grab a glass, before turning on the sink. You hear the two walk up behind you. You turn around and smile after filling the glass with water.

“Here you go.” You say as you hand the glass to the girl and she thanks you before downing the water. The girl wipes her mouth then tells the boy that they have to be leaving, and soon they leave as you wave to them goodbye. “Don’t be a stranger and come back any time you want.” You say, waving, to which the two wave back, smiling.

“Well I guess I should maybe try and find a way out of this place. Hmm what should I do?” You asked yourself as you lean against the wall of your house? Suddenly, you begin to feel sleepy once more (Boy is this getting old >_<) and soon pass out only to reawaken…

155232222222222222222222222222222211.content:
“Gah! Whoa! What the he-“you were cut off when a tall mechanical grabbed you by the leg and threw you into the air.
(picture of the machine that’s attacking you)
http://images.wikia.com/xenoblade/images...

*CRASH*

You slam into the concrete pavement with a hard crash, your head is bleeding but strangely you’re okay. You lean up and groan as you wipe the blood from your fore head.

“Ow that really hurt” you groan before the mechanical monstrosity takes another shot at you, only this time before it can, you manage to get to your feet and run away. ‘Got to run, got to run, got to run’ over and over again your mind screamed at you to run away, escape, get the hell out of there, ext… but every where you turned more of those same machines appeared to block your path. Soon you are surrounded and there is no longer a way for you to escape!

“No! I don’t want to die! Leave me alone” you scream, shielding yourself with your arms as the machines charge at you.

…

Nothing happens and the sudden sound of metal clashing against metal pierces your ears, causing you to flash your eyes open. To your surprise you were surrounded, not by machines, but humans… well human like beings called Homs, the only real difference between humans and homs is that homs require Ether which is an abundant resource in this world. There were three of them, all of them you recognized but right now you couldn’t really place where you remembered them from.

“Are you okay?” the female hom asked who was garbed in a strange outfit that looked unsuited for even a small fight, let alone the all out war that was going on at this very moment. You nod and lower your guard, noticing a faint urge that begins to tug at the back of your brain, however you ignore it as another hom speaks, this one, garbed in red and had blond hair and carried a strange sword that looked like it was made from scrap metal.

“Hurry up and get to safety” the blond hom explains and you nod, covering your head as you runaway towards what was known as the Residential District, which would soon be the key location of a very critical and horrible event.

You dart past the machine entities known as Mechon and dart for a house, narrowly avoiding a blast from a huge mechon that flew by that resembled something like a black jet if it was on steroids and left a slim trace of blue fire as it flew through the air, as you roll inside.

“Whoa that can’t be…Metal Face?” you gasp in astonishment as your memory finally has a chance to returns to you which is when you realize “I’m in Colony 9! Which means this is the Residential District!” You slightly open the door and that’s all the reminder you needed. Yep this was indeed Colony 9 from that Xenoblade game you picked up a few days ago. How and why you were here came to mind but that was quickly overshadowed by this strange urge that you had noticed before but no it clearly was noticeable. It was like something was pulling at your hair but without the pain, just the sensation made you feel a bit freaked out. However the second Metal Face came whizzing by you immediately slammed the door shut.

“Phew that was close” you sigh before suddenly hearing a loud crash outside the door, you look outside just in time to see Metal Face pick up a strange robot vehicle, this vehicle looked very different from the green and black mechon, for one it was all one color, a pale grey and for two, someone was in it!

“Ah” you hear a familiar scream pierce your ears as Metal Face throws the mech in your directions causing you to barrel out of the house and into a nearby alleyway. Metal face looks back and begins walking over towards the mech which is when you realize what was about to happen. You may have only been playing this game for a good five hours and only about an hour of those five hours were story related but you knew what was going to happen.
‘Fiora’s gonna die and I can’t do anything about it! Ah! And this annoying urge isn’t helping!’ you watch as Metal Face draws closer and closer towards the unconscious Fiora in the damaged mech. ‘Only a 5 yards away! Only 5 yards away before Metal Face kills Fiora!’

“Gah! What the heck is wrong with me? It’s like this urge is trying to take me over. Gah” you grip your head but the urge doesn’t go away. You look back up as Metal Face as Metal Face closes the gap between him and Fiora.

“SCREW IT” you scream bolting forward, unaware as your body begins to turn into liquid. You didn’t care rather you wouldn’t because all that mattered right now was saving Fiora!

You shoot forward just as you arrive at the cockpit and dive into Fiora’s mouth, fully liquefied, as Metal Face weaves back his arms back ready to land the killing blow. You quickly flash your new eyes open, finding you are now Fiora for some strange reason but just as you look up Metal Face stabs you with his massive claws.

You let out an ear splitting scream as the pain shoots through your body, like a thousand hypodermic needles piercing every one of your nerves at once. You look down for a moment and see as a river of blood pours out of you and onto Metal face’s claws.

You can almost hear the metal monstrosity laugh as it pulls its claw free and casts you aside like a piece of garbage, which is when you black out.

You felt cold, colder than you’ve ever felt before, even colder than that time when you were locked outside your house in the middle of a blizzard. You felt like you were dying and couldn’t help but scream which is when you flashed your eyes open to see that you were surrounded by darkness. Panic struck you like a ton of bricks and you began to thrash around only to find you were confined! Stuck in the dark and confined to only a small amount of room you begin to sweat and gasp for breath. Claustrophobia was setting in and you knew it. You scream out for help but no one arrives.


‘Is this really how I’m gonna die? Stuck in this darkness, confined to die like a corpse?’

“I don’t want to die! I don’t want to die here” you scream at the top of your lungs thrashing around, punching forward in a fruitless attempt to get out.

“Come on!” you scream punching forward, breaking your hand against the solid wall of darkness before you! “Come on! Let me out” you scream once again punching your fist. You hear the sound of a muffled cracking but it is canceled out by your screams as you continue to thrash around until suddenly you feel something, something wet, had fallen on your face. You touch it and then more of the strange wet matter began to fall onto your face. You quickly punch forward with your good hand and hear a loud creaking before suddenly…

“FREEDOM” you scream breaking free of your prison, gasping for breath as mud covers your wounded body before then being washed away by the heavy rain. You stay there for a moments, allowing your senses to return to you as the mud covers your lower body. You stand up and let the rain wash the mud from your clothing until the only mud left on you was the mud that had gotten really deep your clothing.

“I need to change before I get sick” you say to no one in particular as you climb out of the now muddy coffin and onto the somewhat solid ground. You look around but the rain makes it hard to see but you notice a strange light several feet away, a lantern perhaps? You decide to walk towards it only to find that your body felt numb and you were in quite a bit of pain. You collapse a feet steps later, smashing head first into the mud.

A low groan escapes you as you crawl to your feet, your body aching so much that it makes every step feel like you were an old (wo)man. However somehow you managed to make it and found that the light was only that of a lamp post. You let out a clear groan of pain as you slump back to the ground, your back against the metal pole.

“What do I do now” you ask yourself silently as the rain continues to pelt you with its bitter cold water and wind. Just then you hear the sound of footsteps and quickly see a shadowy figure pass you by. You were about to continue sulking when you notice that of a large black cloth on the ground, a blanket perhaps? Regardless you decided to wrap yourself with the blanket and find some shelter. You soon found refuge under a nearby open air shop whose roof helped keep the water off you and the blanket, although a bit soaked, helped keep the wind off you.
You felt tired and decided to rest, today had been very strange and weird day but at least now you were safe and could catch some Z’s.

You lye your head against a wooden shelf and pass out...

Shulk (the guy who was with Fiora when they saved Anthony)pic (http://sickr.files.wordpress.com/2011/12...)

1552322222222222222222222222222222111.content:
You awaken early the next morning, the sky was still dark but the rain had stopped and you were now dried off. You decide it would be best to clear out and leave before anyone could notice that you were inside the shop. They’d probably mistake you for a thief and you really didn’t want any trouble.

However upon standing up you found that your hand was no longer broken and that you no longer ached when you moved which was nice to say the least.

‘At least I can move now’ you say mentally as you walked away from the shop.

You walked for quiet a distance before you stopped again, your stomach was growling, you were hungry. You rub your stomach as if trying to sooth it as you look around for sustenance, quickly spying a tree which held many a fruit. Plenty of fruit to sooth your grumbling stomach!

“Now all I have to do is get them down” you explain, walking up to the foot of the tree. You reach up to try and grab the fruit but find your reach is just a bit too short, this new body of yours was a few inches short than your normal body. “Drat! If only I was a few inches taller” you groan standing on your tiptoes, trying to reach an apple on one of the trees lowest branches.

Suddenly you feel your mouth get really watery and immediately keel over, vomiting up a strange clear liquid that a normal person would mistake for water. You feel yourself black out again but soon you awaken once more. You look around and soon realize you were back in your own body which makes you jump for joy.

“Glad you’re happy” says a familiar voice. You stop jumping around and turn to see that of your former body, Fiora, who was still wrapped in that dirty black blanket from before.

“Fiora uh…are you okay” you ask a bit worried for some reason. Maybe you were worried that you had somehow hurt her when you took control of her, or maybe you were worried she’d be mad at you.

“I’m alright, thank you. Uh where’s Shulk and Reyn” Fiora asks curiously?

“Don’t you remember what happened? That huge Mechon grabbed you while you were inside the tank suit thing and then threw you” you explain before suddenly both of your stomach’s growl interrupting your train of thought.

“Heh I guess we’re both really hungry, why don’t you pick some of those apples. You can tell me what happened while we eat” Fiora says with a kind hearted chuckle. You nod and quickly reach into the tree and pull down a few apples. Fiora takes off the blanket and places it on the ground. It almost looked like a picnic only minus the basket and drinks.

You decide to fill Fiora in on what had happened up to this point, even the part about you taking control of her. You just felt like you had to confess, Fiora was kind and you didn’t feel it’d be right to lie to her.

“So that’s what happened, I blacked out just before that faced Mechon stabbed me which is when you took over and somehow through your possessing me, it saved us both.

“Yeah that pretty much sums it up” you reply matter of factually.

“Well then I don’t suppose you know where Shulk and Reyn went” Fiora asked a bit worried.

“Well even if I didn’t, and I do! I’m sure they’re somewhere close by” you say trying to cheer her up. “Come on they’re at Terpha Cave but before we go…” You stopped midsentence and looked back at Fiora who quickly realizes why you’re staring at her.

“Oh my, I’m filthy” Fiora says with a clear tone of embarrassment.

“Yeah before we meet up with Shulk and Reyn maybe we should stop by your house and pick up some new clothes.” You explain and Fiora nods. With this you two quickly wrap up the makeshift picnic and head back into town, however before you could even make it you realize one vital thing!

“Uh Fiora…” you begin stopping in place just outside one of colony 9’s many entrances.

“Yes what is it?” Fiora asks, stopping as well.

“Everyone thinks you’re dead, right” you ask beginning to sweat out of nervousness.

“By what you told me, yes! Why do you…oh” the sudden realization saves you just in the nick of time as two colonists walk out onto the bridge that you were standing on. You and Fiora quickly jump into the small river under the bridge creating a small splash.

“What was that” one of the colonists asks as the two quickly walk up to the side of the bridge. They quickly lean over the side of the bridge just in time to see you stand up (Fiora was hidden behind you in a way that none of the colonist could see her).

“Hey are you okay” the other colonist asks looking down at you. You look up at the two colonists; both of them were girls though why you really noticed was a mystery to you.

“I’m okay! I just…uh…lost my hat” you lie. The two colonists look each other in the eye and the shrug. The lie worked!

“Alright just be careful, there’s Brogs down there” one of the colonists warned.

“Thanks I’ll be careful!” you say keeping up the act and then waving the two colonists goodbye. A few minutes past until you were absolutely sure that the coast was clear, that and you had to wait for your clothes to dry off!

“Well that was just awful. I wish I wasn’t dead, that way we could at the very least walk down the street. Curse that faced Mechon” Fiora growls, smashing her fist into the water angrily.

“Here let’s get moving. Besides if all else fails we can just go out during night.” You explain and help Fiora stand up. At least the water had helped wash some of the mud off of her, though she still looked really dirty. Oh how you wished you could just return home and let her use your shower but then again is there any way you can get out of here? Regardless you were here now and your main goal right now was to reunite Fiora with Shulk! You can worry about other things like showers later!

“Anyway we’re only a block away from my house so at least I can change my clothes” Fiora sighed thankfully before you two ascended the hill of the river bank and got back onto the bridge. In only a few minutes you had reached Fiora’s place only to find that someone was inside.

“Oh crap Dunban’s inside and I can’t just run in there and grab your clothes” you say annoyed as you and Fiora hide in a nearby alleyway that was exactly five feet from Fiora’s house. You had seen Dunban as he walked inside and out of the house, granted he was only gone for like a minute so there wasn’t any way for you to get inside.

“So what do we do?” Fiora asks you as if you had all the answers.

“Hmm…” you begin trying to think up some plan of infiltration.

“Well anything?” Fiora asks.

“I got it” you say finally coming up with a plan.

“So what do we do?” Fiora asks a bit impatiently.

“We…”
