“I say we wait till night, that way we can get in there, grab your stuff, and get gone” you explain.

“Alright so we wait till nightfall, got it!” Fiora replies acknowledging your plan.

…

Several hours later you and Fiora were patiently waiting in the alleyway, waiting for the lights inside of the house to go out. However even though it was now nightfall there were still plenty of people out and about so you had to wait another hour before everyone was finally gone.

It was now midnight by your watch; well it would be if you actually were wearing a watch! Regardless the time to act was now and you weren’t about to let that moment pass! You and Fiora quickly bolted for the house and quickly infiltrated it like the thieves you somewhat were. (A/N Fiora kind of does play the role of the thief in this game. Well to an extend she does)

You were in the downstairs/kitchen area which you are quick to realize, partially due to the fact that your power allowed you access to Fiora’s memories even though you really didn’t know whose memories they were. You just knew where you were and where you needed to go. Regardless you and Fiora carefully move upstairs to the bedroom area, and to a somewhat surprise to you Fiora and Dunban share a bedroom together, not the same bed mind you but the fact still made you uneasy, maybe it was the fact that any wrong step could wake up Dunban and there’d be one hell of a ruckus following that!

So instead of causing any sudden noises you carefully and stealthily move across the bedroom while Fiora instructs you via small whispers from the top of the stairwell. Your power helped to shield your footsteps by turning your lower region into water allowing you to move without making a sound. Soon you had made it to the dresser that contained Fiora’s clothes, however you had to been even more careful now due to the fact that the dresser was between the two beds, one of which Dunban was sleeping on!

You carefully pull open the dresser but no matter how stealthy and careful you were, the dresser still let out a loud not to mention prominent creak. Dunban in response quickly rocketed upward, grabbing a sword that was surprisingly close to his bed and bisecting you in half!

“Monster, what are you doing here” Dunban yelled quickly moving to turn on the light.

“Wait! Don’t” Fiora shouts out just as your top half, which is still alive mind you, falls onto Fiora’s bed. (Your bottom half was completely liquid so it just turned into a puddle on the bedroom floor.)

“Fiora?! “Dunban called out a bit surprised “Is that you?”

“Yes it’s me but…uh…well” Fiora didn’t know what to say. She couldn’t just tell Dunban that she was alive, that’d raise too many questions not to mention cause a lot of panic. A girl coming back from the dead, yeah it’d be like a zombie movie! Well that’s what you thought at least as your body tried to reform.

“What is it Fiora? Come on you can tell me” Dunban asked almost sounding like he was begging for her to speak again!

“A…this is a dream! Yeah a dream” Fiora explains trying to think up a plan on the spot.

“A dream? But-“

“Listen Dunban” you say finally managing to completely reform.

“Who are you” Dunban asked now on his guard “what have you done with my sister!”

“Easy Dunban we just came here to…umm…” Fiora didn’t know what to say but you quickly jumped in.

“Look we’re here to tell you that you need to go after Reyn and Shulk! They need your help!” You explain.

“How do you know Shulk and Reyn? Wait you mean they left Colony 9?” Dunban asked curiously as well as quite a bit confused.

“There’s no time for that! You have to find them. Find Dickson; get him to take you to Colony 6! Shulk and Reyn along with a girl named Sharla, will arrive there in a matter of week or so and just after they fight a huge Mechon named Xord they will be ambushed by the very same mechon that killed Fiora! Along with him there will be five to seven other bigger and bulkier mechon. If you don’t make it their in time then they’ll all die” you explain getting a bit carried away, in fact you get right in Dunban’s face and shout exposition that even he shouldn’t know.

“I think that’s enough, our job is done” Fiora says chiming in right before you reveal that Fiora was indeed alive though how you knew this was a mystery to even yourself. Maybe you took a peak at the Xenoblade Chronicles wiki one time when you were bored. Regardless you and Fiora take your leave and Dunban goes back to sleep. You pray that he believes you as you leave the house.

“Well crap!” you groan as you and Fiora walk out onto the streets of Colony 9. You were distraught over failing to get Fiora clothes and also revealing a crap ton of exposition that Dunban was supposed to find out on his own.

“Hey it’s okay, at least he didn’t accidently attack us” Fiora says with a grateful sigh.

“Well actually he did, he cut me in half, though I doubt you could’ve seen that since it was really dark up there” you explain running your finger along the span of your waist.

“Oh…well at least your okay now” Fiora says a bit awkwardly.

“Anyway I guess since we didn’t get any clothes hmm…maybe if somehow…hmm” you begin to mumble and go off on a tangent, so much so you almost end up running into a building but luckily Fiora grabs you by the arm and you stop walking.

“Look if it’s really that bad of a problem then we can just um…” Fiora looks around before spying a nearby black cloak that was hanging out to dry “We can use this!” Fiora quickly puts the cloak on and in a somewhat moment of sudden fanboyism, you let out a squeal and hug her.

“Sorry I couldn’t help it you look like Xion from Kingdom hearts” you squeal while picking Fiora up in the air and hugging her like an adorable plushy.

“Uh could you let me down now” Fiora asks, blushing underneath the hood of the cloak.

“Oh sorry” you apologize and quickly set Fiora back down.

“So…who’s Xion” Fiora ask still blushing.

“Uh well you see there’s this game called Kingdom hearts and uh…I-it’s not important! Never mind! Besides don’t we have somewhere we need to go” you quickly snap back trying to change the topic, luckily it works! Fiora quickly realize what you meant and almost smacks herself in realization.

“We need to catch up to Shulk and Reyn. Oh no they’re probably already in trouble by now. We have to go rescue them” Fiora exclaims beginning to freak out.

“Hey calm down! Besides I’m sure they can handle it. Shulk does have the Monado after all” you explain.

“There you go again. How do you know these things?” Fiora asks confused and a bit annoyed.

“Well…hmm I think it’d be best if I just show you” you say with a sigh. You slowly reach your had forward and touch Fiora on the forehead with your index finger.

“What are you-“suddenly several flash through Fiora’s mind cutting off her train of thought, images of various things, mechon, Shulk, Reyn, herself and even, you! You showed her how you arrived here, how she and Shulk saved your life from mechon, and more. You showed her images of Colony 6, bombed and blown to bits along with another faced Mechon, Xord, a giant bulky mechon who wielded a giant hammer and was responsible for countless deaths of homs. And then…that was it! You had stopped play after you had beaten Xord and was ambushed by Metal Face (that’s why you knew about the ambush and Dunban’s introduction into the party).

With this you let Fiora go, allowing her a bit of relief before she asked “why?”

“I don’t know. I don’t even know how I got here; let alone why I have these powers. All I know is there’s this strange urge inside me that, up until now, I’ve been suppressing by sheer will power. This urge is the only real downside to these powers…well that and not having an instruction booklet but what does now a day’s anyway?” you say the last part with a weak chuckle trying your best not to freak Fiora out.

“Uh…umm…wow” Fiora was at a loss for words and why wouldn’t she be, you just dropped a bombshell if not an frickin nuke! So many questions entered her mind only to be answered the next. She seemed to be on the verge of tears.

“I can take them away, the memories if you want” you explain and Fiora saddly nods.

“Please, take them away, I don’t want to know all these things” Fiora pleads now clearly crying.

“It’s okay, Anthony’s gonna take all the bad things away” you say in a comforting and sympathetic manner, taking Fiora in the arms and letting her cry on your shoulder. “Just remember that you ask for this. That’s all I ask” You ask and Fiora nods, trying to wipe her tears with the sleeve of her cloak. You gently touch the back of Fiora’s head and with in a small matter of seconds, the memories are gone, locked away inside Fiora’s mind, and only allowed to be accessed on your command.
15523222222222222222222222222222221111.title: Sometimes things are best left unseen...

choices: You, Fiora, and Rusty enter Terpha cave...
Skip the cave and pick up after they exit...
155232222222222222222222222222222211111.content:
You stand there for a few moments, just standing there, holding Fiora in your arms. She had stopped crying but she had yet to brake off the hug. So you just continued to hold her like this, in the middle of the street, as night turned into day.

“Fiora…” you begin your voice soft and quiet as you look back towards the girl on your shoulder. “Fiora…” again you speak, this time a bit loud but still sounding quiet enough for no one other than Fiora to hear you.

“…” Fiora doesn’t reply, instead the sound of soft snoring. She had fallen asleep; perhaps the strain of locking her memories was a bit much on her? Or maybe she was just tired. Either way you gently move her so that you could carry her on your back, via piggy back style, and begin your trek towards Terpha cave.

It took a surprisingly short time to make it to the cave, though instead of entering you decided to wait until Fiora had awakened before you proceeded.

Another hour passed and yet Fiora continued to sleep. You decided against waking her and instead went for a small walk down the path that you had walked in order to reach the cave. You waved hello to the two guards that usually guarded the cave as they passed by. You were about to say something to them but figured against it, ‘Enjoy your walk Anthony before things get hectic ‘ you thought to yourself as you continued down the path.

You spot a few Bunnit (Xenoblade Chronicle’s versions of bunnies though with opposable hands on their tails) as they skitter across the tall grass. However something about those Bunnits bothered you, there was a lot of them and by a lot you meant thirty if not forty and they were surrounding something. You try to get closer but the second you do something erupts from the grass to your surprise!

“A-ah mechon?!” you gasp in shock as a Mechon M63 roars to life before you. (Picture of the mechon: http://images.wikia.com/xenoblade/images...)

You quickly dodge roll out of the way as the Mechon slams down its claw like appendage towards you in an attempt to grab you. You quickly jump back as the mechon tries once again to grab you, however before it manages to get within reaching distance it hit’s a snag! You carefully stand up, having fallen on your butt when you jumped away, and approach the mechon as it fruitlessly tries to grab you. You inch ever closer to the stuck mechon and begin to take note. The armor was cracked in several places; the legs were malfunctioning, that much you could tell just by looking, especially since the legs let off a small amount of sparks every time it tried to use them.

“Hmm maybe I can use this thing…” you mumble to yourself as you examine the mechon. It was then an idea popped into your head, an ingenious idea, an ingenious devilish idea “Payback time!” you shout, smirking like a wiseass and for a second you swear you see the mechon wince in fear before you drive into the machine monstrosity via the several cracks in its armor! In only seconds you were completely inside the mechon, on your way to figuring out how to make this mechanical dog, so to speak, your bitch!

“Hmm so that’s how that works, this moves the arm, and these move the legs’ you mumble to yourself as you ooze through the mechon’s interior, which admittedly was a bit roomy which you didn’t mind, after all you had more room to maneuver and less crap to move around. Soon the Mechonis foot soldier was yours to command!

“Alright that ought to do it” you say clapping your hands in satisfaction as you rematerialize outside the mechon. “Now on my order…mark! And Claw Strike!” you order and the mechon once again roars to life, this time shooting it’s claw appendage forward and smashing it into a nearby boulder! To your surprise the rock crumbles to pieces! “Whoa! Nice job” you say with a small but proud laugh! The mechon puppet quickly turns back towards you, waiting for your next order which you happily give it.

“Alright listen up!” you’re voice loud and prominent as the mechon soldier listens patiently “From now on you will serve as my soldier! My body guard! You will protect me and my companion until your gears fall apart and your metal rusts until dust! This I command” As if in response as well as a sign of loyalty and respect, the mechon give you a mock salute! “Now come! Let’s begin our new life as master and soldier!” with this you and your new mechon puppet take your leave!

…

It was about an hour later before you made your way back to the mouth of the cave, partially due to your soldier’s faulty mechanics, which you swore you’d fix once you had the chance, and also the fact that if anyone were to see you well…let’s just say the scene from any Godzilla movie where the monsters show up would sum it up pretty well.

Regardless you had managed to make your way back to Fiora who, by now, had already gotten lunch started. You give her a wave as you and your mechon puppet approach.

“AH! Anthony look out” Fiora screams running up to you and pushing you to the ground.

“Ow!” you groan as you hit your head on a rock on the ground “Fiora what the heck was that for?”

“Stand back I’ll take care of this mechon” Fiora says pulling out two razor sharp knives that she must have either found or stole while you were gone.

“Whoa! Whoa! WHOA! Fiora calm down” you exclaim quickly and carefully disarming Fiora so that you weren’t accidently cut by her knives.

“B-but-“ Fiora tried to say but you quickly cut her off.

“Look I reprogrammed this mechon to follow my orders so there’s no need for that” you explain. “Here you can have these back now” you explain as you hand Fiora back her knives. Fiora was about to say something but shrugged and quickly walked back to a crock-pot that was lying over an open fire.

“Anyway lunch is ready, I made some soup. I hope you like herbs and spices!” Fiora explains as she removes the tops to the crock-pot letting out a large plum of steam from the pot. You shrug as you and your mechanical servant walk over to the crock-pot and sit down.

“I can try” you reply as Fiora hands you a bowls of warm green colored soup with some floating meet chunks that you thought were from a crab for some reason.
A little while later…

1552322222222222222222222222222222111112.content:
Another half hour passes before you finally decide to move on. It only took a few minute, plus ten minutes of fighting various cave dwelling creatures, to get through the cave. You even managed to evade getting hurt thanks to your trust mechanical slave though you really treat him more as a buddy than a slave.

“Good job, Rusty” you say patting the black mechon on the back as you, Fiora, and Rusty make it outside to the Bionis Kneecap. “Whoa what a view” you say in amazement as you look out to see the open sea as well as the gigantic Mechonis which has been long dormant just like the Bionis.
 “Yeah I see what you mean” Fiora replies walking up to the edge of the cliff. Fiora stopped just a few inches from the edge of the cliff as a cool wind began to blow.

“Heh the air is really salty” you say with a small chuckle leaning a bit over the fence that was set up by around the edge of the cliff minus the small part where Fiora was standing of course. ‘Maybe the reason there wasn’t any fence there was because people fish here?’ you thought as you continued to look out at the seemingly endless ocean.

“Have you been to the ocean before, Anthony” Fiora asks turning her back to the cliff in order to face you.

“Yeah a few years back, it was a family reunion sort of thing. I remember that Sarah was nice to me for once; she bought me an ice cream cone. I don’t remember what flavor just that Sarah was nice to me” you explain with a calm, almost peaceful tone as the salty ocean air blows right into your face.

“Heh, so you like your sister” Fiora asks smiling.

“Well sometimes…when she’s nice” you explain, again with the same tone as before though this time with a small hint of sadness.

“Anthony…” Fiora begins as she takes a step towards you only to suddenly slip and begin to fall back towards the edge of the cliff.

“Fiora!” you quickly gasp in shock quickly bolting up right and rush forward.

info.description:
Your name is Anthony, and you gain the power to turn into liquid and enter TV and handheld video game screens, then enter the body of girls in it. Once you do that, you have possessed them. You can access their memories, use any abilities they have, live their lives, and imitate them perfectly. While you are liquid, you can split yourself into multiple parts so that you can possess multiple girls, and also be yourself at the same time. There will be one part that will be in complete control of all other parts, that is the main part, and you can switch which part is the main part. When you are in the series, no time will pass (unless part of you is in the real world).

You can alter the girls' memories and then leave their bodies at any time, you can also make it so that they are your loyal slaves or that they have no minds or free will at all and will only do what you tell them to, and you can also alter the size of certain parts of their body, for example, their breasts. You can return to the real world while in their body, and when you enter their body from the real world, you can enter their series while it is on.

You also can make others liquid while they are holding on to you, and only you can turn them them back to normal. You both can enter the same body, however, and both have control that you share, but you are the dominant one if you do. You can also enter the body of a real girl and do the same things to her as the girls from the Cartoons, Anime, and Video Games. Also, you can have girls turn into liquid under the same conditions as the boys. When you possess a girl, you can then use their body to possess another girl, if that happens, you can leave the girl whose body your using to possess the other inside the other girl's body, and if you want, you can remove the girl's body, which will be yours to use.

You and only you can cause a merger (either by you merging, or by you having others merge), but no boy other than you can be used in a merger. When two or more characters merge, you can choose the personality traits they get from which person (along with the appearance, but unlike the personality part, there must be aspects of the appearance from everyone merged), but if you are one of the people merged, then you have complete control, with no change in personality, with the ability access to their memories if you want to. The default form of the body you get when you merge will be female, but you can change it to male at any point (but no in between).

As soon as you get the powers, you will get the urge to possess a girl (although you may not realize that the urge is to possess someone at that point, but that it is to enter her body), an urge that will be so strong that you can't fight it. If you go too long without possessing a girl, then you will start to get the urge again, and it will slowly get to the point where you can't fight it, and will possess the first girl you can. If you're already possessing a girl, you obviously won't get the urge, and the longer you're in her body, the longer you can go without the urge once you leave. If you split yourself into multiple parts and have some of the parts possess girls, then the urge is reduced, and you can go longer without it, but eventually it will get to the point any part not possessing a girl will get the urge to the point where they can't fight the urge (obviously, the more females possessed, the more the urge is reduced).

If you occupy a space in liquid form where a non-physical girl is while she is intangible, you can still get inside of her if you can manipulate your and her forms to the point where she'd completely cover you.

Your mind can't be read, your soul, mind, and memories can't be affected by outside sources, and while you are in the body of a female, her mind is unconscious while you're in control, and you can alter her thoughts, making it so you can fool anyone into thinking that you're that girl if they do a mind reading. Information involving you possessing them can't be discovered by mind reading at all, even if you would mentally scream it at someone while they are doing a mind reading. Your mind can't be affected by any outside forces.

A person who is possessing a girl can assimilate the girl's mind and make it theirs permanently, unable to have the part of themself inside at the time leave the body. In this situation, you can't be completely inside the body. If the possessor is stuck inside a host's body permanently, the girl's mind is unable to be put on autopilot, as it is no longer separate from the person possessing them, but you are still imune to any outside forces. In trade off for this, the one possessing no longer needs to search for memories, as they'll come on their own, although the person can still search for the memories, the downside is that the person possessing will, for a while, have some of the host's habits, and if they are absent minded about something, then they may subconsciously act like the host would to a degree in a situation, except her mind and personality being influenced by the one possessing her.

Anything that specifically controls liquids will not affect you.

Rules:

No gay/lesbian stuff or incest, except in cases where it is canon in a series, and in this case, don't focus on it, also, these things don't apply to you as far as possessing girls goes, as your powers can alter things that would cause problems, such as diseases, and things caused by incest, and in the case of boys in girls' bodies, they still have male minds, which would be attracted to girls, while the girls' bodies are attracted to guys. Romance between a boy in a girl's body and a boy in their own body is ok, but if that is used, then the boy must stay in the girl's body permanently, and if you are the one who does it, then you must have a part of yourself outside of the body in order to avoid being stuck in it.

Use proper spelling and grammar (I'm ok with small mistakes since everyone makes them once in a while).

No weight gain or vore (outside of entering the bodies of girls in liquid form), except in cases where it is canon in a series, and in this case, don't focus on it.

If I find out that someone who adds has stolen someone else's chapter, and then posted it as their own, then I'll delete it.

Stick to the story that's going on, don't switch it all the sudden without any explanation.

Only you can gain this power, everyone else needs your help to do anything with it.

A boy in a girl's body must be referred to as a girl. The other characters don't have to, but the person writing it must do it.

Characters who can transform between girl forms and boy forms will be only have their girl form the whole time that you (or anyone you help possess that character) are in their body, and you can also lock them in the female form.

If there is ever a debate on the gender of a character, then ask me, and I'll decide. Characters that are counted as female:
Haku (There is no way that Haku is a boy in my opinion, and I can think of several reasons for Haku to hide her identity).
Vivian (In the English version of Paper Mario the Thousand Year Door it is true without a doubt, and by what I understand, the info in the journal about the characters in the Japanese version comes from Mario's point of view, and since Beldam calls Vivian a man during an insult, Mario could quite possibly only believe it to be true).

If you want to have a female version of a male character, then you must have something happen to change their gender.

Any character who in their series is called a god will be considered a powerful spirit instead in this story, even if the charaters from their series won't call them as such.

Please put up links to pictures of the fictional girls during the option chapter they are mentioned in, or the chapter they appear in. Also, if you can, put up links to images of any original characters from that series, or any fused characters. (I'll do my best to edit the chapters already up to include images). Don't hesitate to use pictures of what the girls are doing.

No ending the story.

No turning Anthony evil or changing his personality. Since the video games, anime, and cartoons are in a fictional world, Anthony has less restrictions in there with that rule, he can play the role of a villain/villainess, but only in the fictional world, not in the actual one.

Aside from that, you can do what you want. I may add more rules later.

She likes anime and video games. Like Anna, she is on the swim team and kickball team.

Katherine: 16 years old. A rich girl, but she isn't a snob. Her father is dead, but it didn't matter too much to her because he didn't care much for her and was always away on business, and her mother, although still alive, is very much the same. Because of how she grew up, she believes everything can be bought by money (although, as I said, she's not a snob).

Anthony once saved her life by getting her out of the way of a car that came out of nowhere and was going to hit her as she was crossing the road, and ever since, she has been in love with him. She doesn't understand why he didn't agree to become her boyfriend after she offered to pay him a large amount of money to do so, because of how she believes anything can be bought. Anthony, his family (except for Sarah, who encouraged him to accept so that she could try to take the money from him), and his friends got annoyed when she tried to buy his love, although they were thankful when she sent her bodyguards after Mike to protect Anthony (except, of course, for Sarah). Henry, Norman, and John are the only males she has working for her. She lets her friends, her uncle Henry, and Anthony call her Kat, but no one else.

She usually wears a sparkling silver dress with gems imbedded in it, expensive bracelets, a diamond necklace, and silver high-heeled shoes, although, despite the way she dresses, she is a bit of a tomboy, and likes many sports (she dresses the way she does, because her mother wants her to keep up the family's good image in front of the media). She lives in a mansion, and rides in a limo whenever she isn't going on foot. She loves video games, and has every console system, along with most of the games for them. She has long, straight, black hair and blue eyes. She knows martial arts, and is good at it, so she can easily handle most threats on her own, and her bodyguards can handle most of the others.

Sandra: 23 years old. One of Katherine's bodyguards. Short black hair and blue eyes. Always wears a black suit, black boots, and sunglasses when on duty. She never shows emotion while on duty.

John: 26 years old. One of Katherine's bodyguards. Short brown hair and brown eyes. Always wears a black suit, black boots, and sunglasses when on duty. He never shows emotion while on duty.

Jasmine: 24 years old. One of Katherine's bodyguards, who is on duty whenever either Sandra or John are not on duty to make it so Katherine has two bodyguards at a time. Short blond hair with blue eyes. Always wears a black suit, black boots, and sunglasses when on duty. She never shows emotion while on duty.

Henry: 38 years old Katherine's uncle on her father's side. Unlike his late brother and his sister in law, he cares for Katherine, and wants the best for her. He is rich (although not as rich as his sister in law and Katherine), but he is very humble, always donating money to worthy causes. He works as Katherine's Chauffeur by his own will so he can have a reason to watch over her. He met Anthony about a week before Katherine met him. Anthony and Henry get along well, and Henry hopes that Anthony will fall in love with and marry Katherine.

Norman: 46 years old. Katherine's butler. He is more like a father to her than her real father was, and always helps her out. He knows martial arts. He wants nothing but happiness for Katherine, and after finding out about her feelings for Anthony, found out more about him, and approves of him.

Jill: 16 years old. Has brunet colored hair and bright blue eyes. A bit of a brave heart she won't let anything deter her from her dream job. She wears mostly the color blue and her favorite outfit is a bright blue tank top with a dark blue skirt that is so dark that people think that it is black blue sneakers. She loves to dance and likes to have fun. Her favotire game is DDR.

Her dream is to become a dancer like ballet, or something like that. She recently met Anthony a month ago, and has developed feeling for him, though he doesn't know that, and in turn he has a bit of a crush on her. She's an only child, so she gets lonely, but Anthony helps solve that by putting his number into her cell, and telling her to call him if she ever feels lonely. She has another hobby, which she keeps to herself, as she's a little embarressed because of it. She's a massive anime fanatic. She lives by herself as her parents had died a year before she met Anthony, leading her to have deperession, but that cleared up mostly after meeting Anthony. She always wears a broken heart necklase that her mother got her for fifthteenth birthday, which is May 30th. She is currently sixteen

She lives in a dirty apartment, which she's doesn't clean due to her depression issue. Her parents lived with her in that appartment until they died. She prefers to go out instead of stay in and cry, but she sleeps alone, and sometimes cries herself to sleep due to being lonely (that is, until she met Anthony, of course). Anthony offen takes her with him when ever he goes out to play at the local arcade. He even bought DDR in order to play with her at his house.

Carol: 24 years old. Has black hair that goes down to her shoulder blades, and blue eyes. She is a police officer. Her uniform consists of a dark blue shirt, a black skirt, black boots with a slight heel, and a pair of black leggings. Tends to be a little short with people, especially because of her large breasts, which cause guys to stare at them quite often.

There is an airship that can only be seen or touched by Anthony or someone with a piece of him inside of them. The airship automatically transports to what ever world that Anthony's main body is in. It is controlled by the program Diva (Digital Interactive Virtual Assistant), which obeys Anthony's will. Diva and all technology on the ship are immune to any outside influences. Diva can reprogram the brains of others by having electrical charges reprogram their brains, but in they are immune to electricity, then their brains can't be reprogrammed. The stronger the will, the more resistance the person who Diva is trying to reprogram has. Diva can possess one girl at a time, and use her as a host, so that she can interact with the outside world. The ship has a digital viewer function that can make a digitized version of a series that doesn't use screens that Anthony and Anthony alone is the only one other than Diva's digital for that can enter.
